name: Maliskra
summary: Maliskra is a half-medusa, half-fire elemental attendant to the avatar of Imix in the Temple of Elemental Evil. As the attendant to Imix, she is among the most powerful member of his cult at the time, even superior to the current leader, Vanifer.

name: Galactus (EMH)
summary: Galactus is a cosmic being who is known as the Devourer of Worlds because of his huge appetite for worlds around the universe. He has heralds to proclaim his arrival to each targeted world he chooses to consume.

name: Claire Plangman
summary: Claire Plangman is a protagonist in IDW Publishing's 2012 comic series Godzilla: Ongoing.

name: The Nameless King
summary: The Nameless King, also known as the King of the Storm, is an optional boss in Dark Souls III. He is a giant golden-armored man with long strands of bristling ash for hair, who wields a massive spear and rides atop a huge corvine dragon.

name: Kamen Rider Calibur
summary: Daichi Kamijo (上條 大地, Kamijō Daichi) is the past Kamen Rider Saber who saved Touma's life in the past. After defeating Hayato, Kamijo inherited Kurayami and became Kamen Rider Calibur in order to complete the former's mission to reveal the true enemy within Sword of Logos by receiving the Almighty Book. Because of this, he had abandoned his friends and even sided with the Megid in order to achieve his goals.

name: Killer Frost (DC Animated Movies)
summary: Crystal Frost, also known as Killer Frost, was a metahuman with cryo-kinetic abilities and one of the incarcerated criminals in Belle Reve forced by Amanda Waller into the Suicide Squad. She later betrayed the Squad to work with Zoom to retrieve the Get Out Of Hell Free card. She would then betray Zoom and instead tried to take the card for herself. In her fight against Copperhead, Amanda detonates the bomb in his neck while being in close range with Killer Frost, killing them both.

name: Haruichi Izumo
summary: Haruichi Izumo is a rookie Defense Force officer who joined alongside Kafka. The heir to Izumo Tec, Japan's largest anti-Kaiju weapons manufacturer, he graduated as valedictorian from Tokyo Neutralization University, excelling in both academics and combat. He shares a spirited rivalry with Aoi Kaguragi, constantly pushing and challenging each other as equals.
abilities: Himself
Superhuman Physical Characteristics

Passive Pseudo/Limited Invisibility and Camouflage (Even though Haruichi comes from a distinguished family, his presence is said to be extremely thin, to the point where the toilet flushes itself even if he is still using it and automatic doors don't react to him. It can intensify to the point that his real existence begins to fade [ 2 ] . More examples of Haruichi’s ability, which he can even use to his advantage [ 3 ] )

Explosion Manipulation , Poison Manipulation , Paralysis Inducement and Danmaku (Via AW-0027; this bow comes with a bundle of arrows that can produce large explosions as well as possessing the properties of a toxinizer. Even if the explosions do not cause any damage to a target, they are still capable of paralyzing a target as large as the Third Wave in its tracks , despite the Third Wave being inorganic creatures that possesses no nervous system. A single arrow from AW-0027 is shown as capable of splitting up to ten projectiles to rain down on the opponent [ 4 ] )

name: Chemo (Pre-Flashpoint)
summary: Created on accident by a chemist attempting to solve world hunger, Chemo is an incredibly dangerous being composed of radioactive, acidic chemicals that has threatened and destroyed entire cities on certain occasions.

name: Osiris (SMITE)
summary: Never has there been, nor shall there be a king more perfect than Osiris. Son of the Earth God, Geb, Osiris was divine royalty by birth, and all the land his birthright. Benevolence and prosperity were the hallmarks of his reign. Would that he had been left to shape the world, but the jealousy of his brother, Set, changed the course of fate.

name: Jack Marston
summary: John 'Jack' Marston Jr. is the secondary protagonist of Red Dead Redemption (2010). He is the son of the main protagonist, John Marston Sr., and upon witnessing his father's death, he makes it his life's goal to avenge him, finally doing so upon reaching adulthood.

name: Señor G (Dross Adventure)
summary: Señor G is a Boss on the video game Dross: Adventure 2.

name: Chifuyu Matsuno
summary: Chifuyu Matsuno is a major character in Tokyo Revengers. He is the vice-captain of the First Division of the Tokyo Manji Gang.

name: Punishing Bird
summary: Punishing Bird, originally known as O-02-56 and Little Bird, is a TETH class Abnormality. It is a small white bird perched on a perch. Despite its weak appearance, this bird hides many large teeth in its stomach, capable of one-shotting about everything. It uses this ability to punish sinners around the world.

name: The Elder God
summary: The Elder God is one of the main antagonists from the Legacy of Kain series. He is a giant squid-like creature, described as "A mass of tentacles and eyes", with godlike powers who feeds on the souls of the dead.

name: Takuma Sakazaki (The King of Fighters)
summary: Takuma Sakazaki (タクマ・サカザキ; also written as 坂崎 拓馬, Sakazaki Takuma) is a character from both the Art of Fighting and The King of Fighters fighting game series. His distinguishing feature is an X-shaped scar on his right pectoral. He is also somewhat eccentric, donning his tengu mask and insisting he's Mr. Karate and delivering speeches that are supposed to rally morale, but often make him look silly. Takuma is the most established known Kyokugenryu Karate practitioner, and he is the only one in the discipline who can make full use of the discipline's most difficult moves.

name: Phoenix (Granblue Fantasy)
summary: Phoenix is the sole sun creature, born from the sun three billion years ago. As it is able to produce the energy required for life by itself, the Phoenix neither ages or dies. Its eyes can see for incredible distances and are even capable of picking out the souls of individuals as it flies across the cosmos on its burning wings, doing so at over 99% of the speed of light. Each particle of the Phoenix's body is comprised of immense energy, and its blood grants immortality to those who drink it. In addition, its tears can heal any wound or illness, including death itself, and bestow great power. Though the sun creature had proved to be a powerful existence that could not be defeated nor captured, a natural enemy appeared approximately 7,000 years ago—the Omnipotent, who possessed the power to kill even the immortal. After several clashes against the Omnipotent, the Phoenix recognized a threat for the first time in its three billion years and decided to borrow the power of another living being. Eventually, Abramelin was born and deemed the strongest of mortalkind; recognizing him to be the most suitable for the role, the Phoenix gave him its blood and made him immortal. Abramelin went on to support mortalkind throughout the years and finally defeat the Omnipotent. The girl Fenie who grew up under Abramelin and Farhana's care is a fragment of the Phoenix that had fallen off during the sun creature's fight against the Omnipotent; however, the Phoenix does not possess any special feelings toward its own fragment.[1]

name: Lezly Mackerel
summary: Father of Quinton and semi-ordinary resident of Brown Town, Lezly Mackerel, also known as Big Lez by his friends, is the main character of the Big Lez Show. An alien being from the distant planet of Kingdom Come, Lez was exiled alongside his brother, Norton, for seeking to usurp the throne of their father, King Laranox. They made their way to Earth, and settling down in Australia, he and Norton going their own separate ways. He eventually adopted a son, Quinton, and lived the next few decades in relative peace and quiet.

name: Animator
summary: Animator is the person in the Woody Woodpecker series that animates all the episodes and sometimes saves Woody's life.[1]
abilities: Superhuman Physical Characteristics
Toon Force
Large Size (Type 1 - Much bigger than Woody , [ 2 ] who is little small than other humans of the real world [ 3 ] )
Transmutation ( Transformed a umbrella in a shotgun [ 2 ] )
Sound Manipulation ( Censored Buzz Buzzard , [ 4 ] can talk with Woody even in space [ 2 ] )
Time Manipulation ( Can rewind time [ 5 ] )
Dimensional Travel ( Can go in and Woody's world at his will [ 2 ] [ 1 ] )
Has access to the Animator's Pen and use all its powers.

name: Spikey Trap
summary: Spikey Trap is an immobile, aggressive fauna species from Subnautica: Below Zero that consists of a huge cross-shaped base on the ground having a cross-shaped maw at its center, in which features a smaller real mouth, filled with sharp, rectangular teeth. When a suitably sized creature comes within a certain distance, the Spikey Trap is capable of lashing out its long tentacles to catch the target before drawing them into the center to be consumed.

name: Nomu (USJ Attack)
summary: Nomu is a deceased individual whose body has been heavily modified and reanimated by Dr. Garaki with the sole purpose of defeating All Might.

name: The Dark Queen of Mortholme (Character)
summary: The Dark Queen of Mortholme is the protagonist and playable character of the game of the same name. She is the most powerful being of her entire universe, ruling over her realm Mortholme for an eternity before an aspiring hero breaches her castle, intending to destroy her evil legacy. Although pitiful and easily crushed by her, they continue to return again and again after each of their deaths.

name: Hybrid Baby
summary: The Hybrid Baby is one of the Hybrid Humans in Green Worldz, a race of monsters that can manipulate the plants that have taken over the world, forcing them to rapidly evolve.

name: Trini Kwan
summary: Trini Kwan is the original Yellow Ranger of the Power Rangers series. She was the caring and optimistic member of the team during the war against Rita and served as the tactics expert on-board the Dino Megazord. She would go on to become a world peace ambassador following her retirement as a Ranger.

name: Komaba Ritoku
summary: Komaba Ritoku was the leader of the biggest faction of Skill-Out. Despite being usually compared to a gorilla due to his height (230cm) and imposing physique, Komaba was one of the most restrained and honorable leaders of Skill-Out. He kept the other members of his gang in check so as to make sure they didn't hurt innocent people and focused their efforts on going after espers who did abuse their powers to bully or attack Level 0s. During his time as the leader, he also became the guardian and protector of Fremea Seivelun. His desire to protect her from harm was one of the motivations for his acts.

name: Merlina the Wizard
summary: Merlina the Wizard (魔導師マリーナ Madōshi Marīna?, lit. "Mage Merlina") is the principal antagonist of Sonic and the Black Knight.  She is the granddaughter of the legendary wizard Merlin. An exceptional and talented young wizard, Merlina serves the Royal Court as the Royal Wizard of Camelot.

name: Frog (League Of Legends)
summary: Frog is an mysterious creature in League Of Legends. It is seen jumping off cliffs all the time but still surviving and is possibly growing up to be the Gromp

name: Giant Wasp (Dungeons and Dragons)
summary: While not as exotic as other monsters in D&D a giant wasp is none the less a fearsome opponent to fight it combat due to its ability to inject one with devastating poison which can paralysis them, outside this the wasps behave like regular wasps with the only difference being what prey they hunt.

name: Ginger
summary: Ginger is one of Garlic Jr.'s original henchmen.

name: The Player (Undertale)
summary: The Player Entity is an enigmatic creature that influences Frisk throughout Undertale. Due to seeing Undertale's world as a mere game and its characters as fictional, they seem to lack empathy for the characters and are willing to even kill all of them just to see a different ending. While their existence is rarely alluded to, there are some characters that seem to directly communicate with them at times. In Deltarune, The entity is actively acknowledged as a being who uses a vessel - Kris - to hold their SOUL. They control this SOUL, and through it the vessel, exploring the similar yet different world of Deltarune. At the end of chapter I, Kris removes the SOUL, seemingly becoming freed of The Player's control.

name: Superman (Tomorrowverse)
summary: Clark Kent (birth name Kal-El) is a superhero known as Superman. He is an extraterrestrial hailing from the doomed planet Krypton, sent to Earth as an infant to escape his home planet's destruction. His ship was discovered by the kindly Jonathan and Martha Kent, who took him in and raised him as if he were their own son. In his civilian identity, he is a mild-mannered intern working for the Daily Planet in Metropolis.

name: Equuleus Shoko
summary: Equuleus Shōko, or simply Shō, is the Primary Protagonist of Saintia Shō, a female-centric Spin-Off of the Saint Seiya Franchise. She is one of the Saintias, a small group of personal female Guardians and Servants of the Goddess Athena.

name: Caribbean Monk Seal Nasal Mite
summary: The Caribbean monk seal nasal mite (Halarachne americana) was a species of endoparasitic mite that parasitized the nasal airways of the Caribbean monk seal. Following the extinction of the Caribbean monk seal in 1952, the mite was unable to adapt and subsequently went extinct.

name: Kamen Rider Birth (Shintaro Goto)
summary: Shintaro Goto (後藤 慎太郎 Gotō Shintarō) is a former police officer who working as the leader of the Kougami Foundation's Ride Vendor 1st motorcycle brigade to keep the world safe from the Greeed and eventually becomes Eiji's friend. Shintaro first battled the Greeed after they were freed from their seal and he was the sole survivor of the group sent to find them. Shintaro begins to assist OOO as the Foundation's representative in his battle against the Greeed.

name: Tiger Mask
summary: Tiger Mask, along with his brother Lamb Mask and a third man, is hired by Felix Davison, and his brother Crispian to murder his wealthy family, allowing Felix and Crispian to inherit their money. The trio of killers start out by having Lamb Mask kill the Davison's neighbors so they won't call the police, followed by Tiger Mask firing several crossbow bolts through the Davison's dining room window and hitting Tariq in the head, killing him, and wounding Drake.

name: Mindstorm (TV Series)
summary: Mindstorm, real name Dan, was a telepathic supe and a former member of Payback. During his time on the team, Dan and his teammates were habitually abused by Soldier Boy and so, they all, excluding Gunpowder, grew to resent him. Having enough of this, Black Noir met with Stan Edgar to get rid of Soldier Boy, and they agreed to his request since they had already made his replacement. And so, while aiding the CIA in Nicaragua in 1984, the team ambushed their abusive leader, and allowed the Russians to capture him to run experiments on him.

name: George Foyet
summary: Born around Boston in 1968, George Foyet was commonly abused by his father in his early years. When his mother failed to protect him due to being too weak he hated her and at age nine he snapped and killed both of them, making it appear as a car accident. He was then adopted by the wealthy Foyet family. From 1996 to 1998 he became a serial killer known as the Boston Reaper while working as a teacher's assistant at a high school.

name: Martyr Logarius
summary: Martyr Logarius was once the head of the Executioners, a fanatical partition of the Healing Church, dedicated to the complete and utter destruction of the Cainhurst family for their use of blood that in their eyes was unholy and tainted. At some point, he discovered a "vile secret" within the castle, and took it upon himself to guard it from any who may try to uncover it. He donned the Crown of Illusions and sat himself upon his seat, to guard the place for eternity. According to Alfred, Master Logarius led the Executioners in a charge against the Vilebloods at Castle Cainhurst. Alfred implies that Logarius stayed behind while the rest of the Executioners escaped.

name: Excalibur (Soul Eater)
summary: Originally, Excalibur was the sword of Arthur Boyle, that evolved to have its own soul in Fire Force. He would go to join Death, who was the creation of Shinra Kusakabe. Later on Excalibur has become a member of the Eight Shinigami Legion, a group made by Lord Death with the intent to maintain the world order. Like Asura and Lord Death, he too represents a certain madness which is that of rage. His personality is quite narcissistic as he endlessly talks about himself and views himself to be of the highest status.

name: Bongo Bongo
summary: Phantom Shadow Beast: Bongo Bongo is the boss of the Shadow Temple, the seventh dungeon in The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time.

name: Crowbar (Michael Bay)
summary: Crowbar is a Decepticon and one of the Dreads. He was tasked with capturing Sentinel Prime but was intercepted by Ironhide and Sideswipe and was killed by the former.

name: Mecha-Naruto
summary: Mecha-Naruto is one of the protagonists of Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm Revolution. He was created by a "certain someone" as a weapon of destruction to rule the world. Mecha-Naruto eventually went berserk and killed its creator. Mecha-Naruto refers to its creator as "Professor". After that, it reveals that it lost its memory because of an incomplete "Mental Stone" that is inside of it. Mecha-Naruto seems to be a smart and strategic fighter. It dislikes and mocks Naruto for looking like it and "stealing" its name. It thinks that Hinata Hyūga has a beautiful heart and listens to whatever she says. Mecha-Naruto has a crush on her and calls her "Miss Hinata", and it is jealous of Naruto because she prefers him instead of it. During the course of the Naruto Ultimate Ninja Storm Revolution, Mecha-Naruto is able to exchange bodies with the real Naruto as a way to be accepted by everyone in the village, since it - as a robot - scared people because the way it looks. Later on after Naruto saves it, it comes to actually like Naruto but still thinks of him as its rival.

name: Talon (The Walking Dead: Road to Survival)
summary: Talon is an original and playable character who appears in The Walking Dead: Road to Survival.

name: Hameline (Radiant)
summary: Hameline is a female sorcerer that appears in the Rumble Town arc, appearing as one of the antagonists. Hameline has white hair and pale complexion. A bang of hair frequently hides her left eye. Her eyes also look to be covered with eyeliner. She is dressed in a black and green hooded cloak similar to her nemesis.

name: Jirocho Doromizu
summary: Jirocho Doromizu (泥水 次郎長, Doromizu Jirochou) was the leader of the yakuza syndicate Dobunezumi Group, and one of the ruling 4 Devas of Kabuki District before he stepped down from his position in favor of his daughter, with whom he wanted to spend more time. He also carries old ties with Otose and Terada Tatsugorou, with the three of them being close friends in the past. He is the main antagonist of the Kabukicho Four Devas Arc.

name: Suchomimus (Carnivores)
summary: Suchomimus was a large theropod dinosaur very similar to Spinosaurus, minus the sail. Suchomimus appears as a dangerous carnivore in Carnivores Cityscape.

name: David Easton
summary: David Easton is one of the main protagonist of the Trendmasters Godzilla Series. He is a member of the G-Force (Ｇフォース Jī Fōsu) which is a fictional international military organization formed by the United Nations and Japanese Self-Defense Forces.

name: Spinosaurus (Real World)
summary: Spinosaurus (meaning "spine lizard") is a genus of theropod dinosaur that lived in what now is North Africa, about 112 to 93.5 million years ago.

name: Toyotomi Hideyoshi (Fate)
summary: Saber is a Saber-class Servant created for the parody work Koha-Ace.

name: John Carter
summary: A Virginian gentleman from the Civil War era, John Carter is a seemingly-immortal soldier who finds himself one day transported to Mars (referred to by its inhabitants as Barsoom) through unknown means. He soon discovers that on this planet he is capable of superhuman feats unheard of by its inhabitants, and soon goes down in Martian history as an unparalleled warrior, and their world's eventual savior.

name: Wei Qing (Chronicle Legion)
summary: Wei Qing is a Resurrectee and general of the Eastern Roman Empire. He is sent by Caesar to support the Japanese fight with the British Empire's invasion army.

name: Tanzawa Atsushi
summary: Tanzawa Atsushi  alias Acchan is the 7th Gen. Head of the biker gang Kilihito. 17 years old. Has the face and body structure of a female. Incredibly competent fighter. Known for his playful, carefree attitude and being brought to tears easily, but will seldom forgive anyone who may hurt his friends or anyone in Kilihito - his punishment will be swift and merciless. But the fact that he is able to rule over Kilihito, with all of its strong warriors, is proof that his strength is on a whole different level. Also can't ride a bike to save his life.
abilities: Battle Shirt
Jousuke Toffuku
Switch
Berserk
Pre-War

name: Demons (Riordanverse)
summary: Demons are conceptual beings that personificate chaos and, due to their chaotic nature they usually serve deities of Chaos, such as Set or Apophis, but some magicians can also summon them and use the demons as their own personal servants. The demons inhabit the Land of Demons, the nearest place to the Sea of Chaos, because of it's proximity to the primordial chaos, the land is constantly changing, being considered by many magicians and gods to be the most dangerous place in the Duat, as its very nature can turn a person insane.

name: Loki (Supernatural)
summary: Loki is a Norse Trickster God whose identity was borrowed by the Archangel Gabriel.

name: Elfin (Bakugan)
summary: Elfin (エルフィン, Erufin?) is an elf-like Bakugan with a frog head on top of her normal head. She is Marucho Marukura's Partner Bakugan in Bakugan Battle Brawlers: New Vestroia. In the second arc, after obtaining the Aquos Attribute Energy from Frosch, she evolves into Minx Elfin.

name: Headdy
summary: Headdy is the titular protagonist of Dynamite Headdy. He is a puppet who wields various powers involving his floating, detached head. During the events of the game, Dark Demon and his forces take over North Town and Headdy is captured, but he escapes and sets off to defeat the evil king.

name: The Terrarian
summary: The Terrarian is the unnamed protagonist of the Terraria franchise. The Terrarian along with the Guide appears in a mysterious land filled with strange oddities named Terraria. Slowly but surely, they started defeating local monstrosities and removing corruption from the land.

name: Faerie
summary: Faerie is a member of the White Clads Cataclysms Force and the individual that recruited Dragon to their cause more than 200 years before the start of the main story.

name: Jammerjab
summary: Jammerjab is a regular enemy in the Kirby series that gives Kirby the Staff ability when swallowed. His species are members of the Jambastion cult, following Hyness's crazy, evil belief system, and being soldiers under his and the Three Mage-Sisters' command. Jammerjabs lack life experience within that organization, not even knowing the true value of friendship. During the events of Star Allies, knowingly it or not, Jammerjabs served to help achieve Hyness's universe-ending plot. When Zan Partizanne set a Jambastion fortress to destroy itself in an attempt to destroy Kirby & co., the Jammerjabs and other minions inside still tried to get the protagonists, ignoring the place collapsing around them and their own impending doom.

name: Dung Beetle
summary: Dung Beetles are among the strongest insects in the world and are the strongest animals on earth in terms of body weight to lift ratio. At a bare minimum, dung beetles are capable of rolling dung ten times their own weight. They can bury dung 250 times their own weight in one night, and the strongest dung beetle, the taurus scarab (Onthophagus taurus) can pull a weight of up to 1141 times their own weight.

name: Tomura Shigaraki (Post-Surgery)
summary: Tomura Shigaraki (死柄木 弔 Shigaraki Tomura), original name Tenko Shimura (志村転弧 Shimura Tenko), was the protégé of All For One and the leader of the League of Villains. A dangerously unstable individual who looks up to his "Sensei" with the utmost awe and respect, Shigaraki plans on tearing down the society of heroes built up by All Might by any means necessary. His organization and the Meta Liberation Army later merged to create the Paranormal Liberation Front, and he became its Grand Commander.

name: Espresso Cookie (Summoners War)
summary: Expresso Cookie is a charactere from CookieRun, He was brought to Sky Island by Summonhenge.[1]

name: Yaga the Absolver
summary: Yaga the Absolver is an Eternal from outside the Time Tree, who entered the Time Tree in order to consume it. She wishes to unite all mana across the universe with the null mana inside her, and create a new perfect world of nothingness.

name: Opal (Steven Universe)
summary: Opal is the fusion of Amethyst and Pearl. Amethyst and Pearl are extremely powerful when they're willing to work together in the form of Opal. Amethyst's ability to live in the moment plus Pearl's obsessive single-mindedness results in a stable fusion. Opal achieves a sense of peace in that balance that Amethyst and Pearl rarely experience on their own. At times, Opal is so calm and at peace that it causes her to forget the task at hand. The balance that holds Opal together is thinnest of all the other known fusions, and if Pearl and Amethyst have conflicting views while fused, this can cause Opal to revert back to her constituent Gems; the slightest dissonance between the two poses a danger of involuntary defusion.

name: Mars (Black Clover)
summary: Mars is a citizen from the Diamond Kingdom, who was chosen to be apart of an experiment to enhance the magic power of mages. He was merged wth Fana's fire affinity and became enhanced with a number of mage stones. He was brainwashed and fought against Asta and his friends before coming to his senses later on in the series. He now rules over the Diamond Kingdom by controlling the corrupt king with a spell given to him by the Witch Queen

name: Luigi
summary: Luigi is Mario's younger, taller, and thinner twin brother. He is a major protagonist of the Mario series. Luigi has helped and fought alongside his brother on many occasions.

name: Mars-san
summary: Mars-san is a character found on Mars, past the spaceship. It is indeed inside a cliff, crying over a broken down machine. Mars-san is a tall, indigo creature with a single large eye and a single foot, interpreted to be some sort of alien. Green and red dots also cover its body alongside faint green streaks.

name: Raze (Valorant)
summary: Raze is an playable agent in Valorant. She is an engineer coming from Salvador, Bahia, Brazil, with a huge love for explosives and paint. She was involved with driving Kingdom out of Bahia. and leave the street paints as a testament to her victories. She was hired by VALORANT Protocol as its twelfth agent to protect the world against a bigger threat.

name: The Drowned (PIRATE BORG)
summary: Aquatic undead, The Drowned were once sailors who now stalk kelp forests to drag those that pass nearby into their watery doom.

name: Reaper Bird
summary: Reaper Bird is an Amalgamate found in the True Lab. It was accidentally created by Alphys as an attempt to make a monster's soul last after death by injecting Determination inside comatose monsters. This action had the unexpected result of bringing said monsters to life, albeit for a short time. The Determination inside the body of these monsters soon caused their magic-based bodies to melt, fusing them into beings called "Amalgamates".

name: Quote (Cave Story)
summary: Quote is the main protagonist and the playable character of Cave Story. He is a robot designed with the task of eradicating the darkness within the depths of The Island. At the beginning of the game's events, he wakes up in a small cave, having no memory of his past. After wandering around, he comes across Mimiga Village, where he gets sucked into the conflict stirred up by The Doctor, who has some tie-ins with his past. The game follows his pursuit to resolve this conflict and put an end to his evil-doings.

name: Capone Bege
summary: Coming from the West Blue, Capone "Gang" Bege is one of twelve pirates who are referred to as the "Worst Generation" and also the captain of the Firetank Pirates. Once a powerful Mafia boss in his native Blue, he became bored with his dominance of the underworld and decided to head out to sea to conquer and loot as many powerful pirate crews as he can. He's rather infamous for his sadism, high class attitude, and very short temper. However, his most prominent attribute is his direct approach to victory. Bege is a cunning and crafty opportunist who always goes after the head honchos and no one else, just to enjoy watching their organizations dissolve into chaos after he knocks off the boss.

name: Butthead Aliens (Evolution 2001)
summary: Butthead Aliens, as fans named them, are one of the species shown in the 2001 comedy and sci-fi movie Evolution. They are minor characters, only being shown killing one of the Alien Crabs.

name: Subject 4 (Ape Out)
summary: Subject 4 is a seemingly genetically modified gorilla who escapes from captivity, rampaging and fighting against hordes of its captors with lethal force, eventually managing to free itself.

name: PuffAdder (The HoneyBadger and friends)
summary: PuffAdder is a 2 star rank superhero who's part of the team of The HoneyBadger and friends

name: The Car
summary: The Car is the Main Antagonist Of The 1977 Movie “The Car” directed by Elliot Silverstein. The Car is a Demon-Possessed 1971 Continental Mark III, The Car terrorises the local victims but cannot enter Holy Ground.

name: Kozilek
summary: Kozilek is one of The Three Eldrazi Titans, Eldritch Abominations that were born in The Blind Eternities, the nothingness separating realities and planes of existence. Formed out of the very Aether that filled The Blind Eternities, their true forms are incorporeal having no physical substance. Their true names have long since been forgotten to time. When they wish to manifest themselves, they create three-dimensional shadow like avatars, carrying out their will for them as their true forms are too immense to do so.

Kozilek and his brood cause Spatial Contortions by utilizing The Blind Eternities. Kozilek's presence warps space which can cause part of one's body to disappear, another part to be sheered into a square, and the remaining to float into the air untethered by ground or reality . Kozilek's brood are capable of twisting through space in an unamed direction to attack from an unguarded direction [ 54 ] [ 55 ] [ 56 ] )

Kozilek could make time slow down to the point you are frozen in it and suffocated . Kozilek's presence aged a man from a youngster to a child, to a baby, and then from existence. name: Kyurem
summary: Kyurem (Japanese: キュレム, Kyurem) is a dual-type Dragon/Ice Legendary Pokémon. Along with Reshiram and Zekrom, Kyurem is a member of the Tao trio, which exists in the legends of the Unova region.

name: Persephone (SMITE)
summary: Persephone is the Goddess of Vegetation and the Harvest. Daughter of Zeus and Demeter, the others gods often felt fit to decide her fate for her. Demeter enrolled her in helping with her Mysteries while Zeus took it upon himself to give her away. Hades, her husband to be, came up from the underworld and took her away. Demeter, saddened by the loss of her daughter and helper, wept and refused to continue bringing life to the earth. Cornered by a dying world, Zeus forced Hades and Persephone to part.

name: Medici
summary: Medici, also known as the Red Angel and War Angel. He was one of the eight Kings of Angels who followed the ancient sun god from the 3rd Epoch; he's the Lord’s rage, the Lord’s punishment. He was a Sequence 1 of the Red Priest Pathway and had accommodated its Uniqueness. As a member of Rose Redemption, he was a firm believer in the True Creator. He died during the Blood Emperor Tudor's ritual of becoming Sequence 0.

name: Drew McIntyre
summary: Andrew McLean Galloway IV (born June 6, 1985), better known as Drew McIntyre, is a Scottish professional wrestler.
abilities: Big Boot: To be added
Up & Over Gut Kick: Seen here .
Glasgow Kiss: McIntyre's signature is a headbutt .
Claymore: McIntyre's finisher is a running single leg drop kick . He notably delivered four Claymore kicks to Brock Lesnar in order to win WrestleMania XXXVI.

name: Milk Cookie
summary: Milk Cookie is an Epic-class cookie and the main protagonist in CookieRun: OvenBreak's Guild Run storyline. He is also playable in CookieRun: Kingdom. When Milk Cookie was a child, a ferocious pack of Cream Wolves lurked near the Milk Village to charge towards their quarry of the freshest milk in the land. Milk Cookie was inconveniently unaware of this threat, and was right in front of the well when the Cream Wolves started their raid. From behind the mountain's mist, a young Dark Choco Cookie appeared and drove off the Cream Wolves, saving the village. Milk Cookie then made a promise to become a hero as great as he was that day, as the two agree to meet each other in the future, both as fellow heroes. The Milk Tribe, along with Milk Cookie, swore allegiance to and soon integrated into the Dark Cacao Kingdom after they were saved.

name: Mr. Frosty
summary: Mr. Frosty is a recurring mid-boss in the Kirby series.

name: Juri Han
summary: Juri Han (ハン・ジュリ Han Juri, Hangul: 한주리, Hanja: 韓蛛俐) is a character in the Street Fighter series. She makes her debut in Super Street Fighter IV, where she is a main character in the storyline. She is 25 years old (as of Super Street Fighter IV) and is described as a brutal and sadistic member of S.I.N. who relishes fighting and inflicting pain upon her foes.

name: Colossus (Granblue Fantasy)
summary: Colossus is a summon and a boss in the game Granblue Fantasy. The great steel has grown larger still. The heat from its giant frame consumes envy, longing, and all else.

name: Drill Sergeant
summary: Like many Arkeyan artifacts, Drill Sergeant was buried for centuries – a long forgotten remnant of an ancient powerful civilization. It was only a chance collision with a burrowing Terrafin that led to his systems firing up again. By Arkeyan custom, Drill Sergeant was then obligated to become Terrafin’s servant. This didn’t sit well with the dirt shark, so his first order as master was for Drill Sergeant to not serve him at all… a command he continues to follow zealously to this day.

name: Cotton Weary
summary: Cotton Weary was a resident of Woodsboro, who had a secret affair with an older woman, Maureen Prescott, and was falsely accused and arrested of her rape and murder in late-September 1995. However, he was released a year later when it was revealed that Billy Loomis and Stu Macher were the ones that killed Maureen and framed Cotton. Opportunistic, he sought fame and fortune with Gale's help and finally achieved it after saving Sidney's life at Windsor College in 1998. He parlayed the media coverage into his own show in Hollywood, 100% Cotton, before finally falling prey to a new Ghostface whose quest was to locate Sidney.

name: Nein Auler
summary: Nein Auler (ネイン・アウラー, Nein Aurā) is the Director and First Unit Commander of Illegal Fairy Regulatory Agency Dorothea. She is the only female member of the Seven Knights, also known as the Witch of Ainedern.

name: Miyo
summary: Miyo, a girl who was an orphan, lived in constant fear of being sacrificed as she was designated to be the sacrifice for the ruler of her village, Kippuuson-no-Mikoto-no-Kami. Nevertheless, her destiny changed when she met En no Ozuno, a monk with extraordinary powers who could communicate with the gods.
abilities: Powers and Abilities
Acausality (Type 1. Her future self was able to interact with and alter an event in the past without being affected by it),
Supernatural Luck

name: Cade Yeager
summary: All humans make mistakes. Sometimes, what comes from those mistakes comes the best thing that ever happened to them. That's what Cade Yeager believes when he looks at his daughter, to whom he and his girlfriend gave birth at the cost of their high school graduation. While Cade is not the most responsible father in the world, his most redeeming quality is that when it comes to keeping his daughter safe, he does not go back on his word, no matter what; a promise he made to his bride before she passed away. He does have a creative and optimistic mind, lending it to building all kinds of inventions to make a good business out of. Sadly, none of these inventions have brought in much profit for his family. Knowing all of the opportunities he lost, he has sworn not to let history repeat itself, which is probably why he disapproves of Tessa dating boys before she graduates from high school.

name: Absolute Diavolo
summary: Absolute Diavolo (アブソリュートディアボロ, Abusoryūto Diaboro?) is one of the antagonists of Ultra Galaxy Fight: The Destined Crossroad. He is an Absolutian with preference of brute strength in combat.

name: TV
summary: TV is a contestant from the Battle for Dream Island series, debuting as a contestant during the fourth season, Battle for BFDI. He also hosted a few episodes of the second season, Battle for Dream Island Again. He is a flat-screen and widescreen TV, who is a very useful character. He gladly displays all kinds of information to characters and viewers, making what is being described easy to understand and/or visualize. TV doesn't speak much using his own voice, preferring to display images to convey how he's feeling and sentence mix clips from previous episodes of the show in order to communicate clearly. TV seems to try being humorous using his screen sometimes. Having a mechanical mind, TV is also very smart, and due to his utility, he has been appreciated a lot by Golf Ball.

name: GeoGreymon
summary: GeoGreymon is a unique Digimon that is conjectured to be a subspecies of Greymon. His body and shell in his head have also been developed as a lethal weapon of long duration, and its appearance has become more aggressive.

name: Ratri (Home Sweet Home)
summary: Ratri is a beautiful young dancer who used to live with her sister and family. From a young age, she was favored and praised by her grandmother, who thought Ratri had a better future ahead of her because she was more beautiful than her sister, Tida. Ratri became very vain, arrogant, and cruel as she grew up and went to the same dance school as her sister. She believes her beauty can get her everything she wants.

name: Guy (Akame Ga Kill!)
summary: Guy was a member of the Empire's Assassination group. He is shown to be rather perverted, frequently visiting brothels whenever his team goes to a village. Furthermore, he was shown to be looking at the hem of Akame's dress, which she received from Martha. He also challenged his teammate Cornelia to a grappling contest, which was actually an attempt to "accidentally" touch her. Despite this, it appears that he has feelings for Cornelia. It is implied that he asked her to be his girlfriend at least once.

name: Misono Mika
summary: Misono Mika (聖園ミカ) is an SMG-wielding student from Trinity General School that can be recruited by Schale's Sensei. She is one of the three presidents of the Tea Party, and debuted in Volume 3: Treaty of Eden (エデン条約編) as initially as a supportive character helping Schale's Sensei. It was later revealed that she was a conspirator aiming to sabotage Eden Treaty due to her hatred of Gehenna in Volume 3 Chapter 2: Paradise Paradox and came back in Volume 3 Chapter 4: Kyrie for the Forgotten Gods as a minor antagonist that aimed to hunt down Arius Squad until she let go of her hatred and joined their side. After the conclusion of Volume 3, she cameos sporadically in Volume Final: Where All Miracles Begin and in Trinity-based event stories.

name: Ra's Al Ghul (Gotham)
summary: Ra's al Ghul is the overarching antagonist in the DC-based TV series Gotham.

name: T-san
summary: T-san the Templeborn is, simply put, a meme. Seemingly originating on a 2chan thread, T-san's ghost stories revolve around the dispelling of terrifying hauntings by a man known only as T-san, who swoops in at the last moment to instantly deal with the supernatural threat. Many ghost stories are written just to play along with this joke, building up a threat only to dispatch it at the end in a sudden anticlimax.

name: Mister Nobody (Doom Patrol TV Series)
summary: Eric Morden was previously a crook working for the Brotherhood of Evil. He used to go unnoticed by his own superiors and was eventually replaced by a talking gorilla. Around that same time, his girlfriend broke up with him after realising Eric was just a nobody and not worth her time. Motivated to became a better villain, Eric visited a nazi scientist in Paraguay and offered him a great amount of money so he could be used as a test subject. After an experiment with an interdimensional chamber, Eric Morden became a metahuman with the power of narration. Niles Caulder, a secret agent at that time, tried to sabotage the experiment, unknowingly creating an enemy that would haunt him for the rest of his lifespan.

name: Conker the Squirrel
summary: Conker the Squirrel is the main protagonist of the titular video game series created by Rareware. He is a red squirrel with a working-class English accent, who is foul-mouthed and alcoholic, but still good-hearted, and tends to get into a lot of trouble.

name: Imp (Dungeons and Dragons)
summary: Imps are the most typical and average devils above the lemure fodder. Imps serve any number of purposes for their Archdevil overlords, ranging from assassins, foot-soldiers, scouts, and general cannon fodder.

name: Lance (Pokémon)
summary: Lance (ワタル Wataru) is a Dragon-type Trainer, a member of the Kanto Elite Four in Pokémon Red, Blue, Fire Red and Leaf Green. 3 years later, after Red and Blue left the Indigo Plateau, he became Pokémon Champion of Kanto in Gold, Silver, Crystal, HeartGold and SoulSilver. Later on, he participated in the Pokémon World Tournament in Black 2 and White 2.

name: Frost Worm
summary: Frost Worms are enormous worms that spend their lives tunneling through snow, ice, and even solid stone and earth to search for prey in the frozen wastelands of Faerun and other realms it resides in. It is a hot topic of debate as to whether or not this creature is related to the Purple Worm or the Remorhaz- or even both. A battle between a Frost Worm and a Remorhaz may well lay waste to an entire landscape during the conflict.

name: Ogdru Jahad
summary: The Ogdru Jahad, also known as the Ogdru eb Jurhad, The Serpents (the Serpent in plural), The Beasts (The Beast in plural), the Seven Who Are One, and the Seven Gods of Chaos, are monstrous supernatural entities and the main antagonists in the Hellboy comic book series. They are the seven-headed Dragon of Revelation in a Biblical sense, destined to bring about the end of the world. They were imprisoned in their Golden Cocoons by the Right Hand of Doom shortly after the creation of Earth, but not before they spawned 369 children, known as the Ogdru Hem.

name: Manchester Black
summary: Manchester Black is the leader of The Elite, a group of superpowered individuals who sought to end crime by killing criminals rather than peacefully subduing them and placing them through a court of law. His highly publicized murders brought him worldwide fame and popularity for a time, but brought him into conflict with Superman, who condemned Black's methods. This led to their climactic showdown on one of Jupiter's moons, which ended with the psychic's defeat as Superman demonstrated what would happen if he and other heroes like him went over the edge. Since then Black has been a recurring enemy of the Kryptonian hero, seeking revenge for his tarnished reputation and the destruction of his ideals.

name: Vritra (High School DxD)
summary: Vritra is one of the five Dragon Kings and uniquely the only one to be considered as a Evil Dragon. Having existed since ancient times, he joined forces with the Asura to help out in the battle against Indra, but was subsequently defeated by the latter. Following his defeat, his soul was split into several pieces and sealed into multiple Sacred Gears. His current host is Saji Genshirou.

name: Dinosaurus (Image Comics)
summary: Whenever David Anders experiences feelings of indifference, his body spontaneously undergoes a startling transformation. Once this enigmatic process is over, he greatly resembles a human-sized Tyrannosaurus Rex, becoming Dinosaurus. He has an unusual enemy/ally relationship with Invincible, and despite his appearance, is a major scientific genius.

name: Yayoi Kusakabe
summary: Yayoi Kusakabe, referred to as Whip Mask by those unaware of her real name, is one of Mamoru Aikawa's stronger angels. Extremely loyal to him, Yayoi acts as one of his immediate subordinates, coordinating and leading other angels on the field.

name: Angel-Angelus
summary: Angel was one of the most well-known vampires in all of vampiric history, legendary for both his savage villainy and his great heroism. Born Liam in 1727 in Galway, Ireland, he was sired by Darla in 1753, taking the name Angelus, he earned notoriety as the worst vampire in history. Both the Master and the First Evil recognized and appreciated how purely evil Angelus was. He was also known as the One with the Angelic Face because of his physical beauty. However, in 1898, Angelus was cursed by the Kalderash people as vengeance for killing their favorite daughter. They returned his soul, forcing him to live eternally in guilt over the countless crimes he had committed.
abilities: Powers
Resistances

name: Bold (Carlos Trillo's Beauty & the Beast)
summary: Bold takes the role of the Beast in Carlos Trillo's satirical version of the classic french fairytale "The Beauty and the Beast": Light & Bold.

name: Sword Knight
summary: Sword Knight is a character portrayed as a swordsman and knight featured in the Kirby series. In most cases, he's seen as an enemy, but in other cases, he's shown to be a temporary acquaintance, like a helper.

name: Ayaka Kamimochi
summary: Ayaka Kamimochi (神持 朱夏) is a supporting character in the School-Live! series. She is a student at Saint Isidore University and a member of the Melee Fight Crew.

name: Xaero
summary: Xaero is the final boss of Quake 3 Arena and among the most challenging bots in the game. Xaero watches over Arena Eternal, as it kills off the high ranking warriors and waiting for one to stand out to challenge him.

name: The God Delusion
summary: The God Delusion, known as the Ordeal of Violet Midnight. Unlike most of the other Ordeals this one doesn't take a physical presence aside from some Shrines. In a similar method to Apocalypse Bird those must be taken out to force away this Ordeal. It attacks with multiple arms spanning multiple rooms and by staring into what's around it.

name: Aqua Slug
summary: Aqua Slug (Sack Eyes in the Japanese version) is a giant, mutated sea slug (the cause of his mutation is unknown.). On him is a small face with four eyes, a large red and gelatinous mass that houses what appears to be his organs, and a big green shell. He makes his first appearance in King of the Monsters 2. He is the fifth of Famardy's minions, the monsters face. Likewise, he was living underwater, covered in stone, until the heroes found and confronted him.

name: Amber (RWBY)
summary: Amber was the previous Fall Maiden. As a young girl, she received the powers of the Fall Maiden, granting her tremendous power and becoming the next in a line that persisted for thousands of years. However, due to the actions of Cinder Fall, half of her powers were stolen, causing her to fall into a coma. As she was unlikely to ever wake up, and in order to ensure that the rest of the powers would not go to her assailant, Ozpin and his group planned on transferring her portion to someone else. However, she would eventually be killed by Cinder during the Battle of Beacon, causing the rest of the powers to go to her.

name: Hector Salamanca
summary: Hector Salamanca is a high-ranking member of a Mexican drug cartel. Prioritising his family above all else, Hector raised his nephews Lalo, Tuco, Marco, and Leonel into sociopathic cartel members. After murdering Gustavo Fring's partner, Hector became a target for Gus, who spent the following decades orchestrating the destruction of the cartel and the Salamanca family. He later suffered a stroke, rendering him incapable of movement or speech and leaving him powerless to stop Gus from killing all of his loved ones.

name: Rhaegar Targaryen
categories: A Song of Ice and Fire
summary: Prince Rhaegar Targaryen was the firstborn son of King Aerys II Targaryen and his sister-wife, Queen Rhaella. As heir-apparent, he was the Prince of Dragonstone and crown prince for the Iron Throne. Rhaegar was popular with the smallfolk during his lifetime, but he died in Robert's Rebellion which was triggered in part by his abduction of Lyanna Stark. He was slain in single combat by Robert Baratheon at the ruby ford during the Battle of the Trident. Rhaegar was the elder brother of the exiled last members of House Targaryen, Prince Viserys and Princess Daenerys.

name: Sir Grodus
summary: Sir Grodus is the secondary antagonist of Paper Mario: The Thousand Year Door. He is the leader of the X-Nauts, an evil organization who wants to summon the Shadow Queen via the ancient crystal stars so they could conquer the world. While Grodus succeeds in summoning the Shadow Queen, the Shadow Queen rejects him and blasts him away with only his head remaining. Grodus has since reformed, last seen with some X-Nauts and Lord Crump.

name: Lucky Chloe
summary: Ever since her parents brought her to an Expo and exposed her to Japanese culture when she was a child, Lucky Chloe always wanted to be a Pop Idol. With her good looks, she aimed at being the most famous Pop Idol in the world.

name: Buglizard
summary: Buglizard is the Nemetrix’s DNA sample of a Buglizard from the planet Lepidopterra. Buglizard’s species are the natural predators of Lepidopterrans.

name: Umbrain
summary:
Umbrain is a member of the Department of Diplomacy, who acts as the partner, subordinate and second-in-command of Lady Proud. Given that she's a child in elementary school, she's quite childish, tends to complain of work when nothing happens for a while, loses focus easily, and often wants to play. She will, however, do whatever Lady Proud asks, and will protect her however she can, which she's more than capable of thanks to her magic and training. She particularly enjoys rain, sweets and frogs.
One day, Umbrain received a mysterious message concerning an experiment with Artificial Magical Girls in S-City. She accompanied her partner and superior Lady Proud to the city, where she teams up with other magical girls who also received the mysterious message.

name: Hazel Rainart
summary: Hazel Rainart was one of the antagonists of RWBY. Introduced in Volume 4 as a member of Salem's Inner Circle, he was a very calm and reasonable person who would only use violence when it had a clear purpose. However, this all disappeared when in the presence of Ozpin who Hazel held responsible for the death of his sister. While in Ozpin's presence he would go into a murderous rage and was willing to kill anyone who stood in his way.

name: Black Lightning (CW)
summary: Jefferson Pierce is a retired superhero with the ability to harness and control electricity and becomes a principal at Garfield High School. He returns to fighting crime thanks to his daughter and the threat of a star student being recruited by a local gang.

name: Yokai (Big Hero 6)
summary: Professor Robert Callaghan is the main antagonist of the movie; Big Hero 6.

name: Criston Cole
summary: Common-born and the son of the steward to the Lord of Blackhaven, Ser Criston Cole is a skilled knight of Dornish descent. Noble in demeanor, his prowess in battle is unmatched even by that of Prince Daemon Targaryen. When Ser Harrold Westerling was named the Lord Commander of the Kingsguard, Rhaenyra selected Cole to be added to the Kingsguard. However, his allegiance soon changed, and he became the sworn protector of Queen Alicent. When the Hightowers moved to place Aegon on the Iron Throne and Ser Harrold defected, Cole was named Lord Commander.

name: Leatherface (2023 Game)
summary: The butcher of the Family, Leatherface is the most brutal of the group. While he fills a variety of roles around the house, there's one he's particularly proficient at. As a chainsaw-wielding butcher, Leatherface proves to be the most deadly obstacle for the Victims.

name: Titan (DOOM)
summary: The Titans (Or Thrall) are an incredibly large species of Demon from the DOOM Series. Serving as both carriers and combatants to the forces of Hell, and up to over 1000 feet tall, they are among the strongest Demon species, and can only be neutralized by Crucible blades.

name: Fuuga Haan
categories: How a Realist Hero Rebuilt the Kingdom
summary: Fuuga Haan is King of the small country of Malmkhitan.

name: Nemu Kurotsuchi
summary: Nemu Kurotsuchi (涅 ネム, Kurotsuchi Nemu?), formerly known as Nemuri Nanagō (眠七號?, Sleeping Number 7), was the lieutenant of the 12th Division of the Gotei 13 formally serving under her father Captain Mayuri Kurotsuchi.

name: J.J. McQuade
summary: Jim "J.J." McQuade is an infamous Texas Ranger and a former Marine. He works in El Paso and is known for his "lone wolf attitude" for working alone. Although he was initially hesitant when he was assigned a new partner, Deputy Arcadio "Kayo" Ramos, he accepted his help when his daughter Sally was attacked after witnessing an Army convoy heist.

name: Brain of Cthulhu
summary: The Brain of Cthulhu is a gigantic brain found in the Crimson. It appears once three Crimson Hearts have been smashed.

name: Carmine Esclados
summary: Carmine Esclados is a character from RWBY: After the Fall. She is a veteran Huntress hailing from Shade Academy who was active in Vacuo, but was revealed to be a member of The Crown. She serves as the main antagonist of RWBY: After the Fall along with her partner Bertilak Celadon.

name: Serial Designation V
summary: Serial Designation V-X00100000, or simply known as V, is the tritagonist of Murder Drones.

name: Kim Cheong Wol
summary: Kim Cheong Wol is a part of the Headquarters and is considered to be one of the strongest. She is considered to be on the same level as Choi Sun-Jae.

name: Doodlebob
summary: Doodlebob is a minor antagonist in Spongebob Squarepants. Once made by Spongebob for fun, he made in the process a new being that attacked him and Patrick for noticing them as potential threats.

name: Lincoln Burrows
summary: Lincoln Burrows is an innocent man, he was sentenced to death in Fox River State Penitentiary after being set-up for killing the vice president's brother. Michael Scofield, Lincoln's younger brother, formed an elaborate plan to break him out of prison.

name: Venatosaurus
summary: Venatosaurus is a fictional genus of fiercely intelligent pack-hunting dromaeosaurid dinosaur that appeared in the 2005 film King Kong.

name: Beelzebub (Helltaker)
summary: Beelzebub is an ancient demon who was sealed by other demons years ago into the Abyss, a realm of darkness where death does not exist. She acts as the narrator of the Helltaker's story.

name: Sixshot (IDW)
summary: Before the war, Sixshot attended a rally held by Megatron as the Decepticon movement was gathering speed. Megatron Origin #3 When the planet subsequently plunged into all-out warfare, Sixshot distinguished himself as one of the single-most powerful Decepticons, with armature composed of metals drawn from core of a black hole and a power core consisting of a "self-regenerating dark matter fission cell" making him an untiring, unrelenting force of utter destruction. At some point, he underwent the same ununtrium coating process already applied to Black Shadow and Heretech, and thus became one of the Warriors Elite. Starscream spoke out in fear of the power Sixshot commanded, but Megatron was not foolish, having had the six-changer fitted with a secret "off switch" that could shut him down if need be. Sixshot fought alongside the other Warriors Elite in the Battle for Hell's Point and once commanded a Worldsweeper during the war.

name: Darnell (Friday Night Funkin')
summary: Darnell is the main antagonist of WeekEnd 1 (or Due Debts) in Friday Night Funkin.

name: Toucannon
summary: Toucannon is a Normal/Flying type Pokémon introduced in Generation VII.

name: Popeye (Popeye's Voyage)
summary: Popeye, based on the original, is the main protagonist of Popeye's Voyage: The Quest for Pappy, a Christmas special created to coincide with the 75th anniversary of the Popeye the Sailor comic strip.

name: Kayneth El-Melloi Archibald
summary: Kayneth El-Melloi Archibald (ケイネス・エルメロイ・アーチボルト, Keinesu Erumeroi Āchiboruto) is the Master of Lancer during the Fourth Holy Grail War, alongside his fiancee, Sola-Ui Nuada-Re Sophia-Ri. He is a renowned magus from the Mage's Association, bearing an ancient lineage and a highly-tuned magical skillset. He enters the Holy Grail War with glory in mind, seeking to win fame by fighting other famously skilled magi and heroes of legend.

name: Winnie the Pooh (Blood and Honey)
categories: Winnie the Pooh: Blood and Honey
summary: Winnie the Pooh was a crossbreed bear-human who befriended Christopher Robin. After Christopher Robin left for college, Pooh and his friends came to hate him and humans in general for abandoning them. They began killing and feeding on humans.

name: Phoenix Empress
summary: Phoenix Empress was a fire Phoenix and the Matriarch of the Phoenix clan. Among the 36 Cave Heavens and 72 Paradises, the Phoenix Clan ranks second among the Cave Heavens, serving as one of the heads and most prominent force. Alongside the previous Dragon Emperor and 33 Ninth Rank Open Heaven Cultivators, she died protecting the 3000 Worlds from the Ink Clan's invasion in the Spatial Territory.

name: Leon (Final Fantasy II)
summary: Leon, or Leonhart, is one of the playable characters in Final Fantasy II. He is an ally but he also serves as the secondary antagonist throughout the game as the Emperor's Dark Knight.

name: Doctor Fate (Injustice)
summary: Dr. Fate is a playable character and fallen Superhero from Injustice 2.

name: Eko Yonekura
categories: Classmate, Kamimura Yuuka wa Kou Itta
summary: Eko is a female student who Takechiyo bumps into one day while running in the hallway. According to him, she's supposedly known as an ace athlete helping out in the athletic clubs. She claims to be a normal person similar to the way Yuuka did. She is usually seen with her long hair tied up in twin tails like Yuuka sometimes does with her hair.

name: Noodle Monster (Tasty Planet)
summary: The Noodle Monster is an enemy in Tasty Planet Forever that chases the player in the second-to-last part of Grey Goo's final level. It is the third largest being to even be featured in the franchise, only behind the Turtles of Time and Grey Goo

name: Thanos (Marvel vs. Capcom)
summary: Thanos is a primary antagonist from the Marvel vs. Capcom series. Born an Eternal on the moon known as Titan, Thanos is a nihilist, despising all living things to the point of continuously enacting slaughter and destruction. This mindset led him to becoming obsessed with Mistress Death, the woman he views as his one true love. Thanos gave himself cybernetic enhancements which granted him the physicality to surpass his fellow Eternals, which only marked the beginning of his quest to impress the woman of his dreams.

name: Ashen
summary: Ashen is one of the many potential crew members who aid the captain on their voyage. She fills the role of Guard Captain during her time. Her quest is to kill the perennials, in particular, the one who goes by the name G.

name: The Cosmic Imagination
summary: The Cosmic Imagination, also known as The Cosmic Mind or simply The Multiverse is the sentient Multiverse that governs all of creation. Very little is known of the entity, however what we do know is that it is the source of all magic throughout the cosmos as all magic is channeling its power. It is said that any being that channels its power can gain the ability to control reality itself.

name: Wilson (Bendy and the Ink Machine)
summary: Wilson Arch is one of the main antagonist of Bendy and the Dark Revival. He brings Audrey to the The Cycle with the attempt to ultimately destroy the Ink Demon, but he failed and became  the cartoon monster that he created.
abilities: Real World
Cycle Realm

name: Bun (Kamon Kentarou)
summary: "Bun" is the given name to the "Damemon", a glitched Digimon who is also the partner Digimon of Kamon Kentarou. Bun isn't particularly intelligent (but most Digimon within the "C'mon Digimon" continuity don't appear to be), but he is a very sweet and determined dog-like Digimon who will defend his master.

name: Goemon Ishikawa
summary: Goemon Ishikawa XIII is the thirteenth generation of renegade samurai, a descendant of the historical figure Ishikawa Goemon. He is usually quiet and participates in Lupin III's exploits less frequently than Jigen. Despite being treated as only a samurai, Goemon has had a Ninja sensei. Having been taught the training of a master ninja is likely the reason behind his willingness to find thievery and assassination as an acceptable practice, in spite of his samurai ways.

name: The Protagonist (Sifu)
summary: The unnamed protagonist of Sifu is the student and child of the sifu in charge of their dojo. One night, a former student breaks into the dojo alongside his gang and kills everyone inside, including sifu and his child, who was hiding in a cupboard. After being revived by an ancient pendant, the child spent their next 8 years training in the ways of Pak Mei, hellbent on avenging their father.

name: The Nightmare
summary: Even while he lived, Freddy Krueger was a creature of a nightmare for those who truly knew him. Hiding behind a mask of warmth and friendliness, Freddy’s actual temperament was known only to his victims. When those victims were finally heard, the parents of Springwood tracked Freddy down and took the law into their own hands. They thought that fire had rid them of a monster that night, that their children were finally safe, but evil as strong as he has a way of surviving. Years passed, the horror was buried, the victims mercifully forgot. Then, somehow, Freddy returned, and dreams became nightmares once again. Freddy focused his anger on those he felt had wronged him, building up to his one true obsession, Nancy Holbrook. But he underestimated her strength and resourcefulness. Together with her friend Quentin, she managed to weaken Freddy, mutilating him and leaving him for dead once more.

name: Peely
summary: Peely is one of many characters in Fortnite. Peely became a robot in Fortnite's Season X called P-1000. In Season 2, Chapter 2, he becomes an agent named, Agent Peely.

name: Gyro Zeppeli
summary: Gyro Zeppeli, born Julius Caesar Zeppeli, is one of two main protagonists in JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part VII: Steel Ball Run. An Italian doctor and executioner who masters the art of the Spin, he enters the Steel Ball Run race in order to obtain an amnesty for an innocent child marked for execution. Before the race begins, he encounters Johnny Joestar and indulges in teaching him the Spin.

name: Manager (Hotline Miami)
summary: The Manager is a side character and an antagonist in Hotline Miami 2: Wrong Number. He is a man who appears at the beginning of Withdrawal and a second time if you manage to not die as Jake on the 3rd floor of Withdrawal. He is the main antagonist of Jake's storyline.

name: Lancelot (Last Round Arthurs)
summary: Lancelot is the most famous Knight of the Round Table, holding the twelfth seat. Known as Lancelot du Lac, he is widely known by his bravery and strength, and his feats of defeating fellow knights and slaying giants and dragons. However, he's more infamously known for causing the fall of Camelot due to his adulterous romance with Guinevere. Like the other knights, his soul was summoned to act as the vassal of one of the eleven descendants participating in the King Arthur Succession Battle. Widely considered by modern society as one of the strongest knights of the Round Table, Lancelot is Souma Gloria Kujou's Jack.

name: Akane Kiryu & The Azami Doll
summary: Akane Kiryu is a hostile female spirits in Fatal Frame II: Crimson Butterfly. She and the doll in the image of her sister Azami together are a single ghost. Akane was made to sacrifice her own sister in the Crimson Sacrifice Ritual. In order to help Akane cope with her feelings of tremendous guilt following the ritual, her father made her a doll in the image of Azami. Akane became so attached to the doll, whispering to it as if it were indeed her sister, that a spirit possessed it and began to control her. Azami's spirit warned her father in a dream and tasked him with destroying the doll, but before he was able to do so the doll possessed Akane and made her strangle her father to death. Following that the spirit stole Akane's soul.

name: Carla (Def Jam Vendetta)
summary: Carla appears in Club Luda, where she greets the protagonist's girlfriend, who expresses her boredom of him. They both leave him behind to find someone better.

name: Wang Dora
summary: Wang Dora (王ドラ, Wan Dora) is one of the holders of the "Best friend Telecard" and a member of The Doraemons.

name: Ygritte
summary: Ygritte is a woman of the Free Folk who lives north of the Wall. She is part of Mance Rayder's army and becomes the lover of Jon Snow.

name: The Protagonist (Spooky's Jump Scare Mansion)
summary: The Protagonist is a history enthusiast that lives in a town near Spooky's house, which is a local mystery. One day they decided to venture into the house to discover its backstory. Even when faced with the many horrors that the house's cute façade conceals, they remain determined, always moving forward.

name: Ghogo
summary: Ghogo (ゴーゴ) is a fairy kaiju created by Toho that first appeared in the 1997 Toho film, Rebirth of Mothra II.

name: Yuri Shanbaraya
categories: Marriage Hunting of The Legendary Brave

name: Casey Jones (TMNT 1990 film)
summary: Casey Jones is a supporting character in the first and third movies based on the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles comics

name: Morphe and Phoebe
summary: Abandoned by her parents, this despairing Dreamweaver endured a reality far worse than any nightmare. Fearing that others would manipulate her once more; she used her powers to drag others into a nightmare of their own imaginings. Having found forgiveness for her actions, Oneiros now seeks personal redemption.

name: Luxord
summary: Luxord, the Gambler of Fate (運命を賭す者 Unmei o Tosumono?), is Rank X within the original Organization XIII. He possesses the power of time manipulation and uses his ability to force his opponents to play timed games, with unfortunate consequences if they cannot learn the rules and lose. He commands the Gambler Nobodies.

name: Superman (Donnerverse)
summary: Superman is the protagonist of the movies Superman, Superman II, Superman III, Superman IV and Superman Returns.

name: Kay (Last Round Arthurs)
summary: Kay is King Arthur's adoptive sister and one of the Knights of the Round Table, holding the third seat. Like the other knights, her soul was summoned to act as the vassal of one of the eleven descendants participating in the King Arthur Succession Battle. She is Luna Artur's Jack. Although considered to be the weakest member of the Round Table, Kay was an invaluable asset to Arthur's reign due to her administrative work as his secretary of state.

name: Black Vulture Mutant
summary: Black Vulture Mutant is a hostile character that tends to inhabit forests and wooded areas. Is cataloged as a "High-level Mutant" and is one of the primary antagonists of LifeAfter. Black Vulture Mutant is a tribute to Trevor Henderson Mythos' most famous character Siren Head.

name: Adolf Reinhard
summary: Adolf Reinhard (アドルフ・ラインハルト, Adorufu Rainharuto) is a German man and a former cavy for the U-NASA. Being with the U-NASA from a very young age, Adolf quickly became an officer and joined the Annex Project to find a cure for the deadly A.E. virus that afflicts the Earth.

name: Sora (Higher Than The Sky)
summary: Sora is the main protagonist of the manga, Higher Than The Sky.

name: Ares (Kaijin no Karsheel)
categories: Kaijin no Karashrer ~What a Beautiful Sanctuary~
summary: Ares (アレス) was an antagonist of Kaijin no Karashrer ~What a Beautiful Sanctuary~, a Cyber Zombie that rose along with many others after the end of that world for the purpose of killing all life that had survived.

name: Kamen Rider Na-Go
summary: Neon Kurama (鞍馬 祢音, Kurama Neon?) is the tertiary protagonist of Kamen Rider Geats. As a child from a wealthy family, she had found herself in an abusive and controlling household, disillusioning her of the rich lifestyle and causing her to yearn for a more simple life where she's genuinely loved by the people around her. Due to such a desire, she has been approached to participate in the Desire Grand Prix as Kamen Rider Na-Go (仮面ライダーナーゴ, Kamen Raidā Nā-Go?), where she would be one of the key players across multiple DGP games.

name: Ultraman Powered
summary: Ultraman Powered is an alien belonging to Nebula M78, an organization dedicated to upholding peace in the Galaxy.In pursuit of the Alien Baltans who sought to subdue the Universe, he transformed into a red orb and flew to Earth, landing in the outskirts of Los Angeles, USA. Kai Kenichi came to investigate the orb, where Ultraman Powered asked for his help. Powered fused with Kai, and after defeating the threat of Alien Baltan and protecting humanity, he decides to stay on Earth until he can be sure it is truly safe.
abilities: Ultra Physiology Enhanced Senses (His Powered Ear can pinpoint the location of enemies that use teleportation [ 1 ] )
Enhanced Senses (His Powered Ear can pinpoint the location of enemies that use teleportation [ 1 ] )
Enhanced Temperature Manipulation (Can fire the Mega Spacium Beam which is 100 million degrees Celsius [ 2 ] )
Absorption & Attack Reflection (Can absorb enemy attacks, amplify them multiple times, and then send them back [ 1 ] . Capable of reflecting energy attacks via Energy Reverse [ 3 ] )

Gravity Manipulation & Statistics Amplification ( By amplifying the "anti-gravity field" around his body, Powered can increase gravity by hundreds of times, which significantly increases the power of his flying kick [ 2 ] )
Enhanced Senses (His Powered Ear can pinpoint the location of enemies that use teleportation [ 1 ] )

name: Zaktan
summary: Zaktan is the leader of the rogue Dark Hunters known as the Piraka. Mutated into a form composed of countless microscopic beings following an encounter with the Shadowed One, he lead the Piraka to Voya Nui in search of the Legendary Mask of Life.

name: Swimming Alien
summary: The Swimming Alien was a large Xenomorph that is at least primarily aquatic and was encountered by USCMC personnel on Bracken's World. All Xenomorphs can swim, but since these Xenomorphs have no legs and only a lobster-like tail fan and three pairs of pleopods to propel them, it can be said they swim better than their terrestrial cousins.

name: Alpha (TOME)
summary: Alpha is one of the five members of the Dandy Alliance on TOME, of the Fighter class, with abilities based on Greek Mythology. He also obtained the Forbidden Power during Episode 1 which takes the form of a static field around him with the ability to speak. It seems to only talk to Alpha and causes pain to other players in the real world. As of Episode 10, the Forbidden Power was removed from Alpha, only to be remerged with it back in Episode 15.

name: Sister Dagger (Marvel Comics)
summary: One of the many daughters of the sorcerer and crimelord Zheng Zu, Zheng Esme was raised in the House of the Deadly Dagger outside of Paris, France, eventually becoming its Champion, Sister Dagger. When Sister Hammer named herself as the new Supreme Commander of the Five Weapons Society over its rightful successor, Shang-Chi, Sister Dagger and Brother Sabre approached their half-brother to usurp Hammer. Shang-Chi reluctantly joined them to free his remaining family from his father's cult.

name: Bambina
summary: "Monkey King" Bambina is a Kintamandrill, one of the Eight Kings of the Gourmet World, who rules Area 7 with a chaotic and carefree attitude.

name: Butcher (Shadow Fight)
summary: Butcher is one of the antagonists of the Old Wounds story of Shadow Fight 2: Special Edition and Shadow Fight 2. He is a bestial and cruel bandit leader who has misled children into joining his cult, turning them into madmen and building his private army. He thinks that love makes one weak and that pain reveals one's true self and brings freedom and happiness, a belief he applies to his children. He is responsible for the murders of his children's birth parents and only seeks to use them to achieve his goals. At the start of Shadow Fight 2, Butcher got possessed by a Shadow Demon that was released from the Gates of Shadows, so he turned evil. His goal was to bring chaos to his realm, to prepare it for Titan's arrival, while also preventing Shadow from closing the Gates of Shadows with his Red Seal.

name: Mysterious Heroine XX
summary: Foreigner (フォーリナー, Fōrinā?) is a Foreigner-Class Servant who is playable in Fate/Grand Order. She first appears in the Servant Summer Festival event. Her real identity is Mysterious Heroine XX, the grown up version of Mysterious Heroine X. Having come back to Earth on paid leave, MHXX is a space cop who hunts Foreigners and Sabers.

name: Chaos Spirit King
summary: The Chaos Spirit King is a member of the unique Chaos Race that exists within the Universe Furnace. They form their bodies from Chaos and all have an instinctive nature to pursue the Best Quality Open Heaven Pill, to become a Chaos Spirit King.

name: Undead Giant
summary: The Undead Giant is a Chalice Dungeon boss in Bloodborne. The face of this miserable being reveals similarities with both Church Giants and Church Servants, suggesting that all these towering creatures belong to the same unholy kind; its face is the only clue about this connection because the rest of its body is twisted and rotten beyond recognition due to the crude surgery that grafted blades and firearms to its arms. The term "Undead" hints that some strange magic (Namely the one that comes from the Great Ones) is the only force that keeps this behemoth alive.

name: Tetrax Shard
summary: Tetrax Shard was a Petrosapien mercenary, now changed into a remover of evil in the Milky Way.

name: Mr. Wood (American Gods)
summary: Mr. Wood was an Old God of Trees and Forests, implied to be a deity of native-american Animism. As the american forests were ravaged and the trees were destroyed, he sold himself to the New Gods, and became the New God of Wood Furniture.

name: Sho Fukamachi
summary: Sho Fukamachi is the main protagonist of Bio-Booster Armor Guyver series. He is a second-year student of Narisawa high school and the host of the first Guyver Unit activated, known as Guyver I.

name: Sentinel Prime (Transformers One)
summary: Sentinel Prime is the initial antagonist of the film Transformers One. Beloved by the citizens of Iacon city, Sentinel proclaims himself as the savior of Cybertron, and the last of the Thirteen Primes, having been the only Prime to survive the war against the Quintessons. He is highly respected by everyone within Iacon, especially by D-16, who seeks to impress Sentinel and to one day earn his approval.

name: Bijinder
summary: Mari, also known as Bijinder (ビジンダー, Bijindā) is an agent of SHADOW, designed to assassinate Ichiro. Various circumstances though, ultimately led to Mari defecting from SHADOW, becoming Ichiro's ally.

name: Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm
summary: Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm is an enemy in Elden Ring.

name: Mary Sera
summary: Mary Sera (メアリー 世良, Mearī Sera), is an APTX 4869 Victim who is also known by her marriage name Mary Akai (赤井 メアリー, Akai Mearī) and appears as a middle-school age girl with light hair who has been hiding in various hotels with Masumi Sera, is a supporting character in the manga and anime franchise Detective Conan. She is a member of the British Secret Intelligence Service, often known as MI6.

name: Shirabe
summary: Shirabe is one of Tertium's Ministra Magi and a member of Cosmo Entelecheia. She is a tree-spirit demi-human, as well as one of the only survivors of her tribe after humans hunted all the others down. When Shirabe was found and about to be killed by hunters, Fate arrived to save her, and she joined his cause.

name: Yvraine
summary: Yvraine, known as the Emissary of Ynnead, the Daughter of Shades, the Opener of the Seventh Way, the Herald of the Whispering God, amongst numerous other titles and epithets, is the High-Priestess of Ynnead, the leader of the Ynnari, and the mortal vessel for the God of the Dead's power and will. Since her ascension, Yvraine has become an inspirational figure, a promise of hope for the dying Eldar race, a promise of Rebirth to the ancient days of glory, and the final destruction of She Who Thirsts. But she has also become symbol of destruction, seen by many as a deluded fanatic who is leading all Eldar into their doom, her name inspiring both dread and revulsion. Neither side is truly correct, not completely wrong, and whether Yvraine will succeed or not in her ambitions of saving her people remains to be seen.

name: Klothys
summary: Klothys is the God of Fate and Destiny on Theros. Long ago, the titans had been sealed away in the Underworld by the combined might of the gods, and it was Klothys who volunteered to serve as their eternal jailer. While Erebos ruled his realm beyond death, Klothys acted as an eternal seal to ensure the titans remained imprisoned.

name: Palkia
summary: Palkia is a Water/Dragon-type Pokémon and a member of Sinnoh's Creation Trio. The Master of Space, it stabilizes the fabric of reality with its every breath, and its power has led it to be deified by Sinnoh's residents.

name: Cyborg (Smallville)
summary: Victor Stone was just star high school football player, when he was in a car accident, that killed his entire family. Critically injured, he taken and experimented on by Lex Luthor's SynTechnic program, and was given cybernetic body parts. After escaping, he eventually joins the Justice League, as one of its founding members.

name: B2 Grapple Droid
summary: The B2 Grapple Droid were a variant of the B2 super battle droid model which was designed for close-range combat. These droids were notably used during the battle over Coruscant on the Invisible Hand and in the Battle of Ord Mantell.

name: Hitori Tachibana
summary: Hitori Tachibana is the main protagonist of the manga, Oniwakamaru The Visitor.

name: Fenghuang
summary: Fenghuang is one of the main antagonists of the Nickelodeon series Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness.
