She was a member of the Furious Five prior to the current one, and was by far the strongest of the five, being personally trained by Oogway. Due to her sheer strength, she became dark and thought that she deserved to be the master of the Jade Palace. To this end, she challenged Oogway, but quickly fled after she found out that she was not only not a match for the old tortoise, but that he had predicted her fall and prepared an owl shaped cage to restrain her in. Many years later, she finds Po climbing up a mountain far away from civilization. From him, she finds out that Oogway has passed and that Shifu is now the master of the Jade Palace. She then seizes this opportunity and attacks the Jade Palace, forcing Po to return and defeat her once and for all.

name: Ishmael (Blood)
summary: Gabriella (last name unknown) is a supporting character from the Blood franchise, briefly appearing in the first game before returning to play a more major role in Blood II: The Chosen. Originally a circus performer prior to joining the Cabal, Ishmael's calling came in the form of Tchernobog himself, who appeared to him in a picture in his dressing room bearing a message. The dark god's was an offer, an instruction to kill the circus staff and come to his side. Having engaged in cult work in the past, an induction into the ranks of the Cabal was natural to him, and soon enough he found himself rising to become one of the Chosen, Tchernobog's elite generals.

name: Yama (One Piece)
summary: The Commander of Enel's Divine Soldiers who moves lightly despite his great size. Yama is fanatically loyal to Enel to the point he will even reprimand The Priests if he feels like they’re being disrespectful in his god’s presence. He also has no interest in the past. During his fight with Robin, he kept mercilessly destroying the ancient ruins, thus earning her wrath and spurring her to defeat him.

name: Superman (Post-Crisis)
summary: Superman is one of the most powerful beings on Earth and its greatest hero. Born to the illustrious House of El, Kal-El is one of the last surviving members of his race as his planet was destroyed not long after his birth. He was found and raised by Jonathan and Martha Kent in Smallville, Kansas. Raised with high moral ideals, he uses his incredible strength, speed, flight and various other superpowers to fight evil and protect the innocent as a symbol of heroism and justice. In his civilian identity he is Clark Kent, a mild-mannered reporter working for the Daily Planet in Metropolis. Superman is also a founding member of the Justice League of America and a charter member of the Legion of Superheroes in the 30th Century.
abilities: Abilities
Resistances

name: The Hunter (Hollow Knight)
summary: The Hunter is a character in Hollow Knight. He gifts the Hunter's Journal, a bestiary detailing all enemies in Hallownest. The Hunter tries to kill any living being he can find, which he does only for his own sake, believing this to be the nature of the Hunt. In addition to this, he attempts to eat certain creatures, even Infected ones, though he does not like the taste of those.

name: Blair Dame
summary: Blair Dame (ブレア・デイム Burea Deimu) is the daughter of a wealthy European family, taking has taken up martial arts as a way to defend herself and those she cares about. She is a free spirit, wishing to travel the world. Eventually, she was allowed to, under the condition that a bodyguard stay by her side. During her travels, she became a close companion of Pullum Purna.

name: Black Canary (Dinah Drake) (CW)
summary: Captain Dinah Drake, formerly known undercover as Tina Boland, is a meta-human vigilante. She was an undercover detective for the Central City Police Department, until her partner and boyfriend, Vincent Sobel, was murdered. She sought revenge for his death after becoming a meta-human due to the S.T.A.R. Labs particle accelerator explosion with the power to produce sonic screams.

name: Dana Ananga Jagannatha
summary: Dana Ananga Jagannatha is a Noble Vampire and the Witch of the Rift, an extraordinarily powerful and mischievous individual with great insight into the nature of time and parallel realities. She is the mentor of Evangeline A.K. McDowell and, later Touta Konoe, to help him master the paradoxical nature of his powers.

name: Flamegirl
summary: Flamegirl, sometimes called "Flamey", is one of the five members of the Dandy Alliance in TOME, a Spellcaster with the power of fire. Unbeknownst to her, the antivirus program - or "Purple Flame" - to cure the Forbidden Power had been attached to her character model in Episode 3, which was the power source of the Dragon Bug. This made her the only person able to stop the Power's influence on Alpha and later put her at risk of brain death when the Flame was used by Rubirules to try and control SOFDTI.

name: Phantylia
summary: Phantylia (不死の神実・幻朧, Fushi no Kamibi - Genrō?) is a Heliobus who serves the Aeon of Destruction Nanook, and one of the current seven Lord Ravagers and Overlords of the Antimatter Legion. She is known for favoring the internal and self-destruction of mortals. She infiltrated the Xianzhou Luofu to revive the Ambrosial Arbor and start a civil war, but was defeated.
abilities: Physical Form
Heliobus Form

name: Kurse (Marvel Comics)
summary: Algrim the Strong was once one of the mightiest and strongest Dark Elves to have served under Malekith the Accursed. During Thor's rescue of Lorelei at the hands of Malekith, Algrim ambushed Thor in order to defeat him. As they were fighting, Malekith opened a chasm under them that led to a pit of molten lava. Thor managed to fly back to safety but Algrim fell into the magma, kept alive by the enchanted armor he wore at the time but suffered agonizing pain. He was rendered an amnesiac, not remembering the real reason why he fell into the lava. The only thing he kept in his mind was that Thor was to blame and developed a seething hatred for him. The Beyonder sensed this hatred and performed an experiment where he restored Algrim to full health, remodeled his armor and made it a part of him, and increased his strength to untold levels, all just to see what he would do. This new being, now called Kurse, had a single personal goal, to kill Thor.

name: Grayfia Lucifuge
summary: Grayfia comes from the House of Lucifuge, a family of Pure-Blooded Devils from the Extra Demons whose family served under the original Lucifer. Grayfia was originally from the Old Satan Faction that opposed the Anti-Satan Faction, where she stood in the front lines as one of the most powerful Devils. It was during that time that she met Sirzechs and fell in love with him. The two of them married each other after the end of the conflict between the Old Satan Faction and the Anti-Satan Faction, eventually giving birth to a son.

name: Lucifer (Hazbin Hotel)
summary: Lucifer Morningstar is a fallen angel and a supporting character in Hazbin Hotel.

name: Taiju Shiba
summary: Taiju Shiba is the leader of the 10th generation Black Dragon. He is a very tall and muscular man with long blue and white hair and yellow eyes. He has multiple tribal tattoos all over his neck and chest and cursive tattoos below them. Taiju is also religious and has a giant cross tattoo on his back. He is the eldest of the three Shiba siblings and since they lacked a parental figure he took the position and used violence on his siblings as it is the only way he knows how to show his love. After beating Inupi he accepts his request and agrees to revive the Black Dragons, becoming the leader of the 10th generation.

name: Biolizard
summary: The Biolizard (バイオリザード Baiorizādo) is the final boss of Sonic Adventure 2, the original prototype of the Ultimate Life Form created by Professor Gerald Robotnik in his first attempt to create Project Shadow (プロジェクトシャドウ Purojekuto Shadō).

name: Sid (Ice Age)
summary: Sidney, known more commonly as Sid, is one of the main protagonists of the Ice Age franchise. He is a ground sloth who was part of a herd of different animals after a number of adventures and experiences brought them all together.

name: Reflejo
summary: Reflejo was a Regular and a former Fisherman. He spent thousands of years in the E-rank levels hiding as a sleeper agent for FUG. He joined Viole and offered his services to him, along with the fake Thorn. It is later revealed that Reflejo was sent by Poken to keep Viole under control and ensure that he is turned into a weapon.

name: Marcus Corvinus
summary: Marcus Corvinus was a member of the Corvinus Clan, the progenitor of the entire Vampire species, as well as a Vampire Elder. He was the main antagonist of Underworld: Evolution, along with his twin brother William Corvinus, the first Werewolf. He is one of the sons of Alexander Corvinus.

name: Maestro (Doctor Who)
summary: ‘Maestro’ is a God from Doctor Who (2024), played by Jinkx Monsoon, who first appeared in ‘The Devil's Chord’ and acts as a member of the ‘Pantheon of Discord’. They are the child of the Toymaker, as well as the living embodiment of ‘Music’.

name: Arachnids (Primeval)
summary: Brought to the present day by an anomaly, these dog-sized Arachnids are found in the Carboniferous era, forming large colonies in underground lairs. Taking up residence in the New Forest subway system, they are at first blamed for several deaths of community workers, until the Arthropleura is discovered as the true culprit.

name: Jogo
summary: Jogo (漏瑚, Jōgo?) is a character in Jujutsu Kaisen. He is a Cursed Spirit and one of the main antagonists of the series. Jogo has immense pride as a Cursed Spirit and a passionate hatred for humans. He believes that Curses are the actual humans as they represent pure truths of life, such as hatred, while normal humans fake many positive emotions and should be exterminated.

name: Bael (Bloodstained)
summary: Bael the King of Demons. Summoned by Dominique and Gremory's plan, he was stopped swiftly by Miriam.

name: Sailor Mars (Manga)
summary: Rei Hino (火野 レイ, Hino Rei) is the civilian identity and present-day incarnation of Sailor Mars (セーラーマーズ, Seera Maazu). She is a shrine priestess who lives at Hikawa Shrine with her Grandfather and the crows Phobos and Deimos. She is one of the five original Inner Sailor Guardians of the Solar System and was the third Sailor Guardian introduced in the manga. Her attacks are based around fire, psychic powers and spiritual powers. This is the original depiction of the character created by Naoko Takeuchi.
abilities: Original Form
Complete Form
Student
Miko

name: Corrupted Monk
summary: Corrupted Monk (real name Yao) (破戒僧, Depraved Monk) is a boss in Sekiro and a reappearing minor antagonist. She guards the Vermillion Bridge that leads to the Fountainhead Palace, while her spiritual form protects the shivering stone from non-Mibu villagers. She is also one of the infested, granting her immortality.

name: Alice Margatroid
summary: Alice Margatroid is one of only a few people known to live within the Forest of Magic. She's a magician known primarily for her skillful use of dolls as well as being a loner. She gets in many fights with Marisa, but they are somewhat acquaintances, sharing many of the same interests and even teaming up at times.

name: Proto-Moguera
summary: In this series, Moguera is one of Beisuke Jinguji's mechas, along with Jet Jaguar (and his two variants) and Mechagodzilla. A prototype of the mech, dubbed Proto-Moguera (プロトモゲラ Puroto Mogera) and bearing the Showa design, was ultimately stolen by Zagreth after Black Mechagodzilla was captured by G-Guard. Proto-Moguera was sent retreating into space with Zagreth after Torema piloted the superior Mechagodzilla against it.

name: Hybrid Destroyer
summary: The Hybrid Destroyer is a type of Hybrid, monstrous creations of Zerg and Protoss material and genetics. Created to serve as leaders in Amon's army, this Hybrid is terrifyingly intelligent and deadly. This creature is more focused on its psionic power rather than its physical form, though it is not frail. Its psionic abilities come from its design favoring its Protoss half over its Zerg half. With incredible psionic abilities, a massive, glowing form, and radiating energy, a Hybrid Destroyer is one of the most dangerous creatures in the StarCraft universe.

name: Gai Usui
summary: Gai Usui is a character from Cardfight!! Vanguard and wields a deck from the Dimension Police clan. He is a member of Team Caesar, consisting of himself, his older sister Yuri Usui and their leader Kenji Mitsusada. His team was the previous National Champions of Japan before being defeated by Ren Suzugamori's Team Asteroid. His Avatar Unit is Super Dimensional Robo Daiyusha.

name: Ripto
summary: Ripto is a primary antagonist and one of Spyro's notorious enemies in the Spyro series. He is a short Dinosaur that despises dragons like Spyro and is mostly followed by his two minions, Crush and Gulp, who serve him and try to carry out his orders.

name: Uno (Digimon)
summary: Uno is a member of the Bandits, a trio who were part of the mysterious organizaton, the Selectors. He and his comrades were originally Union Tamers who created a Defrag program to protect the Digital World. But, in doing so, it caused the Ancient Tree to go into a bad state, turning them into "Digimon-like Beings" who served as prototypes to the Erasers.

name: Victoria (Hero Killer)
summary: Victoria is one of the elders of the Hero Clan, and she is known to be one of the strongest heroes. In the past, she defeated Engen, although he claims that they share the same goal of defeating the Steel Witch.

name: Monkey Khan
summary: Monkey Khan, originally named Ken Khan, is a character that appears in the Sonic the Hedgehog comic series and its spin-offs published by Archie Comics.

name: Witch Queen (The Last Witch Hunter)
summary: The Witch Queen (sometimes spelled "Witch-Queen") is the main antagonist of the 2015 supernatural action film The Last Witch Hunter. She was the absolute ruler of all witches who cursed the warrior Kaulder with immortality before seemingly being defeated at his hands.

name: Fukua
summary: One of Brain Drain's less-socially-acceptable hobbies is cloning, and often he forces the souls of dead warriors to inhabit these clones. Fukua is the result of a fortunate - or unfortunate - Lab Zero accident: a union of two souls. One, a once-proud warrior known for her brute strength in close combat; the other a silent assassin who specialized in ranged weapons for her kills. Together as one, Fukua possesses the best of both specialties... but relationships formed under intense circumstances often don't last.
abilities: Thinning Shears: Sticks her arm out and her hair turns into gator teeth and bites down.
Ariel Rave: Flips her hair up and it launches on hit.
Buzz Cut: Makes a spinning saw out of hair that wraps around her whole torso like a hula hoop.
Chompadour: Makes pigtails out of her hair and then uses them both to swing straight up.
Queue Sting: Makes a scorpion tail and stabs out in front of her.
Salon Treatment: Makes all kinds of knives, tools and accessories out of her hair and they all hit at once.
Knee High: Light front kick.
Ankle Sock: Small tap with her foot.
Thigh High: Kicks upward.
Fukua sets mode +k: Turns backwards and performs a back kick.
French Twist: Leans back on her arm and makes a small pose while her hair makes a puddle on the floor and drills the opposing foot for a few hits.
Bounce and Volume: Kicks downward, then a strand of hair covers her foot and bites down on the opponent.
Samson Boot: Uses her hair to lift her up and then launches herself forward.
Tread of Hair: Slides across the floor with a spiked foot covered in hair.
Split Ends: Lifts her feet up and makes a large pair of scissors out of her hair and aims them straight down.

name: Blaze (Chronos Ruler)
summary: Blaze is one of Chronos' strongest agents. Though initially hostile to Kiri and Victor as part of the organization's test for them, Blaze took a shine to Kiri after hearing his past and goal of recovering his father's past, becoming an ally to the duo and proclaiming himself to be Kiri's "older brother".

name: Promathia
summary: Promathia (プロマシア, Puromashia?), from Final Fantasy XI, is known as the Twilight God, and is Altana's evil counterpart: faceless, and bound in chains he reportedly bound himself in. His reasons are unknown, but are revealed through the plot of the expansion pack Chains of Promathia.

name: Daniel Park
summary: Daniel Park (박형석 Park Hyung-Seok) is the main protagonist in Lookism. He is a student in the fashion design department of J High School. He has a unique ability in which he has two bodies. If one were to fall asleep, he would end up on the other body. Changing from a worthless individual he changed for the better, fully discovering the concept of lookism as he now lives life between two bodies. Not only that he would be dragged into the great clash between Big Deal, Hostel, K-House, and the Workers.

name: Chien Fu
summary: Chien Fu is an orphan and a student of the Hungtai School. Because he was often mistreated, Pai Chang-tien took him under his wing and trained him in snake style Kung Fu.

name: Galactic Federation Marines
summary: The Galactic Federation was a peaceful organization spread out through the Milky Way Galaxy and comprised of many species, though mostly humans. However, as the threat of the Space Pirates only got worse, the Federation had to create an elite group known as the Federation Marines.

name: Donatello (Coming Out of Their Shells)
summary: Donatello is the brother of Leonardo, Raphael, and Michelangelo. He takes part in helping sing along with his brothers, and fighting against Shredder and his footclan. After Shredder made a machine that was capable of draining their life from their body, Donatello managed to create a device for each of the turtles that made them invisible, and immune to its effects. With the help of his brothers, and asking help from the audience watching, they managed to stop Shredders plan to remove all the music from the world.

name: Red Miller
summary: Red Miller is a lumberjack and recovering alcoholic who lived peacefully in the Shadow Mountains with his girlfriend, Mandy. One day, the two of them are kidnapped by a group of cultists and a demonic biker gang. After being tortured and forced to watch Mandy be burned alive, Red breaks free and enacts revenge on the cult and their accomplices.

name: Chi Qiu Bai
summary: Chi Qiu Bai also know as Eternal Wind Knight was the most talented person on the Xia World before Xue Ying appeared being said to have the best chance to become a Deity. After his wife died and her soul capture by the Great Demonic God, he made a pact with the demonic being to help him capture the Xia World for the revival of his love.

name: Christopher Columbus (Fate)
summary: Rider of the Resistance is a Rider-class Servant who appears in the Agartha singularity in Fate/Grand Order.

name: Anissa (TV Series)
summary: Annisa is a high-ranking Viltrumite warrior and the most powerful female Viltrumite of the Viltrum Empire, dedicated to aiding the Viltrumite mission to make it the only empire in the universe.
abilities: Superhuman Physical Characteristics
True Flight
Martial Arts
Longevity (Anissa is over two thousand years old)
Regeneration (Low-Mid; Comparable to Invincible)
Enhanced Lung Capacity (She should be comparable to Omni-Man who can survive in the vacuum of space for two weeks by holding his breath)

name: Alligator Loki
summary: Alligator Loki is the pseudonym assigned to a counterpart of Earth-616 Loki, accidentally displaced from his universe during a fight between the latter and Thor. The God of Thunder took him in as his pet, regardless of the protests of the Alligator himself. After an initial quarrel with his "human" version, the two realized they have much in common and became partners in crime. Alligator Loki eventually settled down in the new universe, living in the rivers of Asgard or in Thor and Loki's apartment in Midgard.

name: Red Fixer
summary: Red Fixer is a humanoid being part of the Ordeals of White Dawn, White Noon, and White Dusk. Appearing as a sort of armored robot with a red eye at the center, it roams the facility until it counters enemies to attack. It possesses an energy beam weapon and a blade for combat.

name: ODST (Halo)
summary: The ODST (Orbital Drop Shock Trooper) is considered the most elite unit in the UNSC military, behind the Spartan supersoldier. These soldiers are highly trained and very well equipped and use various types of standard ODST armor, one of the strongest non-powered armor systems available to the UNSC. And as the name would suggest ODSTs are able to drop down onto planetary surfaces from orbit via specialized orbital insertion pods launched from a mothership. They can also be dropped down behind enemy lines to conduct covert operations (sometimes under the command of a Spartan) that conventional infantry waves cannot accomplish. In the post Human-Covenant war period, although the supersoldiers of the Spartan IV programme serve well as the UNSC's premier special forces, the ODSTs continue to play their part and the ODST branch even serves as a proving ground for Spartan augmentation candidates.

name: Creeper (Dungeons and Dragons)
summary: Creepers are green, explosive creatures found prowling the Overworld at night. They are evil creatures that seek to explode and destroy anything else, destroying themselves and their targets in one destructive blast. They are known to become even more powerful when struck with lightning, making them an even greater threat.

name: The Abominable Snowman of Pasadena (Book)
summary: The Abominable Snowman of Pasadena is a primate-like creature that lives in the cold regions of Alaska, where it was encased in ice in a cave for a seemingly long period of time. Until it was discovered by Jordon, Nicole and their father Garrison, wanting to make a profit on it they took pictures of it and brought it back to their home in Pasadena, where it eventually broke loose. With it escaping and all evidence of its existence now missing, its current whereabouts are entirely unknown.

name: Forest Lord
summary: The Forest Lords are a very powerful race of creatures of Life Magic. It is very hard to gain their attention, but if a wizard can catch one, the Forest Lord will be in their service.  The Player is one of the very few wizards capable of summoning one.

name: Lotus
summary: Prior to current events of Warframe, Natah was a Sentient drone that was responsible for the fall of the Orokin Empire, a futuristic human society that ruled over the Origin System (soon evolved into the more popularly known Corpus) during the days of the Old War.

name: Barrump Barrump (Krypto the Superdog)
summary: Barrump Barrump is an alien criminal monkey who is known to be the biggest prankster in the galaxy. He enjoys to make fun of others or commit crimes for his own personal amusement.

name: Baby Gargantua (1998 Gargantua)
summary: Baby Gargantua is the main animal protagonist of the 1998 film Gargantua.

name: Arch-vile
summary: The Arch-vile is one of the most formidable enemies in DOOM, serving as a major threat even when encountered by itself. They are seen as 'evil healers' of some sort within the ranks of Hell, reanimating their fellow demons and incinerating those who attempt to stand in their way. Due to their large propensity for attacking anything that disturbs them, they pose just as much of a danger to their comrades as they do to their foes.

name: Medusa (DC Animated Movies)
summary: Medusa was one of the Gorgons, a race of legendary creatures in Greek Mythology, and a deadly enemy of the Amazons. She was once killed by the hero Perseus, but in modern times she was brought back to life by Veronica Cale to serve as Villainy, Inc.'s secret weapon in the invasion of Paradise Island. She betrayed them, however, and tried to destroy the Amazons but was ultimately defeated and killed by Wonder Woman who decapitated her.

name: Zylork
summary: The Zylork is a monster faced by the Troop, appearing as the main antagonist of "Hayley and Felix on the Side".[1] A venomous two-headed beast, it scratches its victims and allows them to escape alive, only for the venom's effects to make them return for later consumption.

name: Crash Bandicoot (Skylanders)
summary: A wormhole has opened in Skylands and the great Aku Aku appears! He has come to announce the once-in-two-decades Synchronization Celebration--a time when all of the worlds align perfectly. All the inhabitants of Wumpa Island are having a party and they want to invite the Skylanders. But with Kaos on a quest to take over Skylands using his army of Doomlanders, the Skylanders must focus on stopping his evil plans. Never one to shy away from danger, the legendary marsupial Crash Bandicoot leaps through the wormhole to join the Skylanders in the ultimate battle against Kaos!

name: Corviknight
summary: Corviknight is a dual Flying and Steel-type Pokémon introduced in the eighth generation of the series. It is the final evolutionary stage of Rookidee after evolving from Corvisquire. It is one of the handful of Pokémon native to the Galar region with a Gigantamax form.

name: Shippo
summary: Shippō (, "The Seven Treasures") was an orphaned young kitsune who attempted to steal Shikon no Tama shards from the miko Kagome Higurashi and the Inu-Hanyō Inuyasha, wanting to become much stronger and avenge his father's death at the hands of the Thunder Brothers. Though his plan fails, Kagome and Inuyasha aid him after hearing his story, and he becomes their companion for the rest of the series.

name: Meguro Shuuya
summary: Meguro Shuuya is the 7th Generation Guard Captain of Kilihito. Childhood friends with Taguchi Masaru, they rose through the ranks of delinquents together starting in middle school, getting transferred out of 13 different schools until the 14th school, where Tanzawa Atsushi and Abe Kaname ruled. Protects and worries for Taguchi, even now. Is one of the very few people that are friends with Taguchi, and understands him deeply. He is often cheerful, but often a worrywart. Can be cautious and a mean drunk.

name: Baron Samedi (SMITE)
summary: Death. If you think that it means the end, then allow me to introduce you to someone.

name: Nemesis the Warlock
summary: The eponymous protagonist of the cult 2000 AD strip Nemesis the Warlock was a follower of the god Khaos (also worshiped by Deadlock of the ABC Warriors), and a fire-breathing, demonic alien. He was apparently a revolutionary freedom fighter on a self-appointed mission to free the galaxy from the grip of the xenophobic human empire of Termight, ruled by the zealot Torquemada.

name: Ash Williams
summary: After a trip to an old cabin in the woods with his girlfriend, Linda, goes wrong, Ashley Joanna Williams, better known as Ash, has no choice but to kill her when she is possessed by the Kandarian Demon, becoming an unlikely and reluctant hero as it falls to him, again and again, in both the past and present, to fight against the Evil Dead.

name: Kamen Rider Faiz
summary: Takumi Inui (乾 巧 Inui Takumi) is a young, lonely drifter with a mysterious past who aimlessly wanders across Japan until he is recruited by Mari Sonoda and Smart Brain to fight the Orphnochs. He is the primary user of the Faiz (Φ) gear, enabling him to transform into Kamen Rider Faiz (仮面ライダーファイズ Kamen Raidā Faizu). He is also often teased by Mari for being a "nekojita" (literally meaning "cat tongue"; someone who cannot stand food that is too hot).
abilities: Pre-Oma Day
Post-Oma Day

name: Druj
summary: Druj is an ancient dragon plagued by a curse sees his former self in a brave young man. Sensing the potential within him and the one he loves, the dragon continues to watch over them.

name: Jaguar (Real World)
summary: The Jaguar (Panthera onca)  is the largest felid in the Americas and has the highest bite force of any cat. Overall, the jaguar is the largest native cat species of the New World and the third largest in the world. This spotted cat closely resembles the Leopard, but is usually larger and sturdier. It ranges across a variety of forested and open terrains, but its preferred habitat is tropical and subtropical moist broadleaf forest, swamps and wooded regions. The jaguar enjoys swimming and is largely a solitary, opportunistic, stalk-and-ambush predator at the top of the food chain. As a keystone species it plays an important role in stabilizing ecosystems and regulating prey populations.

name: General Valerii
summary: General Valerii is a miniboss in Arcane Odyssey. He is a General of the Bronze Legion and guards Fort Castrum in the Bronze Sea.

name: Petrolacosaurus
summary: Petrolacosaurus is a genus of small diapsid reptile, belong to the group Araeoscelidia. Its name means "rock lake lizard." It was among the earliest diapsids, the group of which including all modern reptiles, along with dinosaurs, pterosaurs, and marine reptiles such as plesiosaurs and ichthyosaurs. The first fossil was found in Garnett, Kansas, and inhabited conifer-fern forests around 302 million years ago, during the late Carboniferous period.[1]

name: Ford Brody
summary: Ford Brody is one of the main protagonists of the 2014 film, Godzilla. He is the son of Joseph and Sandra Brody who grew up in the United States and became a lieutenant in the United States Navy as an explosive ordnance disposal officer.

name: Sagittarius Aiolos
summary: Sagittarius Aiolos (射手座サジタリアスのアイオロス, Sajitariasu no Aiorosu) is the Gold Saint of the Sagittarius Constellation, and the older brother of Leo Aiolia. Alongside Gemini Saga, Aiolos was a senior of his fellow Gold Saints, donning his armor while the others were still only small children. In contrast to his younger sibling, who had an aggressive, fiery, and passionate self, Aiolos was calm and collected, yet warm and gentle to those around him. Still, above all, he held undying loyalty to Athena.
abilities: Cosmo (Up-to 7th Sense ; Possesses the 6th and 7th Senses. Cosmo is the inner universe within a person which they can burn to fuel their powers) Psychic ( Low Tier ; by virtue of having the 6th Sense) Saint of Athena Miracles
Psychic ( Low Tier ; by virtue of having the 6th Sense)
Saint of Athena
Miracles
Paralysis Inducement and Darkness Manipulation (Via Shadow Arrow, Aiolos can pin the victim in place by pinning their shadow)
Psychic ( Low Tier ; by virtue of having the 6th Sense)
Saint of Athena
Miracles

name: Mar Novu (CW)
summary: Mar Novu, also known as The Monitor, is a cosmic entity preparing worlds for an oncoming Crisis to which Novu claimed to be beyond his abilities. Novu tested a multitude of worlds and individuals of different Earths across the Multiverse to test them by giving them the Book of Destiny to create their own Elseworld. However, they all failed, up until he challenged Earth-1.

name: The Blob (Marvel Comics)
summary: Frederick J. Dukes, AKA The Blob, is a fictional supervillain appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. The character was created by writer Stan Lee and artist Jack Kirby, he first appeared in X-Men #3 (January 1964).

name: Leechmonger
summary: The Leechmonger is the corrupted form of the fallen Risaia of Istarel, one of the wards of Maiden Astraea. After she met her death at the hands of three Giant Depraved Ones, Risaia's body fell into a mass of leeches, which feasted upon it. The Fog touched the soul-enhanced leeches, creating the Leechmonger.

name: Casey Davies
summary: Casey Davies was a normal if pathetic man who one day was beaten down by a group of bikers. After this, he became very fearful, deciding to learn karate for self defense. This proved to be a very poor decision after he decided to join the exclusive night class, getting involved in several violent and horrific activities.

name: Grey Trace
summary: Grey Trace is the protagonist of the movie Upgrade. A technophobe, Grey lives in a world where technology has advanced massively.

name: Pussy Galore
summary: Pussy Galore is a supporting antagonist turned protagonist in the 007 film, Goldfinger. She serves as Goldfinger's personal pilot, assisting him in his gold smuggling plans before turning on him for Bond and disrupting 'Operation Grand Slam', helping to foil Goldfinger's scheme and aid in his defeat.

name: Bruno (Fire Emblem)
summary: Bruno, also known as Zacharias, is a character in Fire Emblem Heroes, he is the prince of Embla, but was cast out of the country, he then joins the Order of Heroes under the name Zacharias, becoming friends with Alfonse and Sharena, he then goes missing and assumes a mysterious identity, he is revealed to be Zacharias upon attempting to lie about having killed Zacharias, and reveals that a dark god is controlling the Embla royalty.

name: Azrael (BlazBlue)
summary: Azrael is a fist-fighting pure-bred soldier with super human strength who is a 'member' of Sector Seven. He debuted as a playable character in BlazBlue Chronophantasma.

name: Cantarella Fisalia
summary: She is the thirty-sixth matriarch of the Fisalia family, and the former Blessed Maiden of Imperator. Her elegant, composed demeanor and captivating beauty conceal a dark and disturbing past, of which she is steadfastly searching for the means to liberate herself and her lineage, is a master of poison.
abilities: Resonator Physiology (Cantarella is a Mutant Resonator capable of controlling the havoc element)

Poison Manipulation , Durability Negation & Status Effect Inducement ( Paralysis , Hallucinations , Burnt , Suffocation , Pain & Body control ; She is well-versed in various poisons, such as the Crimson Sea Apple—where a single bite leads to paralysis, suffocation, and the excruciating agony of a burnt throat and torn organs, ensuring an agonizing death. Then there are Jellyroses, small beings that produce a neurotoxin inducing intense hallucinations and, in extreme cases, causing the body to seize and twist in a violent, uncontrollable dance of death. Using her Forte, she can effortlessly induce these effects. Furthermore, due to her long exposure, she is no longer merely a bearer of poison—she has become poison itself [ 1 ] )
Healing ( her mastery over poison allowed her to use it for healing [ 2 ] )
Blessed (She is the true Blessed Maiden of Imperator [ 1 ] )

Illusion Creation (She can induce hallucinations and illusions using her poison and Forte. This power manifests as a swarm of jellyfish emerging from her, creating a Sea of Illusion. Within it, victims are shown their deepest desires, which paralyzes them before they perish . She can also use these hallucinations to harm a target directly. this ability can also be used without harming the target [ 3 ] )
Supernatural Willpower (As a former Blessed Maiden,  she possesses a will strong enough to resist even the Leviathan's whisper [ 1 ] )
Summoning (She is capable of summoning Jellyroses using her Forte [ 3 ] [ 1 ] )
Flight ( True Flight ; Was able to freely float in the air . She has repeatedly journeyed to the inverted Tower of Avinoleum, a structure that hangs suspended in the high sky [ 3 ] )
Purification (The Fisalia family has the power to purify the poison left behind by the Leviathan . [ 2 ] ))
Non-Standard Breathing ( Type 2 ; Was able to breath under water within the sea of spirit [ 3 ] )

name: Peter Pan (Hook)
summary: Peter Banning is Peter Pan's identity outside of Neverland in the 1991 film Hook. He is played by Robin Williams, who was also 40 years old at the time. Peter is a ruthlessly successful mergers-and-acquisitions lawyer with a wife Moira and two kids: Jack and Maggie. His adoptive mother and grandmother-in-law is Wendy Darling, who at the time of the film is an elderly woman known in London for her many years of work with orphans.

name: Bomber (Dying Light)
summary: Bombers are an uncommon Infected-type in Dying Light and returned as monster in Dying Light 2 Stay Human. Bombers not only explode when in the vicinity of another player but also will explode if the player is within its view but cannot reach him, this explosion calls in Virals who are quite capable of climbing up to attack you generally in groups of 3—4 showing that the bomber has another role as well as a siren calling in dangerous zombies.

name: Maribel Hearn
summary: Maribel Hearn is a human from the Outside World, living in a near-future version of Kyoto. Alongside her friend Renko Usami, she is a member of the Secret Sealing Club, a two-member club whose goal is to study the various Otherworlds hidden from the rest of the world, including the Moon, Gensokyo, Hell and the Netherworld.

name: Zooey (Granblue Fantasy)
summary: Zooey is the force that protects the skies from the possible threats of destruction of all. The fragments of consciousness all hoping to protect this world enveloped in stars and skies gathered together to give birth to this young girl as the arbitrator of the skies. With a legion of dragons by her side, she brandishes an azure sword ready to destroy any foe who dares to disturb the balance of the world.

name: Milim Nava (Light Novel)
summary: Milim Nava ｢ミリム・ナーヴァ Mirimu Nāva?｣ is a powerful demon lord widely known for her strength and brutality in battle, earning her the unfortunate title of "The Destroyer." Due to her immense power, she serves as an important ally to Rimuru Tempest, the protagonist of the series, and is a close friend to him. She is also one of the first-generation Demon Lords, Child of the legendary Veldanava, the creator of the world, making her heritage one of her defining traits. Despite her destructive tendencies, she is also shown to have a caring and compassionate nature, and a strong sense of loyalty to those she holds dear.
abilities: Base
Stampede Mode

name: Anu
summary: Anu is the unconscious and featureless Concept of Stasis, and the mirror-opposite of Padomay, the disembodied Concept of Change. It is the quintessential force of order and stability, with all possibility, shape, and definition being born from its interplay with Padomay, which acts as the primordial chaotic force. Anu is a wholly impersonal idea, devoid of all consciousness and cognition, and thus incapable of perceiving itself and reality around it. Therefore, so that Anu might know itself, it unconsciously birthed its own subgradient, the ineffable Light of Anui-El, the primordial Embodiment of Existence, Anu's own conscious "soul" and the Soul of All Things.

name: Anubismon
summary: Anubismon is a God Man Digimon that guards and supervises the Dark Area. It constantly surveys the Dark Area, to which Digimon that were deleted when their life span finished, or when they were defeated in battle, are ultimately transmitted (and are transmitted there despite Fallen Angel Digimon and their like inhabiting it). As for the Digimon transferred to the Dark Area, if their data is evil, it imprisons them within eternal darkness, but if their data is good, it has the ability to reset them back to a Digitama. It has power as mighty as to decide the rebirth of a Digimon, and furthermore, it has the role of the Digital World's judge.

name: Orga Nanagear
summary: Orga Nanagear is a Lightning God Slayer and one of the five strongest Mages of Sabertooth, the former strongest Guild in Fiore, in terms of power.

name: Yukabacera
summary: Yukabacera is a Tasen hacker and soldier, who after yet another defeat managed to escape to Earth, then boarded himself up alone in a room with the best weapons he could find, so that he could go down fighting and bring down as many Komato with him as he could.

name: Spring-heeled Jack (Assassin's Creed)
summary: Spring-heeled Jack is a folkloric being whose identity was assumed by a cult leader in Victorian era London. There was, however, at least one variant of the being who seemingly possessed supernatural abilities.

name: Darth Talon
summary: Darth Talon was a female Lethan Twi'lek who became a Sith Lady in Darth Krayt's One Sith in 137 ABY. Talon was styled with black Sith tattoos covering her body including her head and lekku; each tattoo had been earned in ritual combat and inscribed by Krayt himself. As a Sith apprentice, she was trained by a fellow Twi'lek Sith Lord named Darth Ruyn, whom she later killed on Krayt's command with a swift decapitating strike of her lightsaber, shortly before ascending to the rank of a full-fledged Sith in Krayt's Order.

name: Sorath
summary: Sorath is a Crimson Denizen who goes by the true name He-Who-Loves-Himself, and an antagonist in Shakugan no Shana. He's the elder brother of Tiriel and the older half of the Aizen Siblings. He's an occidental-looking boy who continually wears a perplexed expression on his face. As his true name suggests, Sorath is selfish, uninhibited and purely seeks to obtain whatever the current target of his desires is, to the point of obsession. He exhibits carefree, infantile-like behavior and rarely pays attention to anything or anyone that isn't Tiriel or something he seeks. Despite being the older sibling, Sora is childish and unintelligent, needing to be taught everything by Tiriel. He came to Misaki City in his desire to obtain the Nietono no Shana, which puts him at odds with its current owner, Shana.

name: Son-O Miyazawa
summary: Son-O Miyazawa is the elder brother of Seiko and Kiryu Miyazawa. Thought to be dead after seemingly losing a fight to Kiryu, he instead had used the opportunity to get a new life and train his abilities even further without the responsibilities of being a Head of the Nadashinkageryu style. He only meets them again in their adulthood, initially masquerading as the Battle King, one of the world's strongest fighters and champion of the Hyper Battle tournament.

name: RizeGreymon
summary: RizeGreymon is a Cyborg Digimon. It has mechanized more than half of its body, and despite its large build it flies to the sky to attack the enemy. The offensive power fired from the gigantic revolver on its left arm is said to rival that of a single nuclear warhead, and due to its tremendous power and recoil, it is normally impossible to rapid-fire. In addition, the gun barrel is made from Chrome Digizoid in order to withstand that power.

name: Dante (The God of High School)
summary: Dante is the cloned son of Okhwang and a minor antagonist in The God of High School. He has many other iterations, all of whom refer to themselves as Dante and believe that they themselves are the real son of Okhwang. Dante's first appearance was during the World Competition, where he and two other Dantes entered under the guise of the Knights of Malta to try and get rid of Mori Hui's team.

name: Yukiko Amagi
summary: Yukiko Amagi is a playable character and one of the protagonists of Persona 4. She represents the High Priestess Arcana.

name: Theodor the Bear
summary: Theodor is the leader, organizer, intellect and backbone of the team. He is a very strong and experienced fighter. Judging by his appearance, he is severe, but in his heart, he is very sincere. He is skillful, judicious, quick-minded and wide-awake. Fedor is old-fashioned, does not understand modern technologies and prefers to solve problems with the help of war hammer.

name: Darquesse
summary: Darquesse is Valkyrie Cain's true name and the name of an alternative personality of her. She was prophesised to destroy the world by numerous psychics, though none were aware of who she really was. During moments of immediate threat to Valkyrie's life, Darquesse would awaken and take control of Valkyrie until she was forced back into Valkyrie's subconscious through various means, growing strong each time she awakened. Eventually, Darquesse almost completely took control of Valkyrie's body, at which point she decided to remove the remaining aspects of Valkyrie's personality to gain complete control. However, Skulduggery tricked Darquesse and managed to remove the Darquesse half of the personality from Valkyrie's body, restoring Valkyrie's control of herself. However, Darquesse's spirit escaped and possessed the body of Valkyrie's Reflection, a sentient reflection of her. Eventually, Darquesse was defeated with an illusion that tricked her into believing that she had destroyed everything in her universe and the only thing left for her to do was to move on to another universe to test her power against the Faceless Ones, where it was believed she would die to them.

name: Igursus (Monster Legends)
summary: Igursus is a Fire monster in Monster Legends and the twin brother/other half of Ouros. He is also similarly one of the best tank monsters in the game, however, unlike his brother, he is a raging volcano instead of a snowy peak, which seems to be reflected in the fact that he is far more focused on offense despite his tank status.

name: Bandages the Mummy
summary: Bandages the Mummy (ミイラくん) is a living dead who works as one of Fortuneteller Baba's fighters. He appears in the Dragon Ball manga and the animes Dragon Ball and Dragon Ball Z.

name: Sentinel (Marvel vs. Capcom)
summary: Sentinels are antagonists in the Marvel vs. Capcom series. Sentinels are robots created by Bolivar Trask, made with the purpose of exterminating all mutants. Armed with deadly arsenals, they are made all the more dangerous when working in groups

name: Charles Xavier
summary: Charles Xavier (also known as Professor X) is a fictional superhero who appears in American comic books published by Marvel Comics as well as in a number of television and movie adaptations. The character was created in 1963 by writer Stan Lee and artist Jack Kirby, and has been a frequent if not regular character in most X-Men-related fiction since the beginning.

name: Beck (The Rundown)
summary: Beck is a "retrieval expert," or a bounty hunter. He accepted one last job to find a mobster's son in order to retire and start his own restaurant, but when he found his bounty in Brazil, he encountered resistance from the local business tycoon.

name: Back Alley Brawler
summary: Michael White, better known as Back Alley Brawler was the son of a gang enforcer. He joined the Paragon City police force to try and make a difference. When he realized that was not getting the job done he adopted the name and costume of a hero. He fought in the streets and alleys, of the city, all through the late 70's and the 80's. He briefly went into retirement after that, but came back out to help with the Rikti war.[2]

name: Neto
summary: Neto is a member of the Wathe-hunting organization Frontline Gathering Knights Dominion, also known as Knights Dominion. He's a First Class Revenge Knight and the deputy officer of a knight squad sent to Japan to eliminate the Knight Killer, a Draconian that has killed several Dominion Knights.

name: The Cenobite
summary: A demon to some, an angel to others. Pinhead is an explorer in the further regions of experience, indulging in the limitless thrill of pleasure and pain. When the puzzle box known as the Lament Configuration — a key to another dimension — was found in The Entity's Realm, it was only a matter of time before it fell into curious hands. Once opened, he arrived. What came next was sweet suffering that spilled over the Realm.

name: Frankenstein’s Monster (Mary Shelley)
summary: The Creature, also known as Frankenstein’s Monster, is the main tragic villain of the novel “Frankenstein” or “The Modern Prometheus”. He is described as having wrinkled skin which barely hid the blood vessels, black lips, black hair, and yellow eyes. He was created by Victor Frankenstein in his laboratory, hoping to create life, while he succeeded, he created a being so hideous that he locked him away from society, the monster later escaped and wreaked havoc.

name: Jr. Troopa
summary: Jr. Troopa (or Master Jr. Troopa, as he calls himself) is a character and recurring boss in Paper Mario. He is a young Koopa who never left his egg after he was born. He lives near Goomba Village and enjoys picking on the other kids there. He has his own piece of territory he calls "Jr. Troopa's Playground." At the beginning of the game, Goompa states that Jr. Troopa is the boss of a "neighborhood gang," but none of its other members are ever seen. Throughout the game, Jr. Troopa trails Mario and his allies during their adventure and returns in a stronger form after each defeat. Mario battles him a total of six times throughout the game.

name: Kainé (Nier)
summary: Kainé, a beautiful and hot-tempered intersex swordswoman, is a companion and tritagonist of NieR. She is possessed by a Shade who dubs himself Tyrann, which allows her the use of magic and enhanced strength. As a result of her upbringing and Tyrann's occupation of her body, she has a disposition towards being cold and cruel - albeit the fact that more often than not she is shy and collected.

name: Umbral Blot
summary: Umbral Blots, or Blackballs, are constructs made to look like Spheres of Annihilation, powerful artifact-tier holes in reality that erase the existence of all they touch. The blot is described as "a hovering sphere of absolute void". Often, it is mistaken for such Spheres of Annihilation, obeying creatures capable of commanding such creatures until it decides to turn on them.

name: Benimaru (Web Novel)
summary: Benimaru is a loyal follower of Rimuru Tempest and the Commander-in-Chief of Tempest's army. He is one of Rimuru's Twelve Executives and also one of his three strongest subordinates, including Diablo and Zegion.

name: Rei (Fist of the North Star)
summary: Rei is the successor of Nanto Suichō Ken, and one of the Nanto Rokusei Ken. After a stranger with seven scars attacked his family during his sister's wedding, abducted her, and killed his parents, Rei took to wandering the wasteland, abandoning his humanity and becoming a savage beast searching for vengeance.

name: Brienne of Tarth
summary: Brienne of Tarth is a warrior of Tarth, vassals to House Baratheon. After winning a tournament melee, she is made a member of King Renly Baratheon's new Kingsguard, shortly before his assassination. She becomes the sworn sword of Catelyn Stark and vows to avenge Renly's death. She is charged by Catelyn Stark to return Jaime Lannister to King's Landing, in an attempt to exchange him for her two daughters, Sansa and Arya, whom she believes are held hostage there, but with Catelyn's death, Jaime tasks her with locating and protecting Sansa and Arya.

name: Zilong (Mobile Legends)
summary: Zilong was born in the quiet and peaceful Cadia Riverlands. A righteous warrior, who has swore to protect the Cadia Riverlands. His outstanding ability and steadfast faith has made him the Great Dragon's spokesman and also his favorite apprentice. The soul of the Oriental Fighters.

name: Man-Thing (Marvel Cinematic Universe)
summary: Theodore "Ted" Sallis was a human who, through unknown means, became the Man-Thing. He was captured and contained by SHIELD, but later escaped when the facility he was in was raided. He later ended up on Sakaar, where he became one of the Grandmaster's champions. Likewise, he later became friends with Jack Russel on Earth, who helped to protect him when Verussa Bloodstone tried to have him killed in a monster hunt.

name: Sentinel Prime (Michael Bay)
summary: Sentinel Prime was one of the Primes, he used to be the leader of the Autobots until the Ark was lost in space, landing on the moon in 1961.

name: Thor (Marvel's Avengers)
summary: Thor Odinson is the prince of Asgard and a member of the Avengers. A skilled warrior and blessed with the ability to control lightning, he was worshipped by the Norse people of Midgard, who dubbed him the "God of Thunder and Wind". Thor also wielded the hammer, Mjölnir, as a weapon, using it to channel the Odinforce. Thor also visited the Earth on several occasions and was aware of the Kree Empire. He was among several gods battling a Kree Sentry in the past.

name: Yunael
summary: Yuna Amasato is a college girl who is the twin younger sister of Minael. They have very similar personalities and appearances to the point where they are almost indistinguishable from each other. They mostly act innocent around people and praise them, but in reality, they are rude, mean, and like talking behind people’s backs, though she seems to genuinely care for Tama. She is a member of Team Ruler. When she becomes a real magical girl by playing Magical Girl Raising Project as Yunael, she is mentored by and partnered with Ruler, whom she grows to hate.

name: Green Goblin (The Amazing Spider-Man)
summary: Harry Osborn was the son of the former C.E.O of Oscorp industries known as Norman Osborn and Peter Parker's best friend during High School. He eventually became C.E.O of Oscorp Industries after his father died of a genetic disease.

name: Maxim Horvath (The Sorcerer's Apprentice)
summary: Maxim Horvath is the secondary antagonist in the 2010 Disney fantasy movie The Sorcerer's Apprentice. He acts as the main antagonist for most of the film, but he is actually a minion to the true main villain.

name: Sirene (Original)
summary: Sirene is a beautiful demoness who was in love with Amon and amassed her courage to go and kill Akira.

name: Megamouth Shark
summary: The megamouth shark (Megachasma pelagios) is a species of mackerel shark endemic to deep waters worldwide. Like the whale shark and the basking shark, it is a filter feeder, and harmless to humans.

name: Sir Robin
summary: The gallant knight Not-Quite-So-Brave-as-Sir-Lancelot, but still brave and bold and adept... At fleeing.

name: Geno
summary: Geno (whose real name is ♥♪!?) is a warrior from Star Road and one of Mario's partners in Super Mario RPG: Legend of the Seven Stars.

name: Kaede Rukawa
summary: Kaede Rukawa (流川 楓 Rukawa Kaede) is the small forward and the ace player of the Shohoku High.

name: Madama Butterfly
summary: Madama Butterfly, also known as the Mistress Of Atrocity, is the demoness whom Bayonetta has made a pact with in order to use her power in combat. Her counterpart is Madama Styx. Madama Butterfly is the primary source for most of Bayonetta's supernatural abilities.

name: Shun'ei
summary: Shun'ei is a nice and reasonable person due to Tung Fu Rue's kindly teachings. He fondly calls his master "Grandpa". He admits his cursed powers may endanger anyone near him and is worried about it.

name: Edwin Murray
summary: Edwin Murray is the loving husband of Fiona Murray and father of his son, David Murray. Despite his love for them, due to all of the commissions by Fazbear Entertainment, Edwin was so engrossed in his work that he didn't have enough time to spend. Before David's third birthday party however, Fiona decides to help out at Fall Fest, dying after a brief fire and leaving Edwin alone with David.

name: Hyperion (Riordan)
summary: Hyperion is the Titan of light, fire and power, and the Titan Lord of the East. He is one of the most powerful Titans, and one of Kronos' most loyal followers (which earned him the nickname "Kronos Lite"). Hyperion is the father of Eos, Helios, and Selene by Theia, the Titaness of sight and enlightenment. One of the twelve Elder Titans, Hyperion was imprisoned in Tartarus after the First Titanomachy, and was eventually released during the Second Titanomachy to fight against Olympus.

name: Xion
summary: Xion is the fourteenth member of Organization XIII, first appearing in the game Kingdom Hearts 358/2 Days, in which she could be viewed as both a main protagonist and antagonist. She is not a normal Nobody and is only a nominal member of the Organization. Because of this, she does not have a throne in Where Nothing Gathers, nor does she have a title or a breed of Nobody to control. Instead, she is an imperfect Replica of Sora created from his leaked memories as a fail-safe in case both Sora and Roxas proved to be useless to Organization XIII's plans. While this enables her to use the Keyblade, Xion's existence also halts Sora's progression of regaining his memories to fully awaken while in his pod, something which Naminé, DiZ, and Riku recognize.

name: Hail Mary (Invincible)
summary: Hail Mary is a grotesque kaiju that fought Omni-Man in the past. After its defeat, it was taken in by the GDA where it received countless enhancements under the orders of director Cecil Stedman.

name: Abomasnow
summary: Abomasnow (Japanese: ユキノオー, Yukinooh) is a dual-type Grass/Ice Pokémon. It evolves from Snover starting at level 40. It can Mega Evolve into Mega Abomasnow using the Abomasite.

name: Orihime (Majo Taisen)
categories: Majo Taisen - The War of Greedy Witches
summary: Orihime is a character in Majo Taisen - The War of Greedy Witches, and a participant of Walpurgis, a one-on-one tournament between witches to determine whose desire is strongest and be granted their wish by Agrat Bat Mahlat. As a young girl, she was inspired by the tale of Tanabata, with the deities Orihime and Hikoboshi and their star-crossed love, so much so that she became obsessed with having the world fall in love with her. Due to this obsession, she had become an idol by the name ‘Orihime’, and named her fans ‘Hikoboshi’, but by additionally being the illegitimate daughter of the General Secretary in Japan, Orihime had managed to threaten her father into buying her a large apartment complex.

name: Curly Brace
summary: Curly Brace is the deuteragonist of Cave Story. She was sent to the island along with Quote to destroy the Demon Crown ten years prior to the game. After suffering defeat at the hands of its current wearer, she fell into unconsciousness for an unspecified amount of time. Upon waking up, she has no memory of any previous events. After meeting and confronting Quote, she assists him on his journey.

name: Louis Tully (Classic Film Continuity)
summary: Dr. Peter Venkman is one of the original Ghostbusters. He has doctorates in both psychology and parapsychology. He appears in all major forms of the Ghostbusters Franchise. He is one of the main protagonists of the Ghostbusters.

name: Pollux of the Twins
summary: Pollux is is one of The Twelve Heavenly Stars. She is one of the Gemini Twins along with her brother Castor. She is simultaneously the strongest and weakest of the Twelve Heavenly Stars. She is the leader of the fairies and spirits, who are the opposite of the demons. As the counterpart of the Demon King, she maintains the balance between good and evil as well as light and darkness in the world. She is the avatar of the Wood Ouroboros and has played the role in Alovenas script of being the light that balances Orm's darkness in the world.
abilities: Superhuman Physical Characteristics
Magic

Law Manipulation (Levels are a law unto themselves which lets the cast ignore the laws of physics [ 1 ] . Residents of Alovenus world inherited her power [ 2 ] , and thus like her they can do the unthinkable ignoring laws such as the laws of physics. In a fight between people who defy common sense, the winner is determined by who defies common sense the most [ 3 ] . The higher leveled you are, the more common sense you can ignore)
Telepathy (Pollux and Castor can somewhat understand each other without the need to use words [ 4 ] )

name: Akio Osafune
summary: Akio Osafune was a minor antagonist in XBlaze – Code: Embryo until he met his fate at the hands of Ripper. His Drive was Iron Shooter. Akio belonged to a gang within New Yokozaki City, the gang in question tried to hunt down Akira Kamewari. Akio was after the Original Grymoire because of a promise that Sechs had made to him; retrieve the Grymoire from Tōya Kagari, and be cured of the status of a Union. At the time, Akio was in Phase 3.

name: Lobelia Reed
summary: Lobelia Reed is the ancestor of Downy Reed, and the former White Apostle.

name: Dubhe Siegfried
summary: Siegfried is the leader of Hilda's God Warriors of Odin during the anime-only Saint Seiya Asgard Arc. He is also the reincarnation of the Mythological Norse Hero Siegfried / Sigurd.

name: The Thing (John Carpenter)
summary: The Thing is the titular main antagonist and the name given to the hostile alien creature of the movie "The Thing" by John Carpenter. The movie is an adaptation of the book "Who Goes there?" written by John W. Campbell in 1938. The Thing is an alien life-form capable of assimilating and then perfectly mimicking other lifeforms. Each cell is programmed to seek out the cells of other lifeforms. These cells are then devoured, the DNA assimilated, and then mimicked to create a copy so perfect, that even creatures with heightened senses, such as dogs, do not recognize a threat.

name: Yawara Chatora (Tiger)
summary: Yawara Chatora (茶ちゃ虎とら柔やわら Chatora Yawara), also known as Tiger (虎とら Tora), is a Pro Hero and member of the Wild, Wild Pussycats.

name: Thane (Darksiders)
summary: Thane is a side character within Darksiders II
abilities: Superhuman Physical Characteristics (Thane is a titanic Maker, standing at over 12 feet tall and having a body nearly as wide as he is tall [ 4 ] [ 2 ] )
Large Size (Type 0; Death is only around half of Thane's size [ 1 ] )
