name: Screwball (Marvel Comics)
summary: Screwball is a self-proclaimed performance artist, who livestreams her crimes to the internet for fame and attention. Possessing incredible parkour skills, she has been a frequent foe to Spider-Man.

name: Li Yong
summary: Li Yong is a Kung Fu master and a high-ranking member of the Long Zii tong. In 1878, he became a rival of Ah Sahm, a hatchet man for the Hop Wei, another tong in San Francisco.

name: Shoukaku
summary: The personification of Shōkaku-class aircraft carrier Shoukaku. Along with her sister ship Zuikaku, she took part in several naval battles, including the attack on Pearl Harbor, the Battle of the Coral Sea and the Battle of the Santa Cruz Islands before being sunk at the Battle of the Philippine Sea.

name: Dario Bossi
summary: Dario Bossi is one of the Dark Lord candidates and one of the main villains in Castlevania: Dawn of Sorow. He joins Celia's cult to become the new candidate for Dracula and has a rivalry with Dmitrii Blinov. After losing once to Soma, he makes a deal with Aguni and absorbs its powers to become more powerful, only for Soma to destroy the source of his powers, rendering him harmless.

name: Tifa Lockhart (Kingdom Hearts)
summary: Tifa is a character in Kingdom Hearts II that originates from Final Fantasy VII. Her role in Kingdom Hearts II is the manifestation of Cloud's inner light. Tifa appears in Kingdom Hearts II, looking around Hollow Bastion for Cloud and helping Leon defend Hollow Bastion when the world is invaded. Tifa wishes to help Cloud fight Sephiroth, and has spent much of the game searching for him. She interrupts a battle between the two and gives Cloud the power of light to combat Sephiroth's darkness. Cloud shines brightly and he and Sephiroth depart to places unknown to continue their battle. Tifa thanks Sora for his help in locating Cloud and gives him the Fenrir Keychain. She later appears as a boss in several cups in the Underworld Coliseum, fighting with the other Final Fantasy characters. Tifa was intended to appear alongside Cloud and Sephiroth in the original Kingdom Hearts, but she was removed due to time constraints.

name: Ruminas Valentine (Light Novel)
summary: Ruminas Valentine, also known as the True God Ruminas, is one of the Octagram or Eight Star Demon Lords, the real identity of the God of the Western Saints Church, and the true ruler of the Holy Empire Ruberios. She rules over all vampires in the Night Garden, their capital underneath Ruberios.

name: Death (RuneScape)
summary: Death is the regulatory figure of life and death in Geilinor. By his hand, all souls of the dead are able to leave their bodies and travel to the Underworld. Without him, souls would remain suck on the mortal plane, unable to pass on.

name: Eve (Underworld)
summary: Eve, full name possibly Eve Corvin, is the first-born Hybrid and is the daughter of Selene and Michael Corvin. She is also a modern-day descendant of the Corvinus Clan. She is a Hybrid of both immortal species Vampire, and Lycan. Her blood is sought out for its potential of giving someone else unimaginable power making her a big target for many enemies.

name: Eddie the Head (Comic)
categories: Iron Maiden: Legacy of the Beast

name: Lion (Steven Universe)
summary: Lion is a magical pink lion whom Steven befriends in "Steven's Lion". Lion protects Steven, as shown in "Steven's Lion" and "So Many Birthdays". It is revealed in "Lion 3: Straight to Video" that Lion had some sort of deep connection with Rose Quartz. This connection is explored further in the episode "Rose's Scabbard". While Lion's exact relationship with Rose is unknown, it has been hypothesized by Steven that he acted as a sort of 'living bag', in which she stored her most important belongings.

name: Hyperion (Avengers Assemble)
summary: Hyperion is a corrupt superhero and a Squadron Supreme member. He is a former member of the Cabal. He is a major antagonist of Season 1 and Season 2 of the Avengers Assemble show. Unlike most of his comic book counterparts, he is extremely evil and very arrogant, which often leads to his downfall.

name: Sticks the Badger (Game)
summary: Sticks the Badger (スティックス・ザ・バジャー Sutikkusu za Bajā) is a character from the Sonic the Hedgehog series. She is anthropomorphic badger who lives on the edge of the forest, and has lived in that forest since she was a child. Sticks is energetic, free-spirited but also somewhat a bit crazy with a fiery hatred of modern-day technology and a love for nature.

name: Chinjao
summary: A former pirate and leader of the Happo Navy and a participant in the Corrida Coliseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. He holds a grudge against Garp for ruining his life. He extended this grudge onto his grandson Luffy, but Luffy, being himself, manages to make him an ally.

name: Hinome Hawakata
summary: Hinome is the secondary main protagonist of the Im: Great Priest Imhotep series. She's Imhotep's first friend after being set free from his punishment for 3,000 years. She's a rather unorthodox high school girl who had a dark past involving the Magai which ties into Imhotep's origins. However, she has a brave, kind, and fierce heart. Helping Imhotep in his endeavors despite being a mere human. Always being willing to stick by his side and cheering him on, making him better himself.

name: Hammerhead (One-Punch Man)
summary: Hammerhead (ハンマーヘッド Hamaheddo) is a B-Class criminal and the leader of the Paradise Group, a terrorist group insisting that people shouldn't have to work if they don't want to.

name: Kamen Rider Drake
summary: Daisuke Kazama (風間 大介 Kazama Daisuke) is Kamen Rider Drake (仮面ライダードレイク Kamen Raidā Doreiku, Masked Rider Drake), one of the characters of Kamen Rider Kabuto. He is a metro-sexual make-up artist who openly befriends women, seeing them as the treasure of life. His partner, a little girl named Gon, always follows him around, completing sentences for him since Daisuke seems to be in eloquent at times.

name: Unknown Specimen 5
summary: Unknown Specimen 5, also known as Lisa, is one of the many "Unknown" Specimen haunting the mansion.

name: Zael
summary: Zael is the main character and protagonist of The Last Story. He is a young man who is fighting throughout the continent pursuing the dream of a better life by becoming a knight. He also meets Lady Calista during the game and falls in love with her. He is part of Dagran's mercenary group along with Syrenne, Mirania, Lowell and Yurick and is Dagran's oldest and best friend. During the events of the game, he gains possession of the Outsider's power on his right arm.

name: Aren Kuboyasu (Live Action)
summary: Aren Kuboyasu (窪谷須 亜蓮, くぼやす あれん lit. Kuboyasu Aren) used to be a delinquent in his former school and only Kusuo, Shun and Touma know this. Aren is one of the main characters of the series and was starred by Kaku Kento in the live action of the series

name: Witch-Hunter Jerren
summary: Witch-Hunter Jerren, also known as Castellan Jerren, is an NPC in Elden Ring.
abilities: Superhuman Physical Characteristics
Expert Combatant & Expert Swordsman
Magic ( Sorceries : Carian - Unique Abilities : Magic Glintblade) Ashes of War ( Fire - Unique Abilities : Flaming Strike)
Ashes of War ( Fire - Unique Abilities : Flaming Strike)
Status Effect Inducement (The flamberge's blade can rip through flesh, causing build up of the Hemorrhage status)
Ashes of War ( Fire - Unique Abilities : Flaming Strike)

name: Pony (Akame ga Kill!)
summary: Pony, along with other children, was picked to be put through a test in order to select candidates for The Empire's assassins. She was able to get one of the highest ranks and get into the elite group.

name: Mega (MEGA)
summary: "Mega" is the nickname given to a rampaging monster (later revealed to be multiple monsters, varying from infant to adult sizes) that serve as the main antagonists of the Steam game MEGA.

name: Doomfist
summary: Doomfist, a man who is determined to plunge the world into a new conflict that he believes will strengthen humanity.

name: Albedo (Genshin Impact)
summary: Albedo is the Chief Alchemist of the Knights of Favonius, the Captain of its Investigation Team, and a genius known as the Kreideprinz.

name: Snow Villiers
summary: In Final Fantasy XIII, Snow leads the neighborhood watch group NORA in the town of Bodhum. He is determined to save his fiancée, Serah Farron, from her fate as a L'Cie despite Serah's sister Lightning's disapproval of their relationship. He eventually sets on a journey to save Cocoon—a fal'Cie-built utopia where they live. In Final Fantasy XIII-2, Snow goes off in search of Lightning who has disappeared, being the only one to believe Serah's claims that her sister is still alive. In Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XIII, Snow is the patron of the city of Yusnaan, and the last l'Cie in the world. Close to becoming a Cie'th, he awaits for the end of the world to reunite with Serah in the afterlife.

name: Camel
summary:
Camels are animals domesticated for millenia. They are primarily domesticated for desert travel and the transport of goods, but they have also been used for textiles, warfare, dairy products, and meat. There are two types of camels: dromedary and bactrian camels, both which are distinguished by the amount of humps on their back. 94% of the camels are dromedary camels while the remaining 6% are bactrian camels. A population of wild bactrian camels live in parts of northern China and southern Mongolia; however, these camels are critically endangered.
An adult male dromedary camel typically weighs in at around 300 to 600 kg. An adult male bactrian camel, however, weighs in at around 300 to 1000 kg.

name: Strelizia
summary: Strelizia is the Franxx piloted by Code:016 (Hiro) and Code:002 (Zero-Two). The Franxx is owned by Zero-Two, who can pilot it alone but on Stampede mode and not at its full potential. Red Strelizia is the evolution caused by Hiro and Zero-Two declaring their mutual love for each other.

name: Cyrus Temple
summary: Cyrus is the leader of STAG, which is short for "Special Tactical Anti-Gang Unit" and is one of the main antagonists in the game alongside Killbane.

name: Tres Angustias
summary: The Tres Angustias as the name implies, are three ghostly women, they are part of a trifecta of bosses that The Penitent One can fight at any time.

name: Ophelia Augusta af Jutland
summary: Ophelia is the princess of Jutland and one of the main characters of Valkyria Revolution. Willing to fight for her nation, Ophelia decided to join Vanargand, a team composed of Jutland's finest alchemist created to combat the Valkyria of the Ruzi Empire and was accepted thanks to her extremely high mana affinity.

name: Cato Sicarius
summary: Cato Sicarius is one of the greatest heroes of the Ultramarines. His titles are many – Captain of the 2nd Company, Master of the Watch, Knight Champion of Macragge, Grand Duke of Talassar and High Suzerain of Ultramar. Each reflects but a fraction of a lifetime’s diligent and exceptional service, not only to the Ultramarines Chapter, but to the realm of Ultramar itself.

name: Eater of Worlds
summary: The Eater of Worlds is a gigantic worm found in the Corruption. It appears once three Shadow Orbs have been smashed.
abilities: Superhuman Physical Characteristics
Duplication
Status Effect Inducement
Statistics Reduction (Can weaken an enemy's physical might)

name: White Witch
summary: Jadis the White Witch used to rule in her world of Charn as Queen. But after a battle with her sister, she used the secret Deplorable Word and destroyed all life in her universe besides her own, and so went into a long hibernation. Years later she is awakened by two children, Digory and Polly, and uses them to travel to their world and later Narnia. Together with the kids they accidentally travel to the creation of the world of Narnia, where she ends up eating a certain fruit that makes her immortal. And she ends up ruling over Narnia as a Queen for a thousand years, causing eternal winter. With the arrival of Aslan her winter starts to fade, and at the Stone Table she kills him, unknowingly fulfilling the Table's prophecy and the resurrected Aslan puts an end to her tyranny.

name: Baxia
summary: A hermit abandoning his wide-spread fame and living in solitary among the forest in the Land of Black Tortoise. He's the most senior member of the Oriental Fighters.

name: Elisa Celjska
summary: A magical girl born in the Holy Roman Empire, Elisa Celjska traveled to France in order to meet "La Pucelle" and test her powers, following the orders of the Order of the Dragon. Even if she was disappointed by Tart herself, she was impressed by Melissa's strength and decided to join them.

name: Corsola
summary: Corsola is a small, pink Pokémon with branch-like growths on its back, which are similar to coral. It continuously sheds and grows. The tip of its head is prized as a treasure because of its beauty, and its branches glitter very beautifully in seven colors when they catch sunlight. If any branch breaks off, this Pokémon grows it back in just one night. The points on its head absorb nutrients from clear water. They cannot survive in polluted water, and their coral branches lose their color and deteriorate in dirty water, which is why they prefer the unpolluted southern seas. In one south-sea nation, the people live in communities that are built on groups of these Pokémon.

name: Tia Lightning
summary: Tia Lightning is one of the main female characters in the Unlimited Fafnir series.

name: Kalibak
summary: Kalibak is the first son of Darkseid, born to his true love, the sorceress Suli. He inherited great power from his parents, becoming the highest-ranking military commander on Apokolips save for Darkseid himself. He is quite intelligent despite his appearance and mannerisms, and has a secret soft side kept utterly hidden from everyone else.

name: Tomura Shigaraki (Pre-Surgery)
summary: Tomura Shigaraki (死柄木 弔 Shigaraki Tomura), original name Tenko Shimura (志村転弧 Shimura Tenko), was the protégé of All For One and the leader of the League of Villains. A dangerously unstable individual who looks up to his "Sensei" with the utmost awe and respect, Shigaraki plans on tearing down the society of heroes built up by All Might by any means necessary. His organization and the Meta Liberation Army later merged to create the Paranormal Liberation Front, and he became its Grand Commander.

name: Player (Zealous Fighter)
summary: The Player is an unofficial name given to the controllable character within the Roblox game "Zealous Fighter". The game allows the player to explore a variety of areas and missions, defeating waves of enemies and difficult bosses with combo strings.

name: Daspletosaurus
summary: Daspletosaurus is a genus of tyrannosaurid theropod dinosaurs, and was closely related to Tyrannosaurus rex. Its name means "frightful lizard." Three species have been identified: Daspletosaurus torosus, Daspletosaurus horneri, and Daspletosaurus wilsoni. It lived 78–74.4 million years ago, during the late Cretaceous, on the landmass of Laramidia, an island apart of North America when the continent was split by the Western Interior Seaway. It is thought to have coexisted alongside the albertosaurine Gorgosaurus, with niche partitioning limiting competition between the two tyrannosaurids.[1]

name: Monster
summary: Monster is a reoccurring enemy from the video game Friday Night Funkin’. He is a mostly black humanoid creature that has a lemon-shaped head with a savage face. The role of Monster in the game is to be a murderous threat and a singing opponent of Boyfriend whom has been targeted along with Girlfriend by the monster to be eaten. He appears in Week 2, tricking Skid and Pump into challenging Boyfriend to a singing battle before entering the confrontation himself, hoping to eat Girlfriend. He appears again in Week 5, watching Daddy Dearest and Mommy Mearest face off against the Boyfriend, once again interrupting, this time in hopes of eating Boyfriend.

name: Samson Carrasco
summary: Sansón Carrasco is a character in the novel Don Quixote de la Mancha by Miguel de Cervantes. He appears in the second part of the book (published in 1615), where he plays a pivotal role in the development of events.

name: Faust (Fausts Alptraum)
summary: Faust is a young girl, protagonist of the 2015 indie game Fausts Alptraum, in which she finds herself trapped in a mansion haunted by a demon named Mephistopheles, where to escape she will have to understand what is dream and what is reality as she tries to recall her past and survive the mansion's perils.

name: Amunet
summary: Amunet (born c. 85 BCE), born Aya of Alexandria, was the Greco-Egyptian co-founder of the Hidden Ones and by extension, the Assassin Brotherhood alongside her husband, the Medjay Bayek. Through Elpidios, Aya was the descendant of both Darius, the creator of the Hidden Blade, and the Misthios Kassandra.

name: Ghiaccio
summary: Ghiaccio is a minor antagonist in JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part V: Vento Aureo. A member of Risotto's sub-gang in Passione, he attacks Giorno Giovanna and Guido Mista in search for taking Trish Una and information leading to finding the Boss of Passione. He is the last member of the squad encountered by Bucciarati's group.

name: Spinosaurus (Age of Reptiles)
summary: An unnamed male Spinosaurus is the main character of the comic Age of Reptiles: Ancient Egypt.

name: Angie Yonaga
summary: Angie Yonaga (夜長 アンジー Yonaga Anjī) is a student in Ultimate Academy for Gifted Juveniles and a participant of the Killing School Semester featured in Danganronpa V3: Killing Harmony.

name: Worm (Yu-Gi-Oh!)
summary: Worms are the main antagonists of the first arc of the Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Terminal storyline. They are a constantly evolving alien species known for destroying planets over time. One day, a meteorite containing their simpler forms crashed on a war-ravaged planet. Their goals are to consume the planet and exhaust it of its energy. Its final stage and form, Worm Zero, is the cause of this destruction through numerous evolutions and battles. They are ultimately defeated by the Allies of Justice using Ally of Justice Decisive Armor.

name: Tobin Frost
summary: Tobin Frost is a rogue CIA intelligence officer. Originally recruited in 1984, Frost became renowned for his understanding of psychological warfare and interrogation tactics. However, he was suspected of leaking information and became wanted for espionage on four continents. Frost later feigned surrender in order to bring in a microchip of blackmail on high-ranking officials and stayed in a CIA "safe house" overseen by rookie agent Matt Weston. When their safe house was attacked, Frost attempted to go out on his own but was pursued by Weston.

name: Player (Battlefield 2042)
summary: The No-Pat Specialist is the playable character in Battlefield 2042, a multiplayer-focused first-person shooter set in a near-future world ravaged by climate change and resource wars. As a No-Pat (Non-Patriated), the player is a stateless refugee turned mercenary, fighting for survival in proxy wars between the United States and Russia. Unlike traditional Battlefield classes, players select from a roster of Specialists, each with unique backgrounds, nationalities, personalities, and abilities. These Specialists are categorized into four classes: Assault, Engineer, Support, and Recon. The game emphasizes large-scale battles with up to 128 players, dynamic weather events, and customizable loadouts. Specialists were introduced to add depth to gameplay, allowing for specialized roles while maintaining open weapon access across classes. Over time, through seasonal updates, more Specialists were added, and class restrictions on gadgets and weapons were reintroduced to balance gameplay.

name: Kokichi Oma
summary: Kokichi Oma is a truly cold-blooded, twisted and sadistic character, participant of the Killing School Semester.

name: Rhino (Spectacular Spider-Man)
summary: Alex O'Hirn started out as a petty crook who worked for the Big Man, with his partner in crime Flint Marko. The duo were repeatedly foiled by Spider Man and were getting frustrated at constantly being his punching bag. Deciding to get rid of Spider-Man, the Big Man used O'Hirn as a guinea pig in one Oscorp's illegal experiments. His body was infused with Dr. Otto Octavius newest innovation: super-tough polymer armor modeled after a rhinoceros. O'Hirn called himself "The Rhino" and unlike Flint Marko, he had no issue with his new found power just as long as he could take down Spidey.

name: Ice-shroom
summary: Ice-shroom is a recurring character within in the Plants vs. Zombies franchise. Ice-shroom's abilities vary widely based on his appearances, but one thing that's been consistent between all of them is his ability to temporarily freeze zombies in place.

name: Doctor Manhattan (Watchmen)
summary: Jonathan Osterman was born to a watchmaker in 1929 and planned to follow in his father's footsteps, but after the United States dropped the atomic bomb on Hiroshima, his father urged him to pursue a career in nuclear physics, declaring his profession outdated. Osterman attended Princeton University and graduated with a Ph.D. in atomic physics, and in 1959 he was moved to Gila Flats, where he met his future lover Janey Slater.

name: Masaki Kurosaki
summary: Masaki Kurosaki (黒崎 真咲, Kurosaki Masaki) was an Echt Quincy, the wife of Isshin Kurosaki, and mother of Ichigo Kurosaki, Karin Kurosaki, and Yuzu Kurosaki. She was the last surviving member of her family, and was taken in by the Ishida family before an incident with a Hollow led her to live a life with Isshin Kurosaki.

name: Tecla Ibsen
summary: Tecla Ibsen is the primary antagonist of the W.I.T.C.H. comic series Arc 6. Ragorlang. She is a human with the ability to split in two and release a monstrous shadow creature known as the Ragorlang. Her dream is to obtain eternal youth by absorbing the vital energy of the young, and attempts to steal the energy of the Guardians due to them being magical beings and thus an ideal source of life energy.

name: Providence (Bravely Default)
summary: Providence is the deity that resides over the Celestial Realm, a plane of existence above the countless versions of Luxendarc. A primordial being who feeds off of despair, it latches onto the spirit of Vega, a human who descended from the Celestial Realm after her death, to feed on her memories and turn them into monsters that would raze Luxendarc to the ground.

name: Grizzly Mastodon
summary:
A cousins to the elephant, the Grizzly Mastodon roams the subarctic and arctic lands in large herds.
Their great strength and endurance makes so Giants often try to capture and tame them in order to use them as mounts.

name: Kanao Tsuyuri
summary: When she was a child, Kanao Tsuyuri (栗花落 カナヲ, Tsuyuri Kanao?) lived an impoverished lifestyle. Her parents were incredibly abusive towards her and her siblings, beating them and drowning them if they did anything they disliked. She broke psychologically, becoming an empty shell who was sold off into slavery.

name: Hong Meiling
summary: Hong Meiling (紅 美鈴) is a youkai, though it isn't currently known which specific category she actually belongs to. She's the gatekeeper of the Scarlet Devil Mansion. She is known for her mastery of the martial arts, part of which can be seen from her movement which is performed with Shin-Kyaku (a move in Chinese martial arts).

name: Desmatosuchus
summary:
Desmatosuchus is a genus of large, quadrupedal aetosaur Pseudosuchian; its name comes from the Greek words δεσμός (desmos), which means "link," and σοῦχος (soûkhos), which means "crocodile." This heavily armored reptile's back was covered by median scutes surrounded by two more rows of lateral scutes,[1] along with large acromion processes (or shoulder spikes),[2] which would have served as its primary defense against predators such as Postosuchus. It is most widely thought to be a herbivore, with its blunt teeth and shovel-like snout helping it to dig up vegetation to eat.[1][2]
It was widely spread across Pangaea during the late Triassic around 228–210 million years ago, found in the Dockum formation, Chinle formation, and Post quarry; the density of numbers in specific areas also hints it was likely a herd animal.[2]

name: Pearl Fey
summary: Pearl Fey was a member of a branch family of the Fey clan and the daughter of Morgan Fet. She had lived the first part of her life in Kurain Village, never have seen the world beyond it. She lived with her mother, and her sisters, Maya and Mia, until Mia had left to pursue a career as a defense attorney. Later, she met Phoenix Wright though completely avoided him, until a murder occurred later, and he showed her Maya's Magatama. She immediately became as helpful as she possibly could, figuring out this was the "Mr Nick" Maya spoke so much about. Due to having seen many bad marriages, after she met with Phoenix Wright, she would try and force a romantic relationship on Phoenix and her sister Maya. With her help, Phoenix was able to solve the case and prove Maya's innocence. From there, Phoenix and Maya would make some visits back to the village, and eventually, Pearl became more active in helping others of Phoenix's investigations in her later years.

name: Hector (Fate)
summary: Lancer is a Lancer-class Servant able to be summoned by Ritsuka Fujimaru in the Grand Orders of Fate/Grand Order, first appearing in the third singularity as an enemy Servant, Okeanos.

name: Ringo Takamizawa
summary: Ringo Takamizawa is a major character in Dessert Eagle who is hell-bent on revenge against the Ten'Ichi Union for what they did to his mom. Parents on those who took everything from his mother and is the best friend Ichigo.

name: Jak
summary: Jak changes notably as a character over the course of the series. During The Precursor Legacy, he is presented as brave and curious, willing to step into dangerous situations given the need. The most notable feature of his personality, in the beginning, was his apparent mutism. In Jak II, he breaks away from his mutism, and after being subject to dark eco treatments for two years at the hands of Baron Praxis, his main basis becomes revenge, and he became angry and reckless—this is exacerbated by the presence of dark eco in his body. He also takes some enjoyment in killing metal heads and a fondness for guns. Nonetheless, Jak does retain some heroic personality traits. In Jak 3, where he gained light eco powers to balance the dark eco, he becomes less angry and more mature; which was further aided by the death of his father later on. In Jak X: Combat Racing, he turned into somewhat of a relaxed character, though his final encounter with Mizo shows that the anger still exists under a calmer exterior. In The Lost Frontier, he seems to be more carefree and happy. Despite some scenes hinting his anger (for example, when he tries to turn to Dark Jak, seeing the Dark Warrior Program chair, among others) he seems to be more cheerful than the rest of the series.

name: Judge Doom
summary: Judge Doom, real name Baron von Rotten, is a corrupt judge presiding over Toontown and the main antagonist of the film Who Framed Roger Rabbit?. He is the culprit behind a series of murders starting from the homicide of detective Eddie Valiant's brother, Teddy, to the recent murders of Marvin Acme and R.K. Maroon.

name: Nia Teppelin
summary: Nia Teppelin (ニア・テッペリン, Nia Tepperin) is the disowned daughter of Lordgenome and is one of the main protagonists of Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann. She is also an artificial being made by the Antispiral and serves as the main antagonists' messenger in the third act. She is Simon's main love interest, and eventually marries him in the final episode before she fades away, yet her love for him remains and connects them.

name: Odin (God of War)
summary: Odin (Old Norse: Óðinn, Nordic: ᚢᚦᛁᚾ) was the king of the Aesir, father of prominent gods such as Thor, Baldur, and Heimdall, and the overarching antagonist of the Norse Saga in the God of War franchise, initially introduced as an unseen tyrant in God of War (2018) before making his debut in God of War: Ragnarök. He was driven by a desire to rule over all the realms and discover the true meaning behind his own existence, obsessively researching into a mysterious rift that he believed to contain his answers while also desperately attempting to stave off Ragnarök.
abilities: Superhuman Physical Characteristics
Immortality (Types 1 and 3)
Regeneration (Mid-Low, healed after being wounded by the Leviathan Axe [ 1 ] , which left a massive scar on Thor [ 2 ] )

Runic Magic (Is a master of Seidr , Bifrost and Vanir magics on top of his own runic abilities)

Acausality ( Type 4: Time was created [ 4 ] only when Ymir’s blood was spilt [ 5 ] by Odin, also showcased by Ancients existing around after the time of Odin killing Ymir , [ 6 ] and yet are still described as having existed during the beginning of time)

Curse Manipulation , Statistics Reduction and Power Nullification ( Placed several curses upon Freya [ 6 ] , including one that removed her ability to harm others even in self defense [ 6 ] , leaving her gasping for air and blacking out trying to counter him [ 7 ] . Cursed the wild mists of Niflheim [ 8 ] , which weakens and curses it victims [ 6 ] )
Genius Intelligence & Social Influencing

Shapeshifting & Transformation (Able to turn into a hawk [ 7 ] , disguised himself by taking the form of Tyr and obtained Freyr's sword by disguising himself as the most beautiful person he had ever seen [ 3 ] , capable of transforming specific body parts such as his arm into a talon [ 7 ] )
Forcefield Creation (Can create barriers of ice magic , fire magic , or Bifrost energy to protect himself from harm [ 1 ] )
Portal Creation and BFR (His curse on Freya kept her bound to Midgard, opening a portal that drags her back if she enters another realm [ 6 ] )
Flight (Capable of flying while in the form of a hawk . [ 7 ] Can also fly with the usage of Bifrost Magic)

Dimensional Travel (Can use his ravens to freely warp to different locations and travel directly to other realms [ 3 ] )
Corruption ( Can corrupt magic to the point that others skilled in magic are unable to dispel it and corrupted the Valkyries [ 6 ] )
Summoning and Animal Manipulation ( Can summon large flocks of ravens and command them to attack and restrict his foes [ 1 ] )
Light Manipulation ( Can create flashes of light [ 1 ] , blinded Mimir with a flash of light when he turned into a giant hawk [ 7 ] )
Darkness Manipulation ( Created the Black Breath [ 6 ] )
Plant Manipulation and Fusionism ( Controlled roots and brought them up from the earth to bind Mimir to a nearby tree [ 7 ] , merging his very body with it in the process [ 6 ] )
Memory Manipulation ( Erased Huginn & Muninn's memories [ 10 ] , when the Einherjar come out of Valhalla he restores their memories [ 3 ] )
Limited Sound Manipulation and Limited Shockwave Generation ( Generated a small shockwave with his voice [ 1 ] )
Heat Manipulation ( Cast a spell on Atreus, Thrud, and Heimdall to keep them warm while in Helheim [ 3 ] )
Homing Attack & Sense Manipulation ( Can create magic orbs that can home in on his targets and greatly hinder their sight [ 1 ] )
Mind Manipulation (When he gives the Einherjar their memories back he also embeds undying loyalty to himself within them [ 3 ] )
Perception Manipulation (Was capable of hiding the murder of Groa's husband from her sight [ 6 ] )
Life Manipulation ( Gave life to Ask and Embla, the first humans [ 11 ] )

Transmutation , Soul Manipulation , Mind Manipulation , Memory Manipulation , Probability Manipulation and Conceptual Manipulation (Type 1) (Souls are constructs of magic, composed of their form, the metaphysical nature of a being, their luck, their mind and their direction . Trapped the souls of the Valkyries in physical forms [ 6 ] and is a master of Seiðr Magic, which can take souls and transform them in accordance with the users will [ 10 ] . Corrupted children's souls sacrificed in his name and transmuted them into his eyes. [ 12 ] Damaging souls can shatter and fragment their memories as a consequence [ 13 ] )

Space - Time Manipulation (Closing Realm Tears is an act that can be accomplished by sheer strength [ 14 ] from the wielder, meaning that this can be accomplished by anyone equal to or stronger than Norse Era Kratos , Sigrun and those comparable to them like Ares )

Probability Manipulation , Empathic Manipulation , Fire Manipulation & Ice Manipulation (Mighty enough battle can generate impossible materials such as the Chaos Flame [ 15 ] and the Frozen Flame, [ 16 ] the former being made up [ 14 ] of the hottest fires of Muspelheim, [ 17 ] which is that of Surtr's Primordial fire, which had birthed all the stars and suns, giving heat to the young cosmos. [ 14 ] The latter is made up of the chilling Mists of Niflheim, [ 18 ] and houses the rage of fire and the temper of ice [ 16 ] )

name: Gabriel T. Rorke
summary: Gabriel T. Rorke was the leader of the Ghosts until he and his team were sent to assassinate General Diego Almagro in Caracas and he was left behind due to an unfortunate event. 12 years later, he is the commander of the Federation Armed Forces stationed in the United States while seeking vengeance on his former comrades for abandoning him.

name: Kili Surtr Muspelheim
summary: Kili Surtr Muspelheim is one of the main female characters in the Unlimited Fafnir series.

name: Takeshi
summary: Takeshi is the main protagonist of Final Ninja series.

name: Jigsaw Witch
summary: The Jigsaw Witch is a character who appears in the Jigsaw Puzzle World, guarding the mirror and Daily Toy Box.

name: Hydra (The Real World)
summary: Hydra is a genus of small underwater carnivorous hydrozoans. Hydras are notable for their regeneration (which is also the origin of their name), as well as the fact that they appear to be immortal.

name: Star-Spangled Bastard
summary: The Star-Spangled Bastard is a superhero who defends American values, primarily gun rights. His unusually violent methods result in many people questioning whether or not he is truly a hero.

name: Freddy Krueger
summary: In life, Freddy Krueger was a sadistic monster of a man who tortured and killed children. Getting out of court on a technicality, he was killed by the parents of his former victims and burnt alive. However, he returns as a vengeful spirit in dreams after making a deal with the Dream Demons, seeking to exact revenge on the children of those who killed him . In exchange for power, he would kill the living in their dreams and the Dream Demons would channel their souls - and his first victims would be those who survived his rampages in the past.

name: Salome
summary: Salome is a member of the Kamisato Faction and Kamisato Kakeru's non-blood-related younger sister. Salome has known and looked up to Kakeru since they were kids, but she is a monster who can't get along with normal human society. Salome had broken even before Kakeru had gotten World Rejector, and has hunted down and killed hopeless end-of-the-world cults, drug dealers and other types of criminals since she was young. Despite being considered the faction's strongest fighter who could walk right into and single-handedly destroy the White House, she was so troublesome the other girls of the faction and Kakeru had restrained her and trapped her before their journey to Academy City. However, Salome escaped her imprisonment and traveled to Academy City, desiring to help Kakeru by picking a fight with the Kamijou Faction.

name: The Piano Ghost
summary: The Piano Ghost is the ghost of the German composer Ludwig van Beethoven.

name: Martin Blank
summary: After assassin Martin Blank has trouble focusing on his work, resulting in a failed assignment, he returns to his hometown for his 10-year high school reunion. There he meets Debi Newberry, an old girlfriend that he stood up for the prom. Martin's secretary sets up a hit for him while he is in town, but Martin starts to reconsider his life. Meanwhile, he is hounded by an unstable rival hit man, Grocer.

name: Zhuge Liang (Caster)
summary: Caster is a Caster-class Servant able to be summoned by Ritsuka Fujimaru in the Grand Orders of Fate/Grand Order.

name: Enclave Soldier
summary: One of the very few old world organizations to survive the Great War, the Enclave finds its roots in various branches of the pre-War American government and military. Its founding members embraced the inevitability of nuclear war; they believed that the majority of the nation could not and would not survive it, and that as long as the important people' of the United States survived, they could regroup quickly when worse came to worst, ultimately wipe out communism once and for all, and restore and rebuild the country.

name: Afuro Terumi
summary: Afuro Terumi, or Byron Love, was the captain and forward of Zeus Jr. High in the first game of Inazuma Eleven, under the guise of Aphrodi (or Aphrodite). Under Kageyama, Zeus Jr was an overwhelming dominant team that had easily got to the finals of the tournament, easily defeating Raimon's rivals Teikoku Gakuen in a humiliating score. Like the rest of Zeus Jr, Aphrodi had taken the God's Aqua, a special drug apart of Kageyama's 'Project Z' which enhanced his abilities to god-like levels.

name: Spark Man (Classic)
summary: Spark Man was a Robot Master created by both Dr. Light and a seemingly reformed Dr. Wily to recharge the equipment necessary to mine the Energy Elements on an uncharted planet that was necessary to power Gamma, a giant robot the two doctors were designing whose original intent was keep the peace and enforce the law. However, Spark Man, alongside the other seven Robot Masters designed for this purpose, suddenly went haywire, and he was eventually taken down by Mega Man on his quest to retrieve the Energy Crystals.

name: Merlin (Kingdom Hearts)
summary: Merlin is a recurring character in the Kingdom Hearts series. He is a wizard who teaches Sora  in the arts of magic when the boy appears in Traverse Town.

name: Victor Chevalier
summary: Victor Chevalier is a member of the United Nations and the leader and founder of it's armed forces: The Raven Unit.

name: Plutomon
summary: Plutomon is a Digimon who attacks evil with terror and violence and governs the realm of the dead. It wanders the world pursuing criminals or villains who deserve to fall into the realm of the dead, and it is said that if it detects prey, Plutomon appears wrapped up in a deep darkness. Plutomon, who finds joy only in chewing the wicked, has mouths lined with sharp fangs throughout its body, and the mouths make a chattering sound when it's pursuing its prey. It is feared even by good Digimon for this oddity. It is similar to Jupitermon, who belongs to the Olympos XII, as far as punishing evil, but Jupitermon will not admit it due to its cruelty, and it's said that there's always been a longstanding discord between the two.

name: Ashley Stillons II
summary: Ashley Stillons II is a clone of the original Damsel of Distress, a small time villain who got recruited into the Slaughterhouse Nine and was unceremoniously killed by Defiant. Her personality was cobbled together out of Bonesaw's impressions of the original alongside phantom memories provided by her shard, resulting in her personality being a fragmented version of the original, while also being shaped by her own experiences. After surviving the end of the world, she's joined the therapy group and hero team Breakthrough, forming new friendships and going down a different and more heroic path.

name: Passionlip
summary: Alter Ego M, whose True Name is Passionlip (パッションリップ, Passhonrippu?), is an Alter Ego created by BB. A High-Servant composed of the goddesses Parvati, Durga, and the Valkyrie Brynhildr, she falls in love with the protagonist over the course of the story, but is forced to attack them under orders from her "mother".

name: Menardi (Golden Sun)
summary: Menardi is one of the main antagonists of the first Golden Sun. She, along with her partner Saturos, were trying to enter Mt. Aleph to uncover the power of alchemy, but accidentally activated a trap that resulted in an unforgiving storm upon the nearby village of Vale. Three years later, they followed Isaac, Garet, and Jenna to the lighthouse in hopes of stealing the elemental stars that resides in the mountain. After they've obtained 3 of the 4 elemental stars, they traveled around the world of Weyard to activate the 4 lighthouses to unleash the power of alchemy, only to meet their untimely demise at the hands of Isaac and his friends at the Venus lighthouse.

name: Ageha Yoshina
summary: Ageha Yoshina (夜科 アゲハ Yoshina Ageha) is the main protagonist of Psyren.

name: Angelique Bouchard (Dark Shadows Movie)
summary: Angelique Bouchard is a powerful witch who torments the Collins family of Collinsport, Maine, from approximately 1776 until 1972. Reinventing herself every generation, she brings chaos to the family, in part out of a love-hate relationship with the original heir to Collinwood, Barnabas Collins. She is obsessed with the vampire Barnabas Collins and the main antagonist in "Dark Shadows".

name: Frost (Warframe)
summary: Frost is an ice-themed Warframe that is able to utilize offensive and defensive skills to both his own and his team's advantage. Commanding furious blizzards that pummel and freeze his enemies while providing respite and solace for his allies.

name: Bullseye (Marvel Cinematic Universe)
summary: Benjamin Leonard "Dex" Poindexter is a veteran of the United States Army and a former FBI agent who possesses a remarkable talent for accuracy. Struggling with a mental illness throughout his life, Poindexter relied on structure and rules to maintain his sanity with the counseling of Eileen Mercer, whose death affected Poindexter, leading him to stalk his former co-worker Julie Barnes. When he used his skills to save Wilson Fisk's life as a member of his federal escort, Poindexter was manipulated into becoming Fisk's personal assassin. He was tasked with impersonating Daredevil in order to turn the public against him while ensuring Ray Nadeem and Karen Page did not expose Fisk. Upon the real Daredevil's revelation to Poindexter that Fisk had been playing him and had orchestrated Barnes' murder, Poindexter turned against his superior and went on a rampage at Fisk's wedding in an attempt to kill him. While fighting Daredevil, Poindexter was defeated by Fisk, who broke his spine.

name: Captain Cold (Post-Crisis)
summary: Once a jovial, well-respected gentleman thief of a bygone age, Leonard Snart, better known as Captain Cold let his heart grow colder and bitter after the world kept grinding him down and spitting in his face. After many failed heists and the increasing violence of superheroes, Snart became the very thing he hated; a true-blue supervillain, though he never quite lost his core morals of only killing when necessary, or for vengeance. Despite his demeanor and image, Snart was among the most warm-hearted villains on the street, showing compassion for those in need, and truly loved his friends and sister, though rarely let them know it.

name: Blackflame Monk Amon
summary: Blackflame Monk Amon Ashes is a Spirit and Summon in Elden Ring.

name: Chun Mu-seong
summary: Chun Mu-seong is a descendant of the Cheon Family from the future that has traveled to present time in the story to give the 7th Generation Nano Machine to his ancestor Chun Yeowun.

name: Sara (Touhou Project)
summary: Sara is the Stage 1 boss of Mystic Square and the gatekeeper of Makai, the realm created by Shinki.

name: Squigly
summary: Squigly is the last “surviving” member of the Contiello family, a long lineage of opera singers and among the Medicis’ most valued clients. Fourteen years ago, Squigly’s mother Selene obtained the Skull Heart, resulting in Lorenzo Medici ordering an attack on the Contiello family. Fraught with despair, Selene became the Skullgirl and revived her family as an undead army. What spared Squigly from becoming a mindless minion was the intervention of the Parasite Leviathan, the Contiello family’s friend and guardian.
abilities: ​Lich Slap: Squigly slaps the opponent on the first hit and Leviathan bites the opponent on the second hit. Chains twice.
Tail Light: Squigly prays to a little candle on Leviathan's tail.
Drake Bite: Leviathan bites directly below Squigly.

Piercing Gaze: Leviathan stabs his tail out of Squigly's empty eye socket, then curls it for a second hit. The first hit has shorter range and pulls the opponent towards Squigly while the second hit has the attack's full range.
Serpent Spear: Squigly pushes the opponent away with the tip of Leviathan's tail.
Conqueror Wyrm: Squigly performs a down-forward palm thrust with Leviathan's breath as backup, which stops their momentum in the air.
Bune Knuckle: Squigly punches with both arms, which Leviathan follows with a similar pincer attack with his head and tail.
Cremation: Leviathan breaths fire.
Dragon Strike: Leviathan extends forward for a long range bite attack.
Croisé: Leviathan pokes the opponent with his tail.
Écart: Squigly does a split kick.
Coffin Nail: A stronger form of Serpent Spear.
Death Drop: Squigly kicks during a salsa dip pose with Leviathan.
En Pointe: Squigly kicks forward in a pose as if she was laying in a coffin.
Ouroboros Circlet: Leviathan forms a loop for the first hit, then spins for 3 additional hits if the first touches an opponent.
Dust to Dust: Squigly and Leviathan kick upwards, launching the opponent into the air.
Dance of Salome: Leviathan sweeps his tail at the enemy's feet.
Madame Dragonfly: While in the air Leviathan swings his tail below Squigly.
Ashes to Ashes: Leviathan shoots a powerful jet of fire over Squigly's head.

name: Yurina Amatsu
categories: My Vampire Older Sister and Zombie Little Sister
summary: Yurina Amatsu is Satori Amatsu's stepmother, who married his father after his divorce and also brought Erika and Ayumi into the household. While seemingly a normal housewife that works part-time as a cashier, she's actually the Archenemy Lilith and part of the mysterious organization known as Absolute Noah.

name: Ichibē Hyōsube
summary: Ichibe Hyosube (兵主部 一兵衛, Hyōsube Ichibē?) is the leader of the Royal Guard, known as the Monk who Calls the Real Name (真名呼和尚, Manako Oshō?) thanks to his ability to identify the true names of any being. It was he who named all things in the Soul Society, including Zanpakuto, Shikai, and Bankai, and his own Zanpakuto was the first to reach a second released state.

name: Jörmungandr (Toaru)
summary: Jörmungandr is a magician and Gremlin member named after one of Loki's children, the Norse serpent big enough to wrap around the entire world. He was deployed to intercept a Russian bomber squadron sent by the Anti-Gremlin alliance to spur Japan into action as Gremlin invaded Tokyo, but he was interrupted by Stiyl Magnus.

name: Raphael (4Kids)
summary: Raphael or Raph for short is one of the four main protagonists in Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles and a member of the TMNT. He is the younger brother of Leonardo, older brother of Donatello and Michelangelo, and the second son of Master Splinter. He is "The Muscle" of the team.

name: Zirconiade
summary: Zirconiade, also known as a legendary Summon, is a major antagonist and the final boss in Before Crisis -Final Fantasy VII.
abilities: Superhuman Physical Characteristics , Large Size (Type 1), Longevity (Summon as part of the Planet's ecosystem [ 1 ] could have existed for millions or billions of years), Immortality (Type 8. As long as copies of their Materia exist, Summons cannot be permanently killed off), Incorporeality and Non-Physical Interaction (Summons are of similar nature [ 2 ] as Minerva, a being who trascends matter [ 2 ] entirely), Flight (Appears to levitate on the sky of its dimension, however doesn't seem to move around), Body Control (Has several "drone" like assist Summons as part of itself, called Zirconia Guards, that it controls remotely. Can detatch the spikes on its back to hover around the battlefield and shoot independently from the main body), Invulnerability (if the Zirconia Guards are active, Zirconiade will absorb [ 3 ] any attacks thrown at it), Life Manipulation (It can absorb the life [ 3 ] of others to sustain itself, such as Elfé to compensate the damaged state of its own Summoned Materia), Empowerment (It can greatly increase the capabilities of whoever has its Materia. This allowed Elfé [ 3 ] to briefly match Sephiroth ), Aura that includes Fear Manipulation and Pain Manipulation (Zirconiade has an Aura [ 3 ] of such pressure that feels it can crush its enemies and instills fear in them), Energy Manipulation (can use its Spirit Energy to create rays of light that fall on its opponents or to unleash a massive beam of energy in front of itself. Its detatched spikes can shoot barrages of laser like beams independently of the main body), Pocket Reality Manipulation and Spatial Manipulation (Like all Summons, Zirconiade sustains its own dimension [ 2 ] , which collapsed when Zirconiade [ 3 ] was destroyed. Its mere summoning caused to break some of the boundaries between its own realm and the real world, creating a path [ 3 ] to itself), Reflection Negation (The special attacks of Summons cannot be reflected [ 4 ] by shields or barriers)
Energy Projection (Can create spheres of energy that rotate around it to repel enemies), Summoning (Can summon several arachnoid creatures to protect itself)

name: Hysilens
summary: Hysilens, real name Helektra, is a playable character in Honkai: Star Rail.
