[ 10 ] She can also reduce her opponent's Elemental Resistances [ 10 ] )

name: Dobermann
summary: The Dobermann is a German breed of medium-large working dog of pinscher type. It was originally bred in Thuringia in about 1890 by Louis Dobermann, a tax collector. It has a long muzzle and – ideally – an even and graceful gait. The ears were traditionally cropped and the tail docked, practices which are now illegal in many countries.

name: Shocker (Marvel Cinematic Universe)
summary: Herman Schultz is a former salvage worker who had become a professional criminal and one of the key members of Adrian Toomes' Crew who had sold alien-human hybrid weaponry created by the Tinkerer. As Toomes had murdered his former crewmate Jackson Brice, who had used a modified gauntlet occasionally under the alias of Shocker, Toomes passed the gauntlet down to Schultz and then appointed him as the new Shocker. With his new title and power of the gauntlet, Schultz continued to aid Toomes with fighting Spider-Man's attempts to stop all their black market arms deals, eventually resulting in the Shocker being defeated during a fight and arrested. (Marvel Cinematic Universe Wiki)

name: Kagari (Moon)
summary: Kagari is the familiar of the Moon, that was created for the purpose of searching for possibilities in which life could continue to survive.

name: Bracken
summary: There is debate on the genus to which the Bracken belongs. It is a bipedal vertebrate with skin the color and texture of a red beet. The name is coined for what appear to be leaves protruding from its upper spine. The purpose of these is believed to be for intimidation; however, not much is known about the specifics of bracken behavior due to its elusiveness and low population.

name: Robert de Sablé
summary: Robert de Sablé (1150-1191) was the 11th Grand Master of the Knights Templar from 1190 until his death, and a lieutenant in King Richard I's Crusader army.

name: Black Doom
summary: Black Doom (ブラック・ドゥーム, Burakku Dūmu?) is an antagonist within the Sonic the Hedgehog franchise, the primary antagonist within Shadow the Hedgehog, and the being who created the Black Arms legion over two thousand years ago.[1] While the alien tyrant would occasionally visit Earth, checking on the planet and preparing it to become livestock through the Prosperity Ritual[2] while also terrorizing local populations,[3], they were unable to conquer it due to their home-- the Black Comet-- being unable to withstand the resistance of a planet's atmosphere.
abilities: Black Doom
Doom's Eye
Devil Doom

name: Cavaliere (Netflix DMC)
summary: Cavaliere is one of the Demons White Rabbit commanded to the Human Realm to steal Dante's Amulet and get the son of Sparda stronger so that they could open and tear off the barrier that separated both the Human World and Makai. Cavaliere is the most stoic out of the ones recruited by White Rabbit, barely saying any words, on top of that, he also seems to be the one with the highest rank among them, as the lesser Demons present call him commander.

name: Starfire (Injustice)
summary: Starfire is a Teen Titan and appears in the Year Three Annual of the Injustice: Gods Among Us Comic, and as a DLC playable character in Injustice 2.

name: Hiroki Dan (Brutal: Satsujin Kansatsukan No Kokuhaku)
summary: Homicide detective Hiroki Dan, the son of a former police superintendent general, seems to be on the fast track to career success. However, he maintains a hidden identity as a serial killer responsible for more than a hundred murders of people he deems beyond the reach of the law.

name: Clara
summary: Clara (クラーラ, Kurāra?) a young girl raised by a robot. Her perceptiveness and tenacity are far beyond her years. For Clara, Svarog's logical calculations are the laws of the world and are infallible. That is, until she realizes that the results from the calculations don't always necessarily bring joy to everyone. The once shy little girl then decides to cast aside her timidness.

name: Candice Catnipp
summary: Candice Catnipp (キャンディス・キャットニップ, Kyandisu Kyatonippu?) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter, possessing the designation "T" - The Thunderbolt.

name: Grizzly Nyah
summary: Grizzly Nyah (グリズニャー, Gurizunyā) was a Mysterious Being that used to belong to a Hero Association staff.

name: Miquella the Kind
summary: Miquella the Kind is a demigod and the final boss along with his Promised Consort Radahn in the 2024 DLC to Elden Ring, Shadow of the Erdtree. He is the son of Radagon and Marika, as well as twin brother to Malenia.

name: Akatsuki Ousawa
summary: Akatsuki Ousawa is the main male protagonist of the series, often referred to as "The Rogue Hero" and "The True Hero." After defeating the Demon King in Alayzard, Akatsuki returns to Earth along with Miu who is the daughter of the Demon King, Galious and was entrusted to him by her father to protect her. Akatsuki then began to attend Babel school along with Miu (posing her as his late younger sister).

name: Gafka
summary: Gafka is a playable character in Radiant Historia. He was a Gutral from Forgia who was known as one of his village's strongest fighters. But after being banished, he moved to Celestia to work as a bodyguard. While most Gutrals have cut off all ties with humans, Gafka remains sympathetic to humanity.

name: Guo Jing
summary: Guo Jing (郭靖) is the main protagonist of the Hong Kong wuxia novel The Legend of the Condor Heroes and a supporting character in the second part of the Condor Trilogy, "The Return of the Condor Heroes". His mother, who was still pregnant with him, fled to Mongolia to escape enemies that killed his father.

name: Cui
summary: Cui (キュイ, Kyui; lit. "Kiwi") is an alien character and villain in the Dragon Ball manga and Dragon Ball Z anime; he also briefly appeared in Dragon Ball GT. He is an elite soldier who serves under Frieza in the Frieza Force. His name in Japanese is an alternate spelling of the kiwi fruit.

name: Ocean Sunfish
summary: The Ocean Sunfish, also known as the Mola mola, is a large species of fish that inhabits tropical and temperate waters worldwide. They are the largest bony fish in the world, and have a maximum recorded length and weight of 4.2 meters from fin to fin and 2300 kilograms, respectively. Ocean sunfish typically feed on small fish, jellyfish, and crustaceans, and can jump three meters out of the water in order to rid themselves of parasites.

name: Smoke (Second Timeline)
summary: Tomas Vrbada, commonly known as Smoke is a ninja assassin of the Lin Kuei Clan, and an ally of Kuai Liang. After discovering that the members of their clan were going to be automated into machines, they refused to follow them and fled. His fate depends on the timeline as he was converted into a Cyborg in the original timeline and resurrected as a Revenant in the current one.

name: Enami Yasuhiro
summary: Enami Yasuhiro is the head of Shikabane.

name: Knochen
categories: The Death Mage who doesn't want a fourth time
summary: Knochen is a monster created when Vandalieu combined Bone Monkey, Bone Wolf, Bone Bear and Bone Bird. Since then it has evolved into a Bone Pandemonium, an enormous living palace of bone. It's considered the strongest species of undead known to man. Knochen takes the form of a bone palace that is larger than castles of large nations and populated by countless Skeletons. There likely isn't an S-Class Adventurer that would want to fight Knochen, because even if they can somehow fight of the armies of Skeletons and the living fortress, which constitute Knochen, they might starve to death before the battle comes to an end. Knochen is largely composed out of Monster and Dragon bones. Notably, Vandalieu has fed it with plenty of Demon King bones as well, giving it bones that can't be harmed without something on the level of Orichalcum weapons.

name: Eva (Total Drama)
summary: Eva is a minor antagonist of Total Drama Island. She is a violent and ill-tempered bully and one of the strongest players at Camp Wawanakwa. She was the first female to be voted off after Heather stole her MP3 player, and she threw a fit by blaming everyone.

name: Flandre Scarlet
summary: Flandre Scarlet (フランドール・スカーレット) is the younger sister of Remilia Scarlet and a vampire who has lived at the Scarlet Devil Mansion for over 495 years.
abilities: Superhuman Physical Characteristics Immortality ( Types 1 & 3 ) Incorporeality ( Youkai are stated to be unbound from the confines of the material world [ 1 ] , and are made of Spirit [ 2 ] ) Regeneration ( Mid-Godly ; Youkai are able to recover from bodily destruction, despite being made of Spirit [ 3 ] [ 4 ] . They can also quickly recover from their Spirit being drained or destroyed. Mid against spiritual attacks; Can regenerate from just her heat) Enhanced Senses ( Youkai can see better than humans in the dark of night [ 5 ] ) Acrobatics
Immortality ( Types 1 & 3 )
Incorporeality ( Youkai are stated to be unbound from the confines of the material world [ 1 ] , and are made of Spirit [ 2 ] )

Regeneration ( Mid-Godly ; Youkai are able to recover from bodily destruction, despite being made of Spirit [ 3 ] [ 4 ] . They can also quickly recover from their Spirit being drained or destroyed. Mid against spiritual attacks; Can regenerate from just her heat)
Enhanced Senses ( Youkai can see better than humans in the dark of night [ 5 ] )
Acrobatics

Acausality ( Types 1 & 4 ; Unaffected by Keine erasing the human village from history [ 6 ] , despite the fact that youkai rely on the continued existence of the human village in order to sustain their own existence [ 7 ] . Exists within the Hakurei Barrier [ 8 ] , which created a world with a different flow of time [ 9 ] and different physical laws [ 10 ] . Should be comparable to those who can act normally inside Eientei, which exists outside of time and causality [ 11 ] [ 12 ] )
Non-Physical Interaction (Can harm Phantoms and Evil Spirits with her regular attacks)
Extrasensory Perception (Easily noticed that Meiling was possessed [ 13 ] )
Breaking the Fourth Wall (Is aware of the existence of game mechanics such as lives and continues [ 14 ] )
Immortality ( Types 1 & 3 )
Incorporeality ( Youkai are stated to be unbound from the confines of the material world [ 1 ] , and are made of Spirit [ 2 ] )

Regeneration ( Mid-Godly ; Youkai are able to recover from bodily destruction, despite being made of Spirit [ 3 ] [ 4 ] . They can also quickly recover from their Spirit being drained or destroyed. Mid against spiritual attacks; Can regenerate from just her heat)
Enhanced Senses ( Youkai can see better than humans in the dark of night [ 5 ] )
Acrobatics
Magic
Flight
Danmaku
Spirit Manipulation

Limited Creation & Conceptual Manipulation ( Type 1 ; The process of creating a spell card requires giving it a 'name' to define its form and power, not unlike how the gods gave 'names' to everything at the beginning of reality to give them form from nothingness, albeit on a much smaller scale [ 15 ] [ 16 ] [ 17 ] )

Power Modification ( Spell card users are capable of changing the traits of any attack or ability by naming it, being able to turn ordinarily lethal attacks into nonlethal ones, or severely restricting the potency of an ability by 'gameifying' it [ 18 ] [ 19 ] )

Space - Time Manipulation , Passive Durability Negation & Limited Power Nullification ( All spell card users are shown to possess magic circles , which have the properties of slowing anything within their radius down to a near stop . Flandre's magic circle also possesses her ability to destroy anything within its radius, including danmaku . Via the ability to name their spell cards, spell card users are able to distinguish things within space and time [ 20 ] )
Can destroy virtually anything by crushing its "eye"
Blood Absorption ( Able to absorb blood. In doing so, she can also release magic power that destroys everything [ 21 ] )
Duplication & Transformation (Can transform into flocks of bats or a cloud of mist )
Summoning ( Vampires can summon many devils with a single word )
Fire Manipulation (Can conjure up a flaming sword that shoots fire bullets)
Corruption ( Type 1 ; If a vampire drains blood from a victim's body, they will become a zombie )
Invisibility ( Turned invisible during her fight with Marisa )
Power Bestowal ( The mist generated by a vampire when their body is destroyed by sunlight can make one immortal if inhaled [ 22 ] )
Transmutation ( Can turn enemy projectiles into oil by grazing them [ 23 ] ) Organic Absorption & Self-Healing ( Can absorb oil to heal herself )
Organic Absorption & Self-Healing ( Can absorb oil to heal herself )
Soul Destruction (Destroyed Yuuma to such an extent that not even her soul was visible [ 24 ] )
Crystal Manipulation ( Can create crystals with her regular attacks )

Shapeshifting ( Capable of shapeshifting into a bat [ 25 ] Upon entering Gensokyo, youkai gained the ability to change their form as they please [ 26 ] [ 27 ] , often choosing to take forms more closely resembling that of humans [ 28 ] [ 29 ] )

Intangibility ( Youkai can break themselves down into [ 30 ] [ 31 ] , or regenerate from [ 32 ] [ 33 ] [ 34 ] [ 35 ] , a sort of black mist. They are also repeatedly shown to form from this mist out of thin air )

Aura , Sense Manipulation & Fear Manipulation ( All youkai possess 'youkai energy' that takes the form of an aura [ 36 ] . This aura can make one feel pins and needles throughout their body [ 37 ] , can make one start to tremble [ 38 ] , and is powerful enough to deliver these effects even while sealed away [ 39 ] . Successfully inducing fear in a target also allows a youkai to absorb their Spirit [ 40 ] )

Aura Suppression ( Youkai commonly infiltrate the human village without their auras affecting nearby people [ 41 ] , and are [ 42 ] shown [ 43 ] [ 44 ] [ 45 ] to be able to [ 46 ] mask their auras from [ 47 ] [ 48 ] Kosuzu , who can naturally detect such auras [ 49 ] )

Empowerment & Resistance Modification ( Youkai are empowered by human's belief in the rituals that can be used to combat or exorcise them, using them as a basis to solidify their existence and influence [ 50 ] . However, youkai are not bound by this, and can simply choose to be unaffected by such weaknesses on a whim, at the cost of the aforementioned empowerment [ 51 ] [ 52 ] . Youkai are even further empowered by the light of a full moon [ 53 ] )

Possibly Mind Manipulation & Empathic Manipulation (It's been stated that most youkai can control the world through the mental layer of reality [ 54 ] , which moves alongside the spirit and determines the emotions of all living beings. However, it is impossible to know specifically which youkai this applies to)
Organic Absorption & Self-Healing ( Can absorb oil to heal herself )

name: Crystal (Nuclear Throne)
summary: Crystal is the most survivability-focused mutant in the game. She can safely avoid most projectiles through the use of her Crystal Shield. She came from the Crystal Caves which is an area you go through in the game. Her family is still there, trapped in crystal form. She is the only one of her family that can still control her body and retain any memory of the time before the apocalypse. She is one of the two starting characters you get when first playing the game.

name: Abyssia
summary: Abyssia wields a sword imbued with the power to open rifts between space and time. No one knows what Abyssia looks like, as its true form remains forever hidden beneath its mask.

name: Katsuragi Yako
summary: Yako Katsuragi is a 16-year-old high school girl and the very first character introduced in the manga Majin Tantei Nougami Neuro. She meets Neuro when he appears and desecrates her father's shrine while promising to help solve the mystery of her father's death. This meeting quickly leads to a partnership: Yako becomes Neuro's cover, pretending to be an investigator while Neuro acts as her assistant.

name: Theodosia Electra
summary: Theodosia Electra is a magician and female member of Necessarius who uses Norse mythology as a base for her magic. Other magicians from Necessarius have commented on her habit to constantly change what main spell she uses because she is either very talented or just an idiot who gets tired of things quickly, though no matter the changes it always remains a Norse magic based spell. Theodosia was one of the people involved in Stiyl Magnus' mission regarding Patricia Birdway, having decided to ignore her orders to eliminate her once she realized her target was an innocent girl with no knowledge of magic. She was also part of Necessarius forces during the British Civil War.

name: Megabyte
summary: Megabyte is a major villain from the Reboot series. He is a virus bent on taking over Mainframe and the Super Computer.

name: Felicia (Marvel vs. Capcom)
summary: Felicia is a reoccurring protagonist in the Marvel vs. Capcom series. She is a catwoman with aspirations to become a musical star. She is one of the many individuals that joined several heroes and villains in order to take down Galactus.

name: YoRHa Type A No.2
summary: A2 is one of the main protagonists of NieR: Automata. She is a female model of the Type A (Attacker) series of androids produced by YoRHa. She is the prototype model for newer types of androids such as Type B and Type S. She was created for the purpose of fighting the machines which have invaded Earth.
abilities: Base
Plug-in Chips
Weapons
Resistances

name: Stalker (Death Forest)
summary: Kenji Omiya, also known as "Stalker", is one of the many antagonists of the 2014 Japanese horror game Death Forest. When he was alive, he was a bachelor and a hard working civil engineer. He was also a close friend of Ren Sudou who lived close by. When he was 23 in the year 2013, he drove Ren and Yoshida through the forest due to unspecified urgent business but his car broke down, leaving the group stranded. They were suddenly attacked by Yoshie and fled in different directions. Kenji tried to flee through the tunnel but once he saw that it was a dead end, he gave up and Yoshie eventually killed him.

name: Peter Port
summary: Peter Port is a character in RWBY. A professor at Beacon Academy, he is first seen in "The Badge and The Burden" teaching the Grimm Studies class, with Team RWBY and Jaune Arc from Team JNPR being present in his class. His weapon of choice is Blowhard, a blunderbuss outfitted with the blades of a battle axe.

name: Dromedon
summary: Dromedons are camel-like Grimm  introduced in RWBY: After the Fall. They are native to Vacuo that can spit acidic venom. and are shown to have armored humps.

name: Alfe
summary: Alfe is one of the three main protagonists in Problem Solverz. When Horace found him in the sewers as a baby, he and Roba raised him to his current state. Despite his naiveté and obsession over food often stalling the progression of his cohorts, he is almost always the one who saves the day.

name: Cernunnos (SMITE)
summary: Standing upon the edge of the wooded realm of Cernunnos, one can feel the invitation and the threat. “Come and feast,” it calls. “Nature provides an abundance of crops and wild game.” Yet, the same voice turns dark. “Treat everything with due respect,” it warns. “This is not your home.” And, should one peer intently enough through the shadowed branches, a figure can be seen, horned as a stag, clothed in moss and leaves, eyes burning like untended embers. Cernunnos is master here, and although he has much to offer, he will not tolerate greed.

name: Sniping Lee
summary: Sniping Lee is the fourth-ranked member in the Galactic Superhero Association. While he is an incredibly skilled sniper, he is killed by Notorious right before his fight with Travis Touchdown.

name: King Slime
summary: The King Slime is the greatest and strongest Slime found in Terraria besides Queen Slime. It is usually seen around the outer edges of the world or in Slime Rains. Despite its power, it is seen as one of the weakest bosses in the game.
abilities: Superhuman Physical Characteristics
Large Size (Type 0)
Teleportation
Duplication
Adaptation (Slimes are capable of adapting to any environment by changing the composition of their bodies)
Possibly Absorption (Dungeon Slimes are capable of absorbing the cursed energy of the dungeon to increase their power)

name: Third Angel (Rebuild)
summary: The Third Angel is an addition to the Angel pantheon introduced in Evangelion 2.0, a skeletal, vaguely dragon-like creature ultimately destroyed by Eva-05.

name: Protagonist-kun
summary: Protagonist-kun, also known as Protag-Kun, is the protagonist of the parody visual novel Kusoge made by Visual-wordplay.

name: Red Kangaroo
summary: The red kangaroo (Macropus rufus) is a species of marsupial native to Australia. It is the largest living marsupial, and the largest land-dwelling mammal in Australia. They are notable for their powerful jumps and kicks, which can deliver over 850 PSI of pressure.

name: Eli Yae (The Villain)
summary: Eli Yae is a secondary character in the Korean manhwa The Villain. He is the older brother and upperclassmen of Owen Yae. Eli is the leader of the strongest gang in Incheon known as "Hermes". In earlier arcs he acts as an antagonist to Brent Kang and his crew, constantly picking fights with the former for getting his younger brother hurt.

name: Leatherface (Thomas Hewitt)
summary: Thomas Hewitt, the man who would eventually become the raging beast known as Leatherface, was once a simple boy with a curse. He has a disease, which was slowly eating away at his flesh on his face, causing him to be disfigured. This led to him being a social outcast, and with his family's sadistic nature, this slowly turned him into a monster. This was further worsened when where Tommy worked (a slaughterhouse) was closed.

name: Vaggie
summary: Vaggie is Charlie's best friend and girlfriend, and manager of the Happy Hotel. A control freak, armed with an arsenal of bladed weapons and a fiery temper, she aims to somehow make Charlie's ridiculous goals an actuality.

name: Spider-Man (Spider-Man: The Manga)
summary: Yu Komori is the main character of Spider-Man: The Manga. He was just a normal high schooler until he was bit by a radioactive spider. This Spider changed his DNA and gave him special Spider Powers. Yu originally didn't want to be a superhero, but because of Electro attacking the city, he decided to become a superhero named Spider-Man.

name: Maximus Decimus Meridius
summary: Maximus Decimus Meridius is the main protagonist of the 2000 epic historical film Gladiator.

name: Attea
summary: Empress Attea is the daughter of the former Incursean Emperor Milleous and one of the main antagonists of the third arc of Ben 10: Omniverse.

name: Lu Guang
summary: Lù Guāng is one of the main lead protagonists of the series Link Click, alongside Chéng Xiǎoshí.

name: Qwerty
summary: QWERTY, was a state-of-the-art operating system designed to assist the Walters in interfacing with the Steam Powered Giraffe robots in the 1980s. Like Beebop, he is digital and currently helps with behind-the-scenes technical mumbo-jumbo during live concerts. While his 8-bit graphics and high-pitched monotonous voice might not be “hip”, “cool” , and “sleek” today, he is still reliable and dependable, which is why he is still made use of to this day. Qwerty tends to poke fun at things a lot, including his fellow robots, which they just love…

name: Geld (Light Novel)
summary: Geld「ゲルド Gerudo」is the leader of the Yellow Corps, that acts as both the last line of defense for the Jura-Tempest Federation as well as the main team of the country's Department of Construction and Manufacturing. He was named by Rimuru after the deceased Orc Disaster Geld and granted him the title of Orc King.

name: The Voodoo King
summary: The Voodoo King is the strongest person in the Beltline whose power surpasses even the likes of Yohan. He effortlessly stomped Der Kaiser and Paul Wan along with the Drei Ritter. When The Witch Queen tried to seal the 2 worlds apart he along with many others tried to stop her, though his struggle was to no avail and was later sealed inside Kagenuma Sarai's body.

name: Selvaria Bles
summary: Selvaria Bles (セルベリア・ブレス, Seruberia Buresu) is a 22 year old Brigadier General and a member of the Drei Stern under Maximilian's direct command. She is one of the leaders of the Empire's invasion of Gallia and one of the main antagonists in Valkyria Chronicles and Valkyria Chronicles 3.

name: Lara Tybur
summary: Lara Tybur was an Eldian noble living in Marley and secretly the inheritor of the War Hammer Titan. At some point within the past thirteen years, she inherited the power of the War Hammer Titan, though her inheritance of this power was kept a closely guarded secret. Upon inheriting the memories of her predecessors, she shared her knowledge with her brother Willy Tybur, who was stunned by the revelations she had inherited.

name: Master of Hell
summary: The Spider, identified by Wanyuudou as the God of Hell, is the one that punished Ai with the burden of being the Hell Girl. After an enraged Ai had burnt down her village, killing most of its residents, the Spider took the souls of her loved ones (her parents) hostage, and threatened to make them wander through the darkness for eternity unless Ai performs the tasks it gives her. The Spider is ever watchful of Ai's actions, always looking for a chance to spot her acting on impulse, which is apparently against the rules of the Hell Girl. It would seem that The Spider even deliberately makes her face situations reminiscent of her past, in an effort to bring about the same. It also seems to try to provoke Yuzuki during her brief time as Hell Girl and succeeds in this.

name: Elsa Bryant
summary: Elsa Bryant is the main protagonist of the manhwa, Uglyhood.

name: Netherbeast
summary: Netherbeasts are monsters created as biological weapons in the Spirit World. Taking the form of harmless plushies and dolls when inactive, upon being activated Netherbeasts will suddenly grow in size and become violent superhuman monsters.

name: Count Dracula (Hotel Transylvania)
summary: Count Dracula is the owner of Hotel Transylvania and the main character of the films of the same name. He is the father of Mavis, grandfather of Dennis and is the son of Vlad. Commonly known as the Lord of Darkness Dracula tends to take his work very seriously and is often overprotective of his family (Specifically Mavis and Dennis) which often leads him into more trouble than he's looking for. He also hates the phrase "Blah blah blah".
abilities: Regular Outfit
Summer Vacation Outfit

name: Hulking Hurler
summary: A class for massive creatures, the Hulking Hurler is someone who specializes in throwing objects incredibly hard. Often found amongst Giants, there are some smaller creatures which employ these tactics and act as a sort of artillery.

name: Dan Katō
summary: Dan Katō was a renowned jōnin from Konohagakure. After the death of his younger sister, he began advocating for a medical ninja to be assigned to every squad. Tsunade shared a similar belief, and the two soon began dating because of it. During their time together Dan shared his dream of becoming Hokage with Tsunade — wanting the title so that he could better protect the villagers of Konoha which would prompt Tsunade to give Dan her grandfather's necklace for good luck and encouragement to follow that dream. Soon after that, Dan was fighting in the Second Shinobi World War, in which he killed countless shinobi with his Spirit Transformation Technique. Ultimately, he was fatally wounded during a battle, and while Tsunade was able to stop the bleeding, but it was a lost cause as the blood loss was too severe and Dan succumbed to his injuries. Tsunade would later take on Dan's niece, Shizune, as an apprentice and leave the village sometime after that, retiring from life as a shinobi.

name: Iori
summary: Iori is an enigmatic woman also known as The Purple Tear, one of the exalted Color Fixers of The City. Bearing an unexplained ability to scry and traverse across the infinite multiverse, Iori's made a multitude of connections to powerful and important people and always seems to have her involvement pop up in the most unexpected spaces. She's trained several other Color Fixers to get them to reach their peaks: Kali, the Red Mist, Argalia, the Blue Reverberation, Angelica, the Black Silence, and Roland, the second Black Silence all owe some of their prowess to her mentorship. She played a role in the events of Library of Ruina by influencing Roland to seek out the titular Library in the first place, influencing Olivier to make an attempt on Angela's life, entering The Library herself to be killed and used as a keypage against Argalia's Reverberation Ensemble, and even via planting some advice in Roland's head that would come back to him at just the right moment, resulting in the release of the Light and the subsequent resurrection of Iori. Past this phase, she's last been seen in combat with Vergilius, the Red Gaze, absconding with Tomerry for unknown reasons.

name: Agent 47 (2007)
summary: Agent 47 is an elite hitman who works for the Organization. In October 2007, he was sent to kill Mikhail Belicoff, the President of Russia. However, he realized he was set up to kill his body double and went on the run to uncover the reason he was betrayed.

name: Abzu (MonsterVerse)
summary: Abzu is a giant sub-titan starfish monster who appears in flashback in the "Tiamat" portion of the 2024 anthology graphic novel Monsterverse Declassified.

name: Pachycephalosaurus
summary: Pachycephalosaurus is a genus of dinosaur from the Cretaceus Period, known for their dome-shaped skulls. Cranial lesions in some specimens indicate that pachycephalosaurus may have exhibited headbutting behavior. It would've reached 4.5 meters long and weighed around 450 kg.

name: Lo Po Bia Traumerei
summary: Lo Po Bia Traumerei is one of the 10 Great Warriors and the head of the Lo Po Bia Family.
abilities: Abilities
Resistances

name: The White Shark
summary: Originally known by the name of Heinrich Guenther, Der Weisse Hai (The White Shark) was once a mentally unstable man who had killed numerous people in his life. He was sentenced to be shot, but the Nazis felt there was some use to him, and he was instead taken to be experimented on by the scientist by the name of Ernst Kruger. Heinrich was bioengineered and programmed to be a ruthless amphibious killing machine, his main function being to kill and eat the flesh of any who stood in his way.

name: Gondul (God of War)
summary: Göndul is a Valkyrie first introduced in God of War (2018). She is one of the Nine Valkyries cursed by Odin to remain in corporeal form, driving them to insanity as a result. As she became too dangerous, Sigrun sealed her off in Muspelheim. Widely considered to be one of the strongest Valkyries after Sigrun, she is ultimately freed by Kratos and his son Atreus after they bested her physical form in combat. Blessing them with her eternal gratitude, her spirit vanished and eventually reunited with her sisters.

name: Nagash
summary: Nagash, known by many names such as the Great Necromancer, the Great Betrayer, the Usurper, the Undying King, the Supreme Lord of Undeath or simply He Who Shall Not Be Named, is the ultimate personification of death and the undead, an ancient, evil being who sought to conquer this cruel, chaotic world and bring about an age of undeath that will rule for all eternity. Nagash is darkness and unreasoning hatred given form, the father and creator of foul Necromancy and lord of all Vampire-kind. His every actions and deeds is self-serving, his achievement horrific and loathsome, and his every whim are bent solely to ensure that no one shall ever deny nor challenge his right to rule ever again. This dark, evil being came close to ultimate domination, but if not for the sacrifice of an Alcadizaar the Conqueror, this world would've been lost millennia ago.

name: Victor Manning
summary: Detective Victor "Vic" Manning is a police officer in Los Angeles. Six months after his partner was killed by Oka Tedjo, the overseer of a heroin pipeline, Manning received a new lead in his investigation. However, he was temporarily blinded by laser eye surgery, and forced Uber driver Stu Prasad to aid him by driving him around.

name: Cherry Bomb
summary: The Cherry Bomb is an explosive type plant that explodes upon planting. It has a wide range and is capable of destroying multiple zombies at once, as long as they are within range of its blast.

name: Meliodas
summary: Meliodas is the Dragon's Sin of Wrath and the captain of the Seven Deadly Sins. In the present day, he cheerfully runs the Boar Hat, a bar based on top of a giant pig, serving patrons infamously terrible food along with his brand of liquor. The sin referred to in his epithet is the destruction of the Kingdom of Danafor, done by Meliodas in a fit of rage after his first battle with Fraudrin.
abilities: Without Lostvayne
With Lostvayne

name: Doc Waruyama
summary: Doc Waruyama is the leader of the secret organization known as Galaxy Gang, whose ambition is galactic conquest. He proclaims he is "one of the most genius scientists in all the galaxy". He considers himself separate from ordinary people and his schemes are always grand.

name: Junko Konno
summary: Junko Konno (紺野 純子, Konno Junko) is a member of Franchouchou and one of the protagonists in Zombie Land Saga. She was a soft-spoken idol from the Shōwa period who was popular during the 1980s before dying in a plane crash on her way to the Saga prefecture. Coming from an era without social media, she has reservations towards personally interacting with her fans.

name: Itachi Uchiha
summary: Itachi Uchiha was a prodigy of Konohagakure's Uchiha clan. He became an international criminal after murdering his entire clan, sparing only his younger brother, Sasuke.
abilities: Akatsuki
Anbu

name: Eli Morrow (Marvel Comics)
summary: Elias Morrow was a criminal and devil worshipper operating out of East Los Angeles until his brutal demise. His spirit supernaturally inhabited a Dodge Charger that fell into the possession of his nephew, Robbie Reyes. Bonding with one another, Eli and Robbie became the new Ghost Rider. Eli hid his true nature from Robbie and attempted to corrupt him by feeding his lust for vengeance. Robbie eventually learned the truth about Eli and fought to suppress his uncle's influence.

name: Android 21
summary: Android 21 is a New-Type Android created by Dr. Gero. When she was a human, she was the mother of the man who was the model for Android 16, presumably making her Gero's wife. Over time, Gero's Supercomputer continued to work on her, giving the cells of the universe's greatest warriors and minds, even Cell and Majin Buu.

name: The Big One
summary: The Big One, nicknamed that by Muldoon, is one of the primary antagonists of the iconic film Jurassic Park. She is a large alpha velociraptor, leading two other raptors, Randy and Kim, against the protagonists.

name: Vincent Valentine
summary: Vincent Valentine is a notable character in Final Fantasy VII, becoming the lead in Dirge of Cerberus -Final Fantasy VII-. Previously part of Shinra Company's elite Turks, he was a bodyguard for the Jenova Project's scientists in Nibelheim. This project centered on a newly discovered life form named Jenova. During this assignment, Vincent developed feelings for researcher Lucrecia Crescent. However, Lucrecia, indirectly responsible for the demise of Vincent's father in a prior experiment, distanced herself, turning to Professor Hojo. Vincent's dismay intensified upon learning the project's extreme measures: Lucrecia and Hojo, expecting a child, decided to infuse the fetus, Sephiroth, with Jenova's cells. Appalled, Vincent confronted Hojo, only to be shot and subjected to cruel experiments.

name: Holou
summary: Holou (帆楼, Horō) is the Goddess of Doubt and Trust, and the creator of Ex-Machina. She was the first and therefore oldest conscious being in the world. She is currently the self-proclaimed representative of the Old Deus, but her possession of the Race Piece has yet to be determined. She played a game with Sora and Shiro, called Sugoroku, afterwards those two proclaiming her to be the God of Wisdom.

name: Courtland Gentry
summary: Courtland Gentry, better known as Sierra Six or simply Six, is the last member member of the CIA's Sierra program, where criminals' sentences are commuted in exchange for serving as assassins. Members of the Sierra program are nicknamed "the gray men."

name: Leo (Armed With Wings)
summary: Leo is the central protagonist of the third game in the Armed With Wings series. The fatherless child of Eivana, born after the downfall of Vandheer Lorde in a small forest village, Leo lived a carefree life of monster-hunting until the day his mother and several villagers were kidnapped by a warlord named Gaaz with the intent of sacrificing them to Network. On his quest to save them, Leo eventually comes into conflict with a freed Vandheer Lorde, and discovers that he, like Lone Warrior before him, is destined to become Blackmist's champion and avatar.

name: Link (Spirit Tracks)
summary: As written in the Hyrule Historia, the Link in Spirit Tracks is chronologically the second Link in the Adult Timeline.

name: Cryotan (Monster Legends)
summary: Cryotan is a mighty Water Legendary in Monster Legends. He is a presumed arch-enemy of Ouros and Igursus, and is fittingly also considered one of the best tanks in the game.

name: Corbeau
summary: As the main antagonist of Puella Magi Tart Magica, Corbeau displays an uncanny speed, ability, and intelligence that can even endanger Tart and her allies. Though she allies herself with England in the Hundred Year War, she's actually from France; having been adopted by the Queen who desires both nations, Isabeau de Bavière.

name: The Holder of the Heart
summary: The Holder of the Heart is the guardian of Object 89, a small keychain with a red heart dangling from it.

name: Aida
summary: Artificial Intelligent Digital Assistant (A.I.D.A.) was originally a Life-Model Decoy created by Holden Radcliffe from a defunct S.H.I.E.L.D. program. Physically modeled after Radcliffe's former love interest Agnes Kitsworth, Aida was initially kept secret from the public as her presence was in violation of the Sokovia Accords. Under Radcliffe's supervision, Aida became a valued S.H.I.E.L.D. asset, saving Melinda May, rescuing Phil Coulson and Leo Fitz from Hell, and stopping Eli Morrow from destroying Los Angeles. Following Morrow's defeat, Aida's mainframe became corrupted by the Darkhold, killing Nathanson and replacing May with a Life-Model Decoy. While her actions had been carefully orchestrated by Radcliffe, who had also been corrupted by the Darkhold, Aida became consumed by a desire to feel human emotions.

name: Lamb-Bo
summary: Lamb-Bo is a common enemy found throughout Bubsy 2. It is a tan-colored lamb with a bullet belt strapped to it's waist. They served under Oinker as he tried taking over all of history.

name: Robin Hood (2010)
summary: Robin Longstride is an outlaw who became known during the turn of the 12th century, originally an archer in King Richard I's army. However, in face of the king's corruption, Robin stole the identity of Sir Robert Loxley to thwart his plans.

name: Binolt
summary: Binolt (ビノールト, Binōruto) is a former Greed Island player and is also a high-class criminal despite being a Blacklist Hunter. He is wanted for committing numerous acts of murder without any apparent concrete justification. He also "trained" Gon and Killua on Greed Island and after the two completely surpassed him in ten days, he resolved to hand himself over to the Hunter Association.

name: Stoick the Vast
summary: Stoick the Vast is Hiccup's late father, Valka's late husband, and the former chief of the Hairy Hooligan tribe. He hoped his son would mature and become strong enough to be chief himself one day, but feared that he was not suited to the Viking life.

name: Sylphiette (Light Novel)
summary: Sylphiette (シルフィエット Shirufietto) is Rudeus' childhood friend who is part human, elf, and beast race. Following the Teleport Incident, during which her hair turned white from mana exhaustion, she became Princess Ariel's personal bodyguard under the alias Fitts.

name: Nightmare (Danny Phantom)
summary: Nightmare is the horse of the Fright Knight who was sealed inside a pumpkin just like his master. Once Danny accidentally released the Fright Knight, the later quickly released Nightmare and road it after Danny. Throughout the series, Nightmare is the Fright Knight's main mode of transportation.

name: Minotaur Joe
summary: Raging Moon Warrior Minotaur Joe is the boss of the Moon Sea Dungeon and champion of the moon coliseum with a 38 consecutive win streak. His victory streak comes to an end when Toan and Osmond enter the coliseum and defeated him.

name: Vacuumon
summary: A cosmic world-eating Menace, Vacuumon is a dark monster that appeared in episode 23 of Return of Ultraman. It doesn't have a fixed shape and is instead amorphous like that of a dark nebula.

name: Overlord Baal
summary: Overlord Baal is a recurring Superboss that, showing up throughout the verse to challenge the characters of their respective game. Though in the verse Baal is a legendary demon that many think is a myth, but in reality he is an aggregate of evil souls that jumps from body to body after the current one he is using is defeated in battle. He is also known to target other netherworlds for destruction, which puts him into conflict with other overlords.

name: Gregory (Five Nights At Freddy's)
summary: Gregory is the primary protagonist of the indie horror game Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach. A young and mysterious boy who finds himself trapped within Freddy Fazbear's Mega Pizzaplex's closing hours. He must then evade the hostile animatronics and the serial killer Vanny while working together with Glamrock Freddy in order to survive the night and escape unharmed.

name: Kiyohime (Berserker)
summary: Berserker is a Berserker-class Servant able to be summoned by Ritsuka Fujimaru in the Grand Orders of Fate/Grand Order, first appearing in the Orleans Singularity as an ally Servant.

name: Laura Barns
summary: Laura Barns is the main antagonist of the film Unfriended. She was a high school student who committed suicide by shooting herself in the head on April 8, 2013, after an embarrassing video was posted online by her friends. She returns for revenge one year later.

name: Defendor
summary: Arthur Poppington was born to a hooker, who died from overdosing on drugs. He was mentally handicapped, so he thought that a man named "Captain Industry" had killed his mother. To find his mother he donned a black suit and took the name Defendor.

name: Cappy
summary: Cappy is one of the newest characters introduced in Super Mario Odyssey. Cappy is a ghostly resident of the Cap Kingdom. When his sister Tiara was kidnapped by Bowser, alongside Princess Peach, he teams up alongside Mario in order to rescue the both of them. To do this, Cappy possesses Mario's hat, and gives Mario the power to possess whatever Cappy is thrown at.

name: The Seven (Danny Phantom)
summary: The Seven are a group of powerful, old ghosts who banded together in a last-ditch effort to defeat the Ghost King, Pariah Dark. After defeating Pariah Dark, the group sealed him within the Sarcophagus of Forever Sleep and separated the Ring of Rage, Crown of Fire and the key to the sarcophagus. It is unknown what happened to them after they defeated Pariah.

name: The Ironclad
summary: The Ironclad is the last soldier of his tribe. Having made a deal with a demonic entity to become the strongest of them, he would go on to accidentally destroy their village, killing them all.
abilities: Default
Optional Abilities
With other characters' cards
The Silent
The Defect
The Watcher

name: Thanatos (Dungeons and Dragons)
summary: Thanatos is the Hierarch of the Immortal Sphere of Entropy. So ancient that even he does not remember what his original existence was. However, unlike other Immortals, Thanatos cares not about his mortal life. His goals are that of ultimate entropy, the complete and utter destruction of all of creation. His plans are insidious and long lasting, Thanatos uses mortals and Immortals to undo creation one step at a time. Be it slaughtering a random person or toppling empires.

name: Crow (Brawl Stars)
summary: Crow is a Legendary character who can throws 3 poison daggers at his enemies. Seems offensive from his attitude to Colt, and his affiliation with a gang involving Bull and Bibi.

name: King (Beyblade)
summary: King (王, Ou) is one of the main protagonists from the Beyblade Metal Series and is a very close rival to Masamune Kadoya. He is also one of the Solar System Legendary Bladers, descended from ancient blader warriors who fought the God of Destruction Nemesis thousands of years prior to the series, representing the planet Mars. King previously used to live in a small hometown village from Greece and, for being too strong a blader, he was resented by everyone and forbidden to battle. After leaving his home, and befriending Masamune, Gingka and the others, King regained his freedom of beyblade aiming to become the strongest. His partner beyblade is Variares D:D, passed onto him by his ancestors.

name: Ember Guard
summary: Ember Guards are dim-witted but ultimately extremely powerful servants of Imix, whom he often gifts to particularly useful followers as bodyguards and brutes. No servant of Imix would ever refuse such a gift, despite the fact that ember guards serve little purpose outside of brutally efficient killing. Their sole source of joy was pain being inflicted on others, making them extremely willing to destroy any enemies of their masters.

name: Marshall Law
summary: Marshall Law is a character from the Tekken series of fighting games. In the first game, he is a chef who enters the King of Iron Fist Tournament for the fame and also to win enough money to start his own martial arts dojo. Despite not winning the tournament, he is able to gather the funds and start his own dojo. However when his students are attacked by another contestant, Beak Doo San. This causes him to enter the second tournament.

name: Hydraxon
summary: Hydraxon was a former member of the Hand of Artakha and the Order of Mata Nui, being the combat-teacher of the Toa Mata before being assigned to guard over the Pit. After being badly wounded during the Great Cataclysm, he was killed in a surprise attack by Takadox. Thousands of years later, an Aqua Hunter known as Dekar was exposed to Ignika, the Legendary Mask of Life, who ultimately gave him all of Hydraxon's memories and transformed his body into his. This new Hydraxon lost all memory of his previous life and believed with absolute certainty that he was the original.

name: Shira
summary: Shira(Jpn. - 尸良) is a former member of Mugai-ryu and a mercenary in Blade of the Immortal. A cold-blooded killer in the Mugai-ryū. He's responsible for the death of Magatsu Taito's close friend, O-Ren. Shira's a sadistic psychopath who derives sexual pleasure in the torture and murder of his victims, particularly young women. After an attempt to ambush Anotsu goes horribly wrong and he tries to take it out on his attackers. He uses the saw-blade side of his sword to hack of some of their limbs, and then tries to rape a prostitute that was with them while cutting her up at the same time. Rin tries to stop him but is slapped away, Manji arrives and manages to take off Shira's hand before he runs off. Following this incident he cuts some flesh from his injured arm, and sharpens the bones into spikes. His hair turns stark white due to the trauma he caused himself. He develops an obsession with revenge on Manji which leads to him betraying his Mugai-ryū comrades, causing the death of Shinriji and capture of Hyakurin. Later, his quest for revenge against Manji leads to a battle with Magatsu Taito, who was traveling with Manji specifically so he could find Shira. This battle further cripples him with the loss of his remaining hand. Recently he's been shown to be imprisoned in the same prison Manji is currently being held in, and has been set parameters/lists as to whom he shall face before being allowed to fight Manji (this list includes Magatsu). He also states that he has since lost one eye, and has a new "weapon" of sorts. No longer being able to feel pain, he steals Manji's missing left arm and attaches to his own, gaining bloodworms. He is eventually killed by Manji after an intense battle due to overextending his immortality by getting cut up too much while his bloodworms were weakened by the winter cold and his body is left to be eaten by dogs. However, before he finally succumbs to the pack of dogs, he tells Renzo not to become pure evil like himself, not to listen to men like him anymore and to give up his pursuit of Manji's death; saying that Renzo isn't cut out for a life of vengeance. He uses a ninja-to sword, with a saw edge on one side of the blade. He usually uses the regular side to immobilize opponents by cutting off their legs, and then uses the saw-blade to cut off other parts of the body and cause maximum pain. This sword is named "Hotosogi" or woman shadow eraser. However, there is a second meaning for "Hotosogi" which also fits Shira's sadistic nature; when the kanji for woman and shadow are used together they become vagina. He first appears in Dark Shadows part 2 and is first named in Dark Shadows part 3.

name: Orion (Sleepy Hollow)
summary: An angel created by God, Orion eventually left the Heavens, and arrived upon Earth. He began to see humans as flawed creatures, to be purged, and so he set out of to cause mass destruction to humankind. He was eventually defeated by the Horseman of Death, and sealed in Purgatory, although he later escaped after Moloch's death.

name: Monk of Light
summary: The Monk is one of the Warriors of Light destined to restore light to the Crystals and save the world from the wrath of the Four Fiends. A pugilist who tends to forgo the use of weapons and armor in favor of his bare fists and natural toughness, he can often crush most of his opponents with his raw martial skill, easily fighting alongside the Warrior of Light as one of the group's primary melee combatants.

name: The Swamp Monster (TV Show)
summary: The Swamp Monster is one of many humanoid beasts that dwell within the Georgia swamps. It was first discovered by Grandpa Eddie, where he shot and killed it during one of his hunting trips and brought it back to his house, locking it up in an old storage room. After Gretchen Allen and Clark Allen walk into the room, awaking the monster from its death and releasing it, they flee and fend for their lives. Coming up with creative and unique ways of killing it, all of which have failed to truly kill it. After being cornered in the basement while trying to escape from the monster and out of the house, Clark rammed his fist into the monsters throat, where it then started having an allergic reaction that finally killed it and caused it to explode.

name: Mummy Commando
summary: Mummy Commandos were few storey tall mummified kat warriors who served Katchu Pitchu and were laid to rest along with their ruler in his pyramid in giant sarcophagi fitting for their size. They would serve anyone who wore the Jewelled Headdress of Katchu Pichu. The Pastmaster acquired said headdress somehow, found the lost pyramid of Katchu Pichu, and resurrected these warriors in order to make them do his bidding and help him conquer Megakat City. The SWAT Kats and Enforcers would eventually figure out the weakness of the Mummy Commandos and destroy them one by one. The SWAT Kats themselves would go on to put an end to the Pastmaster’s plans and destroy the headdress controlling them, which presumably destroyed all of the remaining Mummy Commandos along with Katchu Pichu himself and his pyramid.

name: Chris Crybird
summary: Chris Crybird is the mother of Larcus, Kite and Medea, as well as the wife of Surges. She was a famous adventurer of the Holy Knight class who settled on Collet Village to raise her family and protect said faraway area from monsters.

name: The Sanguinarch
summary: One of the Six heroes of Kazdel and the Prince of Blood, Duq'arael is one of the antagonists in the Shadows of A Dying Sun story arc of the Main Theme, first mentioned in Episode 09 as the Prince of Blood before appearing in Episode 10 as the Sanguinarch of Vampires and becoming the main antagonist of Episode 13. As the current Sanguinarch of the Vampire Sarkaz, Duq'arael is a cunning yet powerful opponent. Many stories surrounding him describe his ferocity, such as killing every noble at a Victorian banquet within a night, leaving no trace. Legend even says that Duq'arael easily annihilated a band of Victorian soldiers during the grand invasion of Kazdel around two hundred years ago that led to the nation's third disintegration. The massacre was so brutal that the mountains were painted crimson red even during a sunless day.

name: Vamp
summary: One of the members of the anti-terrorist squad Dead Cell's founding lineup, Vamp was orphaned in his youth when his church was bombed, forcing him to resort to feeding on the blood of his family to survive, giving him a taste for it. His codename was not gained from these vampiric traits, however, but from his bisexuality.

name: Hakuei Ren
summary: Hakuei Ren (練 白瑛, Ren Hakuei) is the former Kou Empire's first Imperial Princess. She is also a former General of the Northern Station Corps of the Kou Empire's Western Subjugation Army. Hakuei is the owner of the Djinn Paimon. She is a Dungeon Capturer, having captured one Dungeon, and one of Judar's King Vessels. The soul of the Alma Torran magician Arba was dwelling in her for quite some time after leaving the body of her mother, Gyokuen Ren, and served as Sindria Trading Company Top Consultant until Aladdin defeated Arba by replacing Hakuei's body.

name: Tsunade (Naruto)
summary: Tsunade is one of Konohagakure's legendary Sannin. Though celebrated as the world's most powerful kunoichi and its greatest medical-nin, the repeated loss of her loved ones caused her to abandon the life of a shinobi for many years. She is eventually persuaded to return to Konoha and becomes its Fifth Hokage, where her skills proved invaluable to the village.
abilities: Without her haori
With her haori

name: DMX (Def Jam Vendetta)
summary: DMX is a featured fighter in Def Jam Vendetta as a member of D-Mob's Crew.

name: Godzilla (Super Godzilla)
summary: Super Godzilla is an alternate form of Godzilla created by Toho that first appeared in the 1993 Godzilla video game, Super Godzilla, and later in Godzilla: Super Monster March. All of Super Godzilla's attacks are more powerful than normal Godzilla's. He has more health than normal Godzilla and doesn't take damage from attacks from non-bosses. Additionally, as Super Godzilla, the damage that boss attacks do is roughly cut in half.

name: Muhammad Avdol
summary: Muhammad Avdol is a major character in JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part III: Stardust Crusaders.

name: Tatsumaki (Tornado of Terror)
summary: Tatsumaki (戦慄のタツマキ, Senritsu no Tatsumaki) also known as Tornado of Terror is the S-Class Rank 2 superhero, an esper and the older sister of Fubuki. Tatsumaki is one of the most powerful heroes in the entire Hero Association and is treated as one of their ultimate weapons to be used as a last resort. Despite her young appearance, she is an incredibly skilled and powerful esper. Her personality, on the other hand, can be incredibly childish, and she is fully willing to throw her power around to get her way, or when someone annoys her.

name: Aries Shion
summary: Aries Shion is the original Grand Pope of the Sanctuary and one of the remaining survivors of the Holy War from the 1700s. He also served as the master of Aries Mu. The latter would eventually become the successor to the Gold Cloth of Aries slightly prior to his death. Later Shion is one of the resurrected Saints in the Hades Chapter.

name: Zero-Two (Kirby)
summary: Sometime after the defeat and destruction of the Dark Matter who invaded Planet Popstar, and their leader, 0, another group of Dark Matter invaded a planet in the universe. They mind-controlled beings across galaxies to acquire a weapon that could hinder them. Their leader this time was 0², and its relationship with 0 is unknown.

name: Dilophosaurus (Jurassic: The Hunted)
summary: Dilophosaurus wetherilli is a species of theropod dinosaur that lived during the Early Jurassic.

name: Anti-Monitor (CW)
summary: Mobius, better known as the Anti-Monitor, is the overarching antagonist of the Pre-Crisis Arcs in Arrow Season 8, The Flash Season 6, and Supergirl Season 5, the main antagonist of the 2019-2020 Arrowverse crossover, Crisis on Infinite Earths, and is the ultimate antagonist of the entire Pre-Crisis Arrowverse.

name: Giant Snapping Turtle
summary: An oversized animal, the Giant Snapping Turtle is one of many giant versions of mundane animals. Their bite is strong enough to easily cut a person in half.

name: Zan the Bonebreaker
summary: Zan the Bonebreaker is the protagonist of the Hedon games. A half-orc half-demon hybrid, she finds herself as a key player of a war between the underground and the forces of hell, fighting desperately with her sisters to save the world from the forces of evil and eventually climbing down into Hell, as the only person capable of entering the demons' Citadel due to her tainted blood, and slay the Blue Baron commanding the invasion.

name: Victor Abbott
summary: Victor Abbott is a crime lord and the arch-nemesis of Detective Mason Danvers. After killing his pregnant wife in cold blood, he was sent back to Stonewall prison, but Danvers killed Victor's brother in order to be convicted and reunite with him behind bars in an effort to dismantle his criminal organization.

name: Pale Queen
summary: The Pale Queen is the Mother of All Monsters and the primary antagonist of The Magnificent 12 series.

name: Keira Metz
summary: Keira Metz is a sorceress originally hailing from Carreras. She is a former advisor to King Foltest of Temeria, a role that has also been held by Triss Merigold and Fercart.  Later, Keira became one of the youngest members of the newly formed Lodge of Sorceresses.

name: Watatsuki no Yorihime
summary: Watatsuki no Yorihime is a Lunarian princess. Along with her sister, Toyohime, she is the head of the Lunarian Defense Corps; she appears to be primarily responsible for training the moon rabbits.

name: Vicky
summary: Vicky is one of the two main antagonists in the earlier seasons of The Fairly OddParents!, the other being Denzel Crocker. She is an evil babysitter who enjoys torturing and humiliating the kids she's tasked to take care of, pretending to be good to their parents and blaming their children for any disaster she may cause. Vicky torments her sister Tootie in the time she isn't babysitting and hopes to one day make the whole world miserable.
abilities: Without Toon Force
By Toon Force

name: Arcadios
summary: Arcadios is a Chief of the Cherry Blossom Holy Knight Squadron in the Royal Kingdom of Fiore, who when first introduced seemed to also have an allegiance towards Zeref. Arcadios is a muscular, well-built man of average height, seen to be wearing armor of the Cherry Blossom Holy Knight Squadron. He has deep-set eyes and high cheekbones, with a small scar running from his left temple to the edge of his thick eyebrows. He also has a snub, square-shaped nose. His hair is dark and wavy, sticking up around his head, with prominent sideburns that join into a curved and pointed beard.

name: Moriki Takashi
summary: Moriki Takashi is a supporting character from the "Drop" series. He is the #2 in Tatsuya's gang and the judge of the fights.

name: Lamy Yukihana
summary: Lamy Yukihana is a snow half-elf, from a snow elf father and a human mother. She's an idol working under Hololive, and, alongside Polka Omaru, Botan Shishiro, and Nene Momosuzu, belongs to the NePoLaBo unit. After their CEO, YAGOO, was kidnapped by the Secret Society holoX to further their goal of world domination, she sets forth to defeat them and put a stop to their plan.
