name: Maya Fey
summary: Maya Fey was the younger sibling of Mia Fey. She spent a large amount of her life growing up at Kurain Village, a place where the Fey family and spirit mediums stood. After Maya left in her later years, her sister Mia was murdered and her being pinned as the killer. This is where she met Phoenix Wright, who came to her defense and proved her innocence while proving the real killer guilty. After this, Maya stuck around with Phoenix and helped him on his cases for years to come, until after the DL-6 case, she felt useless to helping Wright because of her inexperience with channeling spirits. So she took a train and headed back to her village to train further and better her skills. Months later, however, in the village, a murder occurred during a spirit summoning gone wrong. Mia was once again pinned as the killer, but again defended by Phoenix who found the true culprit. After this, she went back to helping him with future cases.
abilities: Ace Attorney
Justice for All
Trials and Tribulations

name: Voporak
summary: Voporak is a servant of the Dark Hunters. Originally a clan leader on Stelt, he was selected by Stelt's Makuta for experimentation and was mutated, turning him into a time-sensitive being. The Makuta of Stelt lent him to the Dark Hunters to learn discipline, but he became loyal to the Shadowed One, and not the Brotherhood of Makuta.

name: Mile
categories: Watashi, Nouryoku wa Heikinchi de tte Itta yo ne!
summary: Mile is the main protagonist of the light novel Watashi, Nouryoku wa Heikinchi de tte Itta yo ne!. She was originally an intelligent Japanese girl named Kurihara Misato, who was unable to make friends due to the exceptions placed upon her. After losing her life while saving a girl from an oncoming truck, she was offered the chance to be reincarnated into a fantasy world, asking only that she be giving "average" abilities so she can live a normal life.

name: Neo-Dio
summary:
Dio, later rechristened in Neo-Dio, is the main antagonist of the World Heroes franchise and acts as the final boss of two of its titles. Dio is an artificial lifeform developed by the evil organization "DAMD" with the aim of surpassing his imperfect predecessor Geegus, who had failed its mission of winning the first World Heroes Tournament.
Having succeded in creating the ultimate warrior, Damned planned to use Dio to conquer the world across all time periods, but his creation process led him to develop self-awareness, an inadmissible uncertainty for a living weapon. DAMD tried to dispose of Dio, but he rebelled against his creators and massacred them all.

name: Kuro (One Piece)
summary: Kuro, also known as "Kuro of the Thousand Plans", is the captain of the Black Cat pirates from East Blue and is one of the first villains to appear in One Piece. He is cold and cunning, known for coming up with elaborate plans that never failed. His fighting skills allow him to move silently at incredible speeds to slaughter people in the blink of an eye. However, he eventually tired of the pirate life, setting up schemes for his crewmates, and of constantly being hunted down by the Marines. So he hypnotized the crew's shipwright Nugire Yainu into believing he was Kuro and allowed him to be executed in his place, which allowed him to leave his crew.

name: Vauban
summary: Vauban is an engineer-themed Warframe. Utilizing potent trapping modules to manipulate the battlefield to the Tenno's favor. Much like all Tenno, he is led by the Lotus, a mysterious figure whose motive is to preserve their kind.

name: Lord Zedd
summary: Once the proud Eltarian and commander, Zophram would eventually become the dark sorcerer Lord Zedd. Zophram would try and collect the Zeo Crystal for himself in order to use it as a weapon to destroy the Dark Specter once and for all after his best friend was critically wounded in his last battle against Dark Specter's dangerous assassin. Unfortunately, Zophram did not know about the Zeo Crystal's dangerous field which caused him to be flayed alive. Bathed in regret after being manipulated to think that Zordon and the Eltarians were behind this in fear of the power he would have gotten, Zophram dropped his past behind, gaining the title of the Emperor of Evil, Lord Zedd

name: Hestia (Riordan)
summary: Hestia is the eldest child of Kronos and Rhea and one of the six original Olympian gods, who fought in the first Titan War and dethroned the Titans, starting the Olympian age. After Dionysus was accepted in Olympus, Hestia willing gave up her throne to him, to avoid a civil war, since then she took to constantly tending the Olympian sacred hearth as the goddess of the hearth, home, the right ordering of domesticity, and family.

name: Morax Momonoki
summary: Morax Momonoki is a teacher in the famous demon school Babyls. Momonoki is a very popular teacher who teaches students fundamentals of magic, as a demon with immense versatility and mastery of all kinds of magics.

name: Fenrir (SMITE)
summary: Mortals must rely on the wisdom of the Gods, but never forget they are fallible. They can be petty, churlish, and worst of all, wrong. What are the consequences for their mistakes? They should have slain the wolf-beast Fenrir, but they chose instead to bind him. Despite the warnings and prophecies he would tear Odin apart at Ragnarok and devour the earth and sky, they did not end Loki's son. Now, terror roams free. It is unknown how, but Fenrir is Unbound.

name: G.U.N. Commander
summary: The Commander (司令官 Shireikan) is the highest-ranking and most respected commander of the G.U.N. Federation. As a child he was friends with Maria Robotnik until she and most of his family were killed in a G.U.N. raid, causing him to loathe the recently created Shadow the Hedgehog and spend his later years hunting him down, until he learned the truth about him.

name: The Plushtrap Chaser
summary: The Plushtrap Chaser is part of a line of popular electronic toys manufactured by Fazbear Entertainment.

name: Bismuth
summary: Bismuth is one of the original members of the Crystal Gems. Before the end of the Rebellion, she and Rose had a conflict of interests, leading to them falling out. This ultimately lead to her being poofed, bubbled, and left inside of Lion's Dimension. Rose then lied to the other Gems, telling them that she went missing in battle. 5,300 years later, Rose's son, Steven, accidentally freed her. After her proposal had been rejected once again, she and Steven fought, and she was poofed and bubbled again by him. Unlike Rose, Steven revealed to the others about what happened to her.

name: Giganotosaurus (Ark: Survival Evolved)
summary: The Giganotosaurus (Or Giga) is an extremely dangerous creature from the game Ark: Survival Evolved, the Giga is one of the strongest dinosaurs in the game, being able to kill other powerful dinosaurs with ease.

name: Rick (Dino Crisis)
summary: Rick is a government agent assigned to the Secret Operation Raid Team, an espionage and intelligence group. Rick worked as a technology and computer security expert in a team under the leadership of Gail. During missions, Rick would solve technical problems, repair equipment, and deactivate security measures. Carrying a large rifle, Rick was also capable of providing support in a firefight.

name: Mizuki (47 Ronin)
summary: Mizuki is one of the main villains and the secondary antagonist of the 2013 film 47 Ronin alongside Lord Kira.

name: Liy
summary: Liy is a contestant from the Battle for Dream Island series, debuting as a contestant during the fourth season, Battle for BFDI. As the most adventurous contestant in the series with an interest of discovering new things, Liy has had a past of killing others which she describes as “extremely disturbing”. In order to try to redeem herself to put her murder temptations aside, she joined Death P.A.C.T., where she managed to prevent a majority of the deaths out of all her team members by the time she was eliminated.
abilities: Base
Flipped

name: Carcinosoma
summary: Carcinosoma is a one of the eurypterids, an extinct group of aquatic arthropods. Fossils of Carcinosoma are restricted to deposits of late Silurian (Late Llandovery to Early Pridoli) age. Classified as part of the family Carcinosomatidae, which the genus lends its name to, Carcinosoma contains seven species from North America and Great Britain. Carcinosomatid eurypterids had unusual proportions and features compared to other eurypterids, with a broad abdomen, thin and long tail and spined and forward-facing walking appendages. They were not as streamlined as other groups but had considerably more robust and well developed walking appendages. In Carcinosoma, these spined walking appendages are thought to have been used to create a trap to capture prey in. The telson (final segment of the body) of Carcinosoma appears to have possessed distinct segmentation, Carcinosoma is the only known eurypterid to possess this feature.

name: Fandral (Marvel Cinematic Universe)
summary: Fandral was a highly respected Asgardian warrior, friend of Thor and member of the Warriors Three, known for his charm. Alongside all his fellow warriors, Fandral took part in a poorly considered strike against all the Frost Giants of Jotunheim, which soon resulted in Odin banishing Thor to Earth without his powers. When Loki then took the throne of Asgard during Thor's banishment, Fandral and his allies played a key role in saving Thor from the Destroyer before bringing him back to Asgard where he successfully stopped Loki from stealing throne of Asgard and restoring the peace.

name: Kid Flash (Young Justice)
summary: Wall West, also known as Kid Flash was a founding member of the Young Justice. He was the nephew and former sidekick of Barry Allen. After the initial victory of the Team against the Light he quit being a hero and pursued a normal life with Artemis, but when their help was needed he once again assumed the role of a hero and died while helping The Flash and Impulse save the world.

name: Wolfgang (Gegege no Kitaro)
summary: Wolfgang is a general in Backbeard's army and one of the executives directly helping in Operation Brigadoon. He is a werewolf who is at his strongest under a full moon. He is weak to silver bullets but otherwise he is an extremely powerful yokai who mercilessly destroys his opponents down to their souls.

name: Retriever
summary: Retrievers are the "gopher" units of any demonic fiefdom. Whenever a powerful lord or commander desires to search out lost artifacts, runaway slaves, or unruly underlings, the Retriever is sent out to find them and return them through any means possible. Most scholars can agree that the Retriever is built to mimic the structural design of the Bebilith, though the reason is unknown. Since they are constructs that are easily accessible to most demonic leaders, the Retrievers are also regularly entrusted with tasks that cannot be given to the demon's kin, for their ugly kind are not reliable.

name: Bridget (Guilty Gear)
summary: Bridget was born in a village in England where the birth of twins of the same gender was considered bad luck, and one twin was traditionally sacrificed or exiled in that case. Her parents were unwilling to lose one of their children, and instead they decided to raise her as a girl so that they could hide her from the society she was bound to live with. Bridget loved her parents and did her best effort to live a life in disguise to keep them from worrying, but even then she could see her parents feeling guilty for what they did. Eventually Bridget started to believe that, if she could leave and come back with enough money, then perhaps the village will be able to see there was nothing to their superstitions. Not long, after as if in answer to her prayers, she heard about a bounty for a Gear in the forest of demons and decided to become a bounty hunter, accompanied by her possessed teddy bear, Roger.

name: Silver Sable (Marvel Comics)
summary: Daughter of a famed Nazi hunter Ernst Sablinova, Silvija asked to train under her father to avenge her mother's death, soon exceeding her father's expectations to be one of the best assassins across the globe, and succeeded him as the Head of Sable International, leader of the Wild Pack and monarch of Symkaria.

name: Spinosaurus (Monsters Resurrected)
summary: Spinosaurus aegyptiacus was the biggest carnivorous dinosaur that lived 95 million years ago in Cretaceous Africa. It served as the main protagonist (and antagonist) for the third episode of Discovery Channel's Monsters Resurrected series: "Biggest Killer Dino".

name: Valga Cromwell
summary: Valga Cromwell, commonly known as Old Man Rom, is a member of the Felt Camp and the former owner of the Stolen Goods Warehouse. He was one of the three commanders of the Demi-human Alliance during the Demi-human War, serving as the chief staff officer.

name: Hatsuharu
summary: Hatsuharu is a resident of Asora, and the leader of the Gorgon women of Asora ruled over by Makoto Misumi. One of the loyal followers of the Kuzunoha company and a "lady of the night".

name: Shinkalion E5 Hayabusa
summary: The E5 Hayabusa is the flagship Shinkalion of the Shinkansen Ultra Evolution Institute, piloted by director Hokuto Hayasugi's son, Hayato.

name: Rodrigo Borgia
summary: Rodrigo Borgia (1431 – 1503), born Roderic Llançol i de Borja, was the head of the Catholic Church from 11 August 1492 until his death, reigning as Pope Alexander VI. From 1476, he served as Grand Master of the Italian Rite of the Templar Order.

name: Bralani
summary: The Brelani were a species of wild Eladrin, good-aligned celestials hailing from the Plane of Arborea. These eladrin in particular refused to outright serve any particular god, instead agreeing to ally with them. They embody the snow, wind, and sand, and were considered lesser to their Ghaele brothers.

name: Warrior Bugs (Starship Troopers)
summary: Warrior Bugs are quadrupedal bugs approximately two to three meters long and share their color with the terrain they're born in, such as desert warriors which are tan with black and yellow stripes. Its rearmost pairs of legs are much longer than the two front forelegs, and serve as the primary locomotion, the forelegs being 1/3 shorter. Warrior Bugs are quite agile and fast.

name: Cybersaur
summary: Cybersaur was a United Nations-built robot dinosaur who appeared in the first story arc of Dark Horse Comics' Godzilla, King of the Monsters series.

name: Ristarte
categories: The Hero is Overpowered but Overly Cautious
summary: Ristarte is the Goddess of Healing who was chosen to save Geabrande: an S-Class world. Ristarte summoned Seiya in order to complete this task and take steps towards being a full-fledged goddess. However, Seiya's cautiousness proves to be a thorn on her side initially. Despite this initial conundrum, Ristarte has witnessed how Seiya used his cautiousness to his and everyone else's advantage.

name: Chikage Rokujo
summary: Chikage Rokujo, also known as Rocchi, is the leader of a large biker gang called Toramaru that is primarily based in the Saitama region. He is a self-styled ladies man, and he usually has an entourage of girls following him around. Chikage got involved with Ikebukuro's residents and their problems after a group of Dollars attacked his gang in their own territory.

name: Kartana
summary: Kartana is one of the Ultra Beasts from the Alola region.

name: Kafka Hibino
summary: Kafka Hibino is a rookie officer who realized his lifelong dream of joining the Defense Force at the age of 32. Initially serving as a cadet, he applied the knowledge and instincts he gained as a specialized Kaiju cleaner to aid in Kaiju neutralization operations, earning a promotion to full officer. Kafka's identity as Kaiju No. 8 is a closely guarded secret within the Defense Force, remaining hidden from both the general public and the media

name: Paraceratherium
summary: Paraceratherium is an extinct genus of hyracodonts, ancient relatives of rhinoceros. Paraceratherium lived from the early to late Oligocene epoch (34 - 23 million years ago) in what is now Eurasia, between China and the Balkans.

name: Aviendha
summary: Aviendha was a Maiden of the Spear assigned to educate Rand al'Thor in Aiel ways after he became their Car'a'carn. She treated him very roughly due to her personal conflict over her attraction to him and her sense of honor regarding her close friend Elayne's nebulous relationship with him. She went on to become one of Rand's lovers as well as a powerful Wise One, and served as commander of the forces of the Light at Shayol Ghul in the Last Battle.

name: Bickslow
summary: Bickslow is a Mage of the Fairy Tail Guild and, along with Fried Justine and Evergreen, makes up the Thunder God Tribe. After Fairy Tail's disbandment he joined the Blue Pegasus Guild along with the other members of the Thunder God Tribe. However, after the guilds reformation, he later left to join Fairy Tail again along with his team.

name: Paul Mccartney (The Yellow Submarine)
summary: Paul Mccartney is one of the four musicians from a band know as The Beatles. Not much of anything is known about his past, as never brought up in the film. He is asked to help save a land known as Pepperland, as it was taken over by a group of Blue Meanies. He and his fellow Beatles climb aboard The Yellow Submarine, and sail off to go help save this land.

name: Darkseid (Justice League Action)
summary: Darkseid is one of the main antagonists in the animated series Justice League Action.

name: Lee (Punishing: Gray Raven)
summary: Lee is one of the members of the legendary task force team, Gray Raven. Being the midline between it's captain Lucia and it's lifeline, Liv.

name: Kumonga (Showa)
summary: Kumonga (クモンガ) is a giant spider kaiju who first appeared in the 1967 Toho Godzilla film, Son of Godzilla.

name: Tigris of Gaul
summary: Tigris of Gaul was a famous and legendary gladiator who had a reputation of being undefeated until he met his match with Maximus Decimus Meridius.

name: Iris (Pokémon)
summary: Iris is a trainer from Unova. Originally one of the two gym leaders for Opelucid City, she became the champion of the Unova league after extensive training from Drayden.

name: Will Anthonio Zeppeli
summary: Will Anthonio Zeppeli is a major character in JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part I: Phantom Blood. After Jonathan Joestar's fight with Dio Brando in the Joestar mansion, Zeppeli confronts Jonathan to train him in the art of the Ripple in order to defeat Dio and his supernatural forces.

name: Nienna
summary: Nienna was the Vala of mourning, and she pitied the suffering of others and the wounds of Arda, especially its marring by Melkor. However, it is said the lesson of Nienna is not of endless grief, but rather of pity, hope, and the endurance of the spirit.
abilities: Powers and Resistances of the Ainur (Abilities and Resistances of the Aratar from "Within the confines of Eä")
Flight
Invulnerability (The Ainur are immune from harm via conventional weaponry, as seen when, upon unlocking more of his divine power, Gandalf became invulnerable)
Analytical Prediction (More intelligent than Saruman , who can accurately predict the future through logical deduction)
Acausality ( Type 2 ; Changes to the past or future are unable to affect the "Music in being", otherwise referred to as the present) [ 1 ] as a verse-wide ability.
Mind Manipulation (The barrier of Unwill within every individual mind prevents mental penetration by even the likes of Sauron without consent.) [ 2 ]
Soul Manipulation (Soul with free-will are considered indestructible) [ 3 ] due to verse-wide resistances

name: Ditto (Ben 10)
summary: Ditto is the Omnitrix's DNA sample of a Splixson from the planet Hathor.

name: Kumimanu Fordycei
summary: Kumimanu Fordycei is the largest and heaviest penguin to have ever lived, living in New Zealand during the eocene over 55 million years ago.[1]
abilities: Flipper Slapping and Peaking
Shoving

name: Kabir
summary: Kabir is a elite agent and the leader of a shadow unit of RAW. After a operation involving a civilian goes wrong due to a information leak Kabir realizes that there are traitors among RAW and sets on a mission to kill the traitors by himself. This action makes him look like a rouge agent and is ordered by the government to be found and killed.

name: Sarah Harding (The Lost World: Jurassic Park Video Game)
summary: Sarah Harding, the field biologist from the The Lost World: Jurassic Park film, appears as a second playable human character. She is mainly referred to as "Human Prey". Throughout the game she is chased by a Tyrannosaurus (probably the one you just played as).

name: Tower Knight
summary: The corrupted form of the Knight of the Tower, Alfred, a Knight of the Round Table of Boletaria. He was renowned for his unique Tower Shield, forged to stop almost any physical or magical attack. Once he became a Demon, he grew to a great height and wields a larger form of his shield.

name: Ekimmara
summary: Ekimmara or Ekimma for short are a race of lower vampires that belongs to the wider vampire family. Ekimmara's are bat-like creatures that like a bat prefers to drink blood but Ekimmara's prefer to brutalize their victims and eat their flesh along with their blood in which they do it efficiently with their razor sharp claws and their blows are so powerful that even the toughest armors get crushed by them and are unnaturally quick creatures for their size

name: Mugino Shizuri
summary: Mugino Shizuri is one of the seven Level 5 Espers, ranking fourth after Mikoto Misaka, and the leader of the dark side team ITEM, which is at odds with another mercenary team, SCHOOL. She looks down upon lower-level espers and does not mind eliminating people who get in her way or go against her, regardless of whether they are enemies or allies. Her cruel attitude led to Hamazura Shiage, a Level 0 who was ITEM's lackey at the time, to fight her to protect Takitsubo Rikou. Her overconfidence during that fight and Shiage's resourcefulness eventually resulted in her defeat and mutilation at the hands of the boy and her own power. Becoming obsessed with Shiage after he defeated her, Mugino tried two more times to kill him, until eventually both she and Shiage made peace with each other during World War III and reunited in the new ITEM.
